title: Helps on tiring days
text: These are super useful when you've had a long tiring day. Gets you relaxed and in the mindset of rest. The scents are great and they last at least 10 minutes in the shower. Can be overpowered by certain body wash scents though. Very giftable and can't be packed in a toiletry bag for travel

title: Love this scent
text: Wish I could bottle up this scent and spray it in my house. The mixture of orange and lemongrass was awesome. It wasn't too strong nor was it to mild in the shower and it lasted a nice amout of time. I wouldn't suggest using it for quick showers though. Easy to store and clean up. It definitely woke up my senses and at the same time relaxed me before bed.

title: Very strong
text: Definitely did not like this scent. It was extremely overwhelming. It was overpowering while in the bag but in the shower, the scent did not sit well with my nostrils. Can't really describe it but I just know the mixture of eucalyptus and frankincense is not for me. The good news is that it didn't dissolve quickly and the scent filled the shower well allowing you to have a good or bad experience with it. This one just wasn't a scent I liked but someone else may. It dissolved easily once under a light stream of water and cleaned up easily also.

title: Not too bad
text: These really didn't stay in place in my shoe as expected, but when I was able to use them without them moving around in my shoe they were very comfortable and super helpful. I would have liked for them to not slide around but things happen. Very comfortable to walk on and easy to place in your shoe. Initially it felt weird having them in my shoes but after a few minutes i forgot they were there until the next time I put my shoes on.

title: A little tricky to use
text: Overall I like this body brush. I had to use a little more body wash than I usually do to keep the brush lathered. Using it on my upper and lower back was a little tricky as it was a little awkward to hold and use. The bristles feel a little harsh on the skin when you're using it but it may not feel like that for others. I just decided to use it mostly for my feet and under arms. Still a good body brush though.

title: Sugar Free Energy!
text:
Usually when I see “sugar free”, I move right on to the next one, and it doesn’t really matter what we are talking about. Going against better judgement, I decided to give this one (Glytch Gaming Energy Supplement) a try, and I am sure glad that I did.
Despite being sugar free, Glytch actually has a good flavor to it. The label says it tastes like “Rainbow Magic”, though I’m not sure what magic tastes like, so I will say that it has a berry flavor that is not overpowering and is actually really easy to get down, unlike many energy supplements.
Within 20 minutes of drinking a single serving, I feel a noticeable increase in energy and motivation . It makes me feel ready to do whatever it is that I have planned, either gaming, going to the gym, or going on a run. It is a physical as well as mental effect which makes it really easy to focus completely on whatever it is that I am doing and even makes me feel excited to be doing it. This energy supplement by Glytch really does work.

title: Expensive For a Creatine Product
text:
I was always under the belief that creative monohydrate was the best and most effective creatine available, in fact, until this supplement, I had not ever seen other forms of creatine. I figured I’d give it a try to see if I noticed a difference.
The first thing I noticed was how well this mixes. I mixed it with about 12 oz water and it fully dissolved within 20 or so seconds. The flavor, “Lions Blood”, actually tastes good and was easy to drink.
After about 3 weeks of usage, I decided that I could not determine any noticeable difference between this and plain creatine monohydrate.
My one complaint here is the price. Creatine is generally inexpensive, however, this is just under $40 for a 60 day supply, which is simply too much.

title: Basic Creatine
text:
This product is exactly as advertised, regular old creatine monohydrate. This is unflavored, as plain creatine is, so in terms of flavor, it is exactly what one would expect. I have been stirring it into a cup of iced tea, which has worked perfectly.
This creatine does mix well, though I will stir it a few times as I drink it to make sure it is fully dissolved. Stirring 3-4 times for 15-20 seconds each time will completely dissolve 2 scoops into 1 glass of the drink of your choice.
After a month of use, I can tell a difference in my lifts as well. Definitely a slight increase in the amount of weight that I am lifting across the board on all lifts.
This is a great value for the money. Creatine actually works, and this jar has 60 servings, for less than $15, that is a really good deal!

title: Strong Stim Preworkout!
text:
One of my New Years resolutions this year is to get in better shape, which I am sure is the same for many people. As a result, I have been searching for supplements to help me make the most of my workouts, to help me get results.
In this time, I have tried several different pre workout drinks and can tell a huge difference in effectiveness, with some helping me to have incredible workouts while others essentially did nothing for me.
This pre workout works well. When you take
2 scoops, as recommended for the “strong” dose, it can even be a bit too much, especially if you are not used to strong preworkouts.
If you are caffeine sensitive, this is NOT the drink for you. This pre workout is high in caffeine and not for caffeine sensitive people.
Aside from a high dose of caffeine, this pre workout has a pretty good ingredient profile, including the staple of any pre workout drink, creatine.
The “Berry” flavor is pretty good, not great, as it has a bit of a chemical aftertaste.
Overall, this is strong pre workout drink.

title: Cant Tell If It Works
text:
With COVID being such a huge danger right now, I searched for supplements that could potentially help to keep me safe from it.
While doing research, I can across NAC several times, and learned that it positively effects the respiratory system.
The pills are easy to swallow and are flavorless. The dose of NAC is an appropriate dose. The issue is that there is no way to tell if this works at all. I feel no difference whatsoever

title: Odd taste
text: I really wanted to like these since I take quite a few medications everyday so adding a pill-based cranberry supplement isn't all that appealing.  Sadly, these miss the mark taste-wise.  Instead of just sweetening the cranberry & calling it a day, they have this weird combination of cherry-mango.  It's not a great combo.  Other than taste, they aren't sticky so getting them out of the bottle is easy.  They're currently listed as 'unavailable' so I can't comment on price but the taste makes them something I won't order again.

title: Covered in sugar
text:
Overall, these aren't bad but every single gummy is covered in sugar. I'm sure there have to be ways to keep them from sticking together without sugar. I've tried many other gummy vitamins & supplements and these are the only ones that are sugar-coated. The flavor is technically strawberry but the sugar makes it mostly sugar-flavored.

If you have small kids that might find your vitamins, hide these very well. They are literally gummy bears coated in sugar, in appearance and taste. I know adults who've made themselves sick by eating too many gummy vitamins - but a kid is going to think these are actual candy if they see them.

As of this writing, they are no longer available for purchase, which is probably a good thing. No one needs more sugar in their life so I wouldn't buy these no matter how inexpensive they were.

title: Odd taste
text: I really wanted to like these since I take quite a few medications everyday so adding a pill-based cranberry supplement isn't all that appealing.  Sadly, these miss the mark taste-wise.  Instead of just sweetening the cranberry & calling it a day, they have this weird combination of cherry-mango.  It's not a great combo.  Other than taste, they aren't sticky so getting them out of the bottle is easy. As of this writing, they are no longer available for purchase, which is probably a good thing. No one needs more sugar in their life so I wouldn't buy these no matter how inexpensive they were.

title: Great size for traveling, fits great in your bag!
text:
This sample tub of Alpha Lion is absolutely *perfect* for traveling. It's small size means it wont risk weighing your luggage down at the airport (I put it in checked bag) and assuming you're using 2 scoops per session it gives you about 7 days of preworkout, which is more than enough for a week or longer (depending how many days you workout) trip. Very great sizing and useful for short stints for work or vacation.

In terms of ingredient profile, its pretty run of the mill standard ingredients. I will say their citrulline malate 2:1 combo is slightly higher than most (7g instead of 6), but still a bit underdosed based on the 6-10g of pure l-citrulline effective min-max effective dosage. The rest of the ingredients are fairly common. AstraGin is a nice addition to this preworkout, which claims to boost absorption.

Hulk Juice as a FLAVOR was great. It's a kind of green apple flavor. If you like "green" flavors you'll enjoy this one. Not the most cost effective for bulk buying, but GREAT for travel. Would definitely buy in a pinch.

title: Tasty but not AS good as oatmeal cookie flavor
text:
I've become a major supporter of JYM protein after getting a tub of the plant-based oatmeal cookie flavor. Hats off to the team for being a little more creative with their plant-based flavoring profiles.

The pros:
1) tastes good
2) simple, clean ingredient profile
3) mixes easily in blender
4) look forward to drinking after a workout!

The cons:
1) moderately priced (not the cheapest on the market)
2) not AS tasty as the oatmeal cookie flavor (but still tasty!)

In short, I would highly recommend JYM's plant-based protein line to anyone escaping the clutches of dairy!

title: For a non-stim product, I like this a lot!
text:
This is a non-stim product, but despite the fact that you're not going to get any caffeine jitters (for those lacking the proper enzyme to metabolize caffeine the way I do!) it really does have a solid ingredient profile. I very much like the inclusion of Agmatine Sulfate, Norvaline, Nattokinase, and Stearoyl Vannillyamide. The green tea extract and Nitrosigine are nice boosts. The inclusion I could do without is the sodium -- in fact given how many of us have electrolyte imbalances and favor sodium over potassium, I'd prefer the latter if any were to be included. Very few of us need MORE sodium intake in our diets...

That said, the capsules are GOLD in color. My hunch is this isn't super healthy for us, but it certainly feels and looks cool downing 8 golden capsules! Really makes you feel like royalty before you tuck yourself in under the barbell on the bench press!

I generally cut the dosage in half and use alongside my main preworkout. It's a nice little booster.

title: Good multivitamin, but reeks and leaves a smell on your hand
text: This is a GOOD (not great, but GOOD) multivitamin with a strong ingredient profile. In general, I am conservative with multivitamins, given that my diet is pretty strong and diverse. I break these in half, and only use a half a pill per day (but you will still see a strong change in urine color an hour or so after using!). You can check the ingredient profile and compare with other multivitamins, and you'll see this one exceeds some of the other cheap multis on the market. That said, the SMELL is pretty atrocious, and if you leave it in your hand for even a second or two you'll have a smell on your hand that is pretty annoying -- I have to wash my hands every time I take one. The pill itself is fine and easy to swallow, but the smell is the only reason I couldn't award this 5 stars. It's a good value for the price, but the smell is a real drag!

title: Honestly the BEST tasting plant protein I've ever had
text: I don't often RAVE about the flavor of a protein powder, but the oatmeal cookie flavor protein is by far the single best tasting plant protein powder I've ever had. The industry has had many years to perfect whey protein flavoring schemes, but the plant protein genre has been suffering a bit in this regard. I don't know how JYM managed to make this plant protein taste so good, but they really accomplished something here. I might have trouble going back to anything else after this. THAT SAID, it is a bare bones plant protein -- you're not getting all the greens and random bells and whistles that other plant proteins try to jam in. But honestly, it is perfect as is. I don't begrudgingly down this shake after a workout, I look forward to it. It's a real treat.

title: Wellmo Elderberry Immunity Formula Vegan Gummies
text: Immunity seems to be the word for our days right now. Elderberry amps up your immunity along with Zinc and Vitamin C. They are tasty and you only need 1 per day.

title: Fish Oil Omega 3 Supplement. Norway Sourced
text: What I like about this Fish Oil is that there is no aftertaste. The liquid capsules are easy to swallow and I have had to problems metabolizing them. My Doctor recommended Fish Oil and this brand gives me a 60 day supply of them. Good Bargain.

title: Go Green Power Memory Foam Travel Neck Pillow
text: Comfortable and easily packed travel pillow. Its soft and fits nicely around your neck. Great for long flights. Reasonably priced.

title: DII Women's Microfiber Bath Wrap Dahlia Gray
text: As a body wrap after shower or bath this shower wrap can't be beat. Love the fabric and how it wraps up easily. Washes well and looks like it will last a long time.

title: Terrible taste
text: The taste stayed with me for hours.  I gave it away.  I’m sure the ing are fine, I just couldn’t deal with the taste.

title: Still slipping
text: Slipping was not helped, very disappointed

title: Tastes so bad
text:
I drink energy drinks, pre-work outs, post-work outs, etc some type of caffeinated jolt product every day otherwise I am practically useless. I don't like overly sweet drinks and was worried this one would be. It isn't sweet its just gross. It has this off taste funky sour thing going on. To the point that I couldn't chug it down.

Now one of my work out friends loves it. He thinks its great. So for Him this is like 4 stars. For me its like 1.

No jitters from the 1/2 portion I did take. Price point is similar to other brands and overall packaging is really good.

title: Standard gummies
text: These are pretty standard gummies, no funky or chalky after flavor.  They don't get stuck or pull on your teeth while chewing.  Price point is a bit high for VitB12 BUT they are gummies and with the coupon not to much higher.  IF you prefer taking supplements in gummy form vs pill then it is probably a good investment of your money.  However, if it isn't a bit deal to you then it might not be cost effective.

title: Great for on the go
text:
I use these for all kinds of things besides just medications of my own. I ALWAYS have to have allergy medication or Benadryl or random 'kids' fever etc. meds and I store them in these in bags. I just label the compartments and toss meds in them and go.

Also, these work great as coin storage, lego storage, random candy storage and any other odd small thing that can be lost in a purse, diaper bag, game bag, cosplay bag you name it bag!

Well made and durable. Also, labels do stick to these or you can use a sharpie.

title: Hard inserts
text: These are pretty good as build ups for older work boots that the old inserts are going out in.  My guy put these in (as a replacement for the old ones) then put in soft inserts over them.  He has pretty intense flare ups of his plater fasciitis every now and then and he likes these double stacked when it does happen.  This insert won't work best for everyone since it is hard not soft.  BUT if you need to have a hard surface to press on then its a great one.  It fits his 11 size boots with no issues and are comfortable for him.

title: Surprisingly great
text: I am really surprised at the quality of these bags.  They are better then average (what you would normally find in a dollar store) and probably along the lines of what you expect to find in a party store.  Really good quality.  IF you put something super heavy in them you should still support the bottom, but you would do that with any bag.  The designs and colors are fantastic.  Perfect for pretty much any event and most holidays.  Nice average size bags.  Would recommend.

title: Nice gummies
text: You get 2 bottles (so 2 month supply) for under $20 (at the time of this review).  Even the generic at my local pharmacy and big box stores are more expensive then that.  These gummies didn't have a bitter or tart after taste and I didn't find them to be overly sticky/hard.

title: easy to chew gummy
text:
You get a 30 day supply (60 gummies at 2 per serving) in this bottle. Currently, at the time of this review, it is $12.99 and there is a coupon for a BOGO offer so 2 bottles for $12.99. Typically, a 30 day supply of gummies like this from my local chain pharmacy (their generic brand) is $16.99 when BOGO is going on.

These are easy to chew and didn't get stuck in my teeth. Decent taste and have the same listed amount of ingredients and percentages of what you are intaking as my normal daily that I take.

title: Pretty unremarkable in flavor
text:
This is okay in the flavor department. I like that it has collagen along with protein. I drink a protein shake or add some to a drink daily. This isn't one I will get again. The serving size is "2 heaped tbs" that's useful.

This was listed as chocolate fudge but arrived chocolate and the flavor is similar to that of unsweetened chocolate. Great if you don't care for sweets or chocolate. The chocolate is very mild but there.

Overall just not impressed with this. It did mix well but the flavor was blah and a funky chalk coating after drinking.

title: Fantastic bath bombs
text: These are wonderful.  I love bath bomb and often they are over scented or just don't do much.  This set is a perfect balance.  The various scents are wonderful and mild.  You don't feel like you are inside a perfume shop.  They are oversized, if you have a large tub one is plenty.  They dissolve very well and didn't leave a chalky film in the tub.  My skin was moisturized and very pampered.  My guy even liked them in the tub!  Presented in a nice box with each bomb wrapped in plastic and additionally wrapped in a paper with a label indicating the scent.

title: Big Fan of Pine polish
text:
I am really liking the Pine Polish more and more. You get 12 bottles in this set, do note that the count includes the 1 bottle of Base coat, the 1 bottle of Top coat, and the 1 bottle of Matte top coat. So in reality you get 9 colors and of those 9, 3 are in glitter colors.

The bottles are decent in size and the polish spreads nicely. You can be generous and put on a thick single coat and pretty much get full coverage. Set times don't vary from any other brand I have used.

Scent (nail polish scent) is not more pronounced then other brands. These colors are very vibrant and jewel tone like. Really good set.

title: Nice any event bags
text: These are pretty sturdy little bags.  They are strong enough to support a book without the bottom falling out.  They aren't overly thick but for standard gifts most or many items will fit in these.  The Rose Gold color and Silver are much attractive then the regular gold one.  They don't shed a ton of glitter over everything and are sturdy enough to be re-used by the receiver if they like.  Mini card are also included.  Pretty handy set to keep for last minute wrapping needs.

title: For small shoe sizes only
text:
These are ultra tiny shoe inserts. I wear a size 9 (to 9 & 1/2) and these Stop before reaching the base of my big toe. They are not wide enough for my shoes. These are probably designed for, at most, a US women's size 6 shoe.

The gel itself is nice and comfortable but sadly not usable by anyone in my family unless cutting down to fit into children's shoes.

title: Not for heavy objects
text: These are thin gift boxes.  No to say they are cheap just that they are very light weight.  They fold easily and have a nice shimmery rose gold color to them.  Takes no time to assemble and they are really cute.  If you put something heavy in them, you will need to support the bottom.  Light weight items, like jewelry won't be an issue.  A cupcake would probably be the weight limit without keeping my hand under the bottom.  Overall, perfect simple gift or display box.

title: Not the best for the price
text:
These are decent sponges & scouring pads. The stainless steel is pretty much normal standard quality you will find available at any grocery or discount "dollar" store. They hold up rather well and do a pretty great job on your heavy duty pots.

The sponges are another issue though. They are ultra light and not very durable. The yellow portion feels similar to a car sponge while the green is just okay. They aren't the worst sponges I have ever used. They do rinse out and dry easily without molding super fast. But they just don't last very long with multiple daily use.

For the price these aren't the best.

title: It's not sweet
text:
Most toothpaste, to me, has a sweet / sugary kind of flavor mixed in. This toothpaste doesn't really have that. It isn't bitter or chemical just has a somewhat minty non overly sweet flavor. Not a ton of foam, which I don't think is an issue, and does leave my mouth/teeth feeling clean. Overall, this doesn't taste bad at all but it is different. If you have ever had "natural" or "chemical free" (I didn't label it that) toothpaste then you will get the idea. Kids may not be to excited to use this.

Price pint, per tube, is a bit higher then standard commercial brands but they are pretty normal / comparative to other natural toothpastes I have used.

title: No dry rot and very nice colors
text:
These balloons arrived in a vacu-sealed bag. I have to say that was a pleasant surprise. None of the balloons were dry rotted (which happens a lot oddly enough) and silver ribbon was included. The pastel colors are exactly as presented in the advertisement photos.

Balloons are standard "party" balloon size and were easy to blow up and tie off. These did NOT pop easily at all.

Overall, price point was excellent, colors are what I wanted and packaging was well done.

title: My guy enjoys this, I think they are okay
text:
These are handy if you need to maintain a specific calorie count. At 220 per bottle that's a bit much unless you need a quick snack. I find that these have a bit of a chalky / filmy after taste. Not really bad but reminds me of milk and I don't care for that. My guy on the other hand LOVES these, swears they taste like "strawberry vanilla quick milkshake" .

Overall, these maybe useful but were not specifically for me. However, my other half these are great for.

title: Works well but needs better dispenser
text: I have white, yeah I know this is a self inflicted issue, seat cushions at my dining room table.  This so far, has protected against tiny Cheetos fingers trying to climb up to sit at the table.  I wish the spray bottle worked better for the application.  I was only able to treat 2 chairs before the dispenser bottle broke.  Now I have some left in the can but can't use it like I want.  So 5 stars for the actual item 1 star for the dispenser.

title: Not for thick curly hair
text:
This isn't the greatest straightener for thick curly hair. It does have the ability to adjust the heat temp, which is useful. However, the plates are rather small and just don't work great on my hair. It is packaged well and oddly does curl my hair better then straightening is.

The power button and digital screens are easy to see and clear to read however, please note, that when turning it on it isn't instant you MUST hold the power button longer then other product types or it simply won't turn on. Not a major issue but still an issue.

The 360 swivel cord, the glove and clips are all excellent features. However, overall this isn't a very well made curler/straightener.

title: Super easy way to add protein intake
text: These are pretty sweet in flavor for being sugar free and Keto friendly.  Easy to drink no weird after flavor, overall think drinking a liquid fruit roll-up.  Mixes well in shakes or taking as it.  Price point is very reasonable .  Overall, does what it says and doesn't taste bad at all.

title: Can you have a high carb intake, if not this isn't for you
text:
Really like the headline says, if you can not have a lot of carbs or don't want them in your diet then this isn't the drink for you. Some day's I need to have a large intake of carbs yet due to allergies what I would need to eat would be MASSIVE so bam I can drink this and I am good to go.

Flavor isn't bad I enjoy it.

Like every other powder mix I have ever tried the best way to get this to mix well is take 1 to 2 oz of hot water, dump the powder in and shake/stir until dissolved then add super cold water and you shouldn't have any clumping or powder balls to deal with.

No caffeine is great since I usually have to take this at night and I don't want to be up all night.

Price point, For ME, isn't bad since I am not taking this daily. Overall, it does exactly what it says it will do but I highly recommend reading the label to make sure it will work with your diet choices.

title: Works great on kids shoes
text: My child can clear a room with her stinky shoes.  It's a known fact that she has to leave her trainers outside.  This spray really helps cut down/out the sweat scent.  When you first spay it there is a bit of a chemical smell but it went away after a few minutes and didn't remain in the shoes.  Overall, ANY product that can help with those shoes gets 5 stars.

title: tastes terrible but restores everything needed better then any other
text: As far as flavors go this is not something I want in my mouth because you can taste the salt going back into your body.  For results, this is one of the best recovery drinks I have ever used, I feel great after chugging it down.  If you are super active/ sick and sweating a ton then this is the drink for you.  But again, the flavor of this is not something anyone will drink unless they need it.  Price point seem high, but you can really split this into two uses if only doing a standard workout.

title: ultra light weight , store flat
text: These are your basic pastry /  jewelry / take home box for light weight or delicate gifts.  These are not designed to store heavy items in them, if you do put something with any noticeable weight in them you will need to support the bottoms at all times or the box may break open.  Decent size and easy to put together.  Overall, great to keep on hand for quick gifts.

title: Not for heavy gifts
text: Like the box advertise's these are not designed for heavy gifts.  The boxes, are super easy to assemble.  The card board / card-stock is decent for jewelry ./ bakery items etc.  These will dent/ get crease marks or bent if not stored flat.  Overall, these are what I expected.  They didn't rip with normal handling which is nice.

title: Not my favorite in flavor
text: These have pretty nice ingredients and the calorie count, as a snack, isn't bad at all.  I just didn't care for the chocolate flavor at all as it tasted like bakers chocolate very unappetizing.  Oddly, when you bit into one you just keep chewing.  Seriously one bit felt like I was chewing for very very very long time.  The vanilla isn't as bad, to me, in taste.  Overall, these are okay but I don't know if would choose these first again.

title: Fail at primary goal
text:
These are soft, and comfortable, but don't do a good job holding mask strings/elastics due to the flexibility of the (silicone) material; and the slots are too small for most cloth mask elastics.

Thank you very much for reading my review. If you found it helpful, I’d appreciate your clicking the button below.

title: Effective
text:
After realizing my chronic pain was always better after eating Indian food, I'd researched the ingredients, and honed in on turmeric as the main reason why. At that point, I started doing some Indian cooking at home, and also adding turmeric to other dishes when I thought it wouldn't be noticeable. That isn't always practical, however, so taking it in capsules is a good alternative.

These capsules seem to help, and are an easy way to get it. I find that I need to take two at a time, and appreciate that they didn't try to pack so much into larger capsules that I would only need to take one, as that one capsule would be difficult to swallow.

Thank you very much for reading my review. If you found it helpful, I’d appreciate your clicking the button below.

title: My neti pot is going to be gathering dust
text:
Generally speaking, I've been happy with my neti pot, but it's not something I can take with me when we travel or camp. This looked as if it might be a good alternative, and I believe that it is. Being plastic, it's not going to break. I didn't realize that I was going to love that I can close the nasal applicator tip and shake it up to make sure I dissolve the salt, but I do. Having used a neti pot for a very long time, I was also surprised by how much easier and more comfortable it is not to have to lean way over in order to have the solution flow through my nasal passages – I'd just gotten used to doing it. Being able to squeeze the bottle also allows for changing how fast it flows in. Being able to see how much is still in the bottle, so that I can stop halfway, and switch sides is also extremely helpful! The only thing it doesn't have, which I wish it did, is a stand to hold the bottle upside down when drying it.

The salt packets are hard to empty, as the slit for opening them is badly placed: lengthwise, and in the middle, so they just tear down the middle, leaving a pocket on both sides which is hard to empty by pouring (as a nurse, I'm not going to stick it in the bottle and shake it, for sanitary reasons).

This is definitely a keeper!

Thank you very much for reading my review. If you found it helpful, please click the button below.

title: A very good heated mask with silk cover
text:
My eye doctor wants me to use a warm, damp compress on my eyes once a day. It's not always practical, and the electrically heated ones seem to work better in my experience..

I love that this eye mask has a silk cover, which should be much better for the skin around my eyes. I haven't spritzed it yet but it seems to get my own eyes to release tears, at the least. I have another heated mask which seems to run longer, and at a higher top heat than this, but half an hour's probably all that's practical anyway, and I don't want it to be too hot.

I'd put the cord on the other side of the mask, if it were up to me. Also, the nose cutout isn't realistic for Western noses, though it does work. My bridge is just too high for this to fit just right. Other than that, I'm happy with it. That said, which mask will I take with me when traveling? I believe it will be this one, as it's less bulky, and the silk is so nice.

If my review was helpful, please click the button below.

title: Great for an immune boost
text:
Pros:
+ Tastes minty & refreshing.
+ Dissolves easily in your mouth.
+ Safe and good quality product. According to their website:
"Our branded, clinically-supported zinc ingredient has been exclusively made by the same Japanese
pharmaceutical company for over 30 years."
"ImmunoSwift contains a top quality Japanese active ingredient that supports your immune system so
that you can get back to living your best."
"Made in the USA"
+ I feel healthier and better protected after taking this lozenge.

Cons:
- I definitely hope that this company continues to manufacture this high quality product, but I wish the price was a little more consumer friendly.

title: It worked for me, but ...
text:
Due to the shortage of N95 respirators and we are relying on blue surgical masks more lately. I'm not a fan. They seem too close to my mouth and tend to muffle my voice. This silicone bracket seemed like a good idea to me.

For me, they work well enough, but my wife has a smaller nose and more of an Asian face. For her, the bracket will just not stay in place. I still use them, but she has quickly given up. We're still looking for a better solution.

title: Big Softgels
text:
Pros:
+ Although these softgels are big, they are relatively easy to swallow
+ I did not detect any lemon flavor, but the flavor is neutral (flavorless) and easy to take
+ Easy on the stomach (No stomach upset)

Cons:
- The first time I tried this supplement, I had strong fishy burps. As I continued taking the supplement, the fishiness seemed to subside.

title: The thinness is a feature
text:
I have used the smaller size and liked them, so I decided to give these bags a try.
The larger size scared me a little, as I was afraid they may not be able to handle the strain of a larger load. I have yet to break one, but I have definitely been a little more careful than usual.
If the biodegradable and compostable features of these bags is important to you, get these bags.
If you're the type to stuff as much as you can get in your trash bags, pass (especially if you have wet garbage).

title: Great addition to our diet
text: We don't use any sugar in our house.  That's probably why I think this beet powder tastes sweet.  It's definitely not too sweet and has a nice earthy flavor that I really like.  We add it to our smoothies and have had success with a number of different foods.  It's great in oatmeal!

title: Love the quantity in this set. You will surely find a scent you love in this
text:
5/5 Rating

Pros
Multiple scents to choose from
Giftable

Cons
None

This is a nice affordable set of essential oil scents that you can use for your home. shower, bath, candles... I love the variety of the scents offered. My favorites are peppermint, citronella and pine tree. I use primarily for my diffuser. A few drops will last you the entire day.

title: I'm impressed.
text:
5/5 Rating

Pros
Super easy to use
3 settings to choose from
Compact form factor
Love the color

Cons
Motor not as powerful as I like

This is a nice facial brush. A very good replacement to mine that died a couple weeks ago. This brush deep cleans your skin and pores. It has 3 settings.. 3600rpm's, 7200 rpms and the 3rd setting is a combination of the two. I love the color and the ease of use. On top of it all it's USB-C charging. Can't beat that. Getting this brush is a win.

title: I had my reservations but I'm a believer. I love it.
text:
[[VIDEOID:1f951473e042fd9a409943cb2e433b84]] 5/5 Rating

Pros
Super easy to use
3 settings to choose from
Compact form factor
Love the color

Cons
Motor not as powerful as I like

This is a nice facial brush. A very good replacement to mine that died a couple weeks ago. This brush deep cleans your skin and pores. It has 3 settings.. 3600rpm's, 7200 rpms and the 3rd setting is a combination of the two. I love the color and the ease of use. On top of it all it's USB-C charging. Can't beat that. Getting this brush is a win.

title: Pre moistened wipes saves time - this leaves small residue after wiping and it's not enough solution
text:
[[VIDEOID:11dfa2a243cd8a702f7e2e162ee71887]] 2/5 Rating

Pros
Nice sized container
Easy to break off wipes

Cons
Not enough solution on wipes
Leaves small residue after use

Premoistened wipes are always the move. They're super easy to use, super easy to break off and saves a lot of time. I like these wipes as they smell pretty decent. Only thing is not enough solution and it leaves residue after use.

title: If you're looking for a versatile TENS Unit to help with pain - this is it.
text:
5/5 Rating

Pros
Super versatile Unit
Multiple pads for use
Good battery life
Sleek design

Cons
None

I always thought these types of units were more trendy than effective. I was WRONG.

This unit works great and is very helpful for people like myself who are stationary for long periods of time or people who need rehab and therapy to help strengthen and stimulate muscles. I use this all throughout the day as I work and relax. Having multiple pads only add on to the value.

title: Great compact shiatsu massager
text:
[[VIDEOID:594a5c5a4249f1e159519fd53d69a650]] 4/5 Rating

This is a wonderful compact shiatsu neck massager. This thing works great and is a much better alternative than the neck / back massager with the loops what you would put your hands through. That massager is best for the back, legs and arms but very tough for the neck.

This massager is much more suitable and not as harsh and abrasive on your neck. I like the different modes, the heat settings and that you can use this in your car, at home, at the office.

Pros
Nice and compact
Portable
More suitable for neck and lower back

Cons
None - Maybe the 15 min time limit.

title: Wonderful re-usable pads that makes removing make up less of a task
text:
5/5 Ratings

First Impressions - I like that these come in multiple colors. They are super soft and easy to use. The best thing about it is that they are washable!! So that means you can use multiple times. It might be best to wash immediately after use so that the make up doesn't stain the pads.

Pros
Comes in multiple colors and sizes
Washable
Super soft

Cons
None

title: Great way to manage the intensity of beets, just be mindful, using this everything turns red.
text:
I love beets... I try to eat them whenever I get the chance which is not often and that sucks being that I'm a Pescatarian.

This powder is phenomenal way for you to incorporate the nutrition of eating beets but in the amounts that you can handle. Sometimes beets flavor and taste can be overwhelming but when you can add via using this powder you can somewhat manage the intensity. Only issue, no matter how much you add it will turn your smoothie / drink / juice red... And, when you go to the bathroom it has the potential to be red too if you know what I mean. There's nothing wrong with you it's just that the beet color is very strong.

Overall, I love the idea of being able to manage the beet taste in my smoothies and juices. I'm 12 days in on the Lemonade Master Cleanse and this beet powder is great to add to juices to maintain that healthy weight loss. Buying this is a win win.

title: Vitamin D
text:
A good inexpensive source of vitamin D3and K2.
I almost never get a cold or the flu and one thing that I always do is take Vitamin D3 during the winter months.

title: Good Produt
text: A good product to help you to keep healthy during cold/covid and flu season.

title: Works Well
text: A generic form of Benadryl it works well for allergies and as a sleep aid.

title: Good Product
text: Seems to be a good product.  I got a nice energy boost from it without any the usual jittery feeling that you get from consuming a lot of caffeine.

title: Nothing
text: There is no smell unless you hold it up to your nose. I don't think it looks nice either, it reminds me of something you find at the dollar store. It looks cheaply made and it doesn't even smell.

title: Flat
text: It isn't round, it is mostly flat. It's a pain to get the vibration started for my 9 yr old. My daughter is a huge sensory child, I thought this would be great for her and there's nothing she likes about it. It is not well made. They need to figure out a better ball and the vibration on it.

title: It arrived crumbled
text: These are all individually packed, unfortunately mine were all broken because of poor packing. The smell is not strong enough and I didn't feel refreshed. I am a huge fan of shower and bath bombs but these aren't anything special

title: Not worth the price
text: I don't know why these are sold in packs of 10. You need a good month on collagen to really give a good review on it. First off, this is gross, I put it in elderberry water and it was just gross. It turned cloudy and it didn't taste good at all. 10 packets at $19.50. I can't tell you it's improved anything because in 10 days if anyone says it did something, I wouldn't believe them.

title: It's cute
text: This is cute. My 4 yr old was excited to get this. It's a bit big for her though. it doesn't stay on well and it's usually off within an hour of her sleeping and she's not a thrasher or huge mover. I do wish it was a tad thicker as well, I think its on the thin side. Hopefully next year she can use it.

title: They don't clean well
text: I put this in a load with some whites. My daughters socks were not clean. The smell is fine and it's not strong at all but I expect some decent cleaning regardless. I also tried these with some darks and it seemed fine but there's nothing I could see like my whites. My daughter just wore those socks for the first time so it should have come clean, especially with such a small load.

title: I notice no difference
text: I normally take LEAP before my OT workouts and got this to try after. I notice no difference in how I feel, I was hoping it would take the ache away but it doesn't. Also I highly recommend you take this with 16oz of water, not 8. I tried 8 and it was sickenly sweet. It tastes okay with 16 oz of water. I also find the instructions to be confusing. Take up to 3 times a day.... so am I supposed to take 3 times a day to get the best fat burning and muscle recovery? 30 sticks at 3 times a day at $34.99.... not a good deal, especially when there's been no change for me.

title: Yes it works
text: Ignore the reviewer that says they can't recommend this because it's 3%, how ridiculous. It says it right on the bottle. If it works, that is what your review should be about and you can always add the cost factor in. This did a great job of  cleaning my mat in the doorway. I also spray it on in my shower to help with discoloration. This isn't the best peroxide cleaner I've used but it's definitely not the worst and still better than most as it doesn't have that toxic smell. I like the gallon jug so I can pour it in my spray bottles and save some money. This is a solid product.

title: I received an open box
text: I am not happy to see an open box, as in there was a thank you sticker sealing this and it was cut open. Also the packing... why would you put paper straws in a thin bag? Some of the straws were crushed. I also received red straws with white stars, not white straws with red stars. Me and my girls used them and they get mushier quicker than other paper straws that we have. They might be fine for a quick drink but if left in liquid for a couple hours, they start to fall apart.

title: Not for the child who picks
text: I hate peeling polish! I misread read it and my 3 yr old is a picker. She picks non stop at her nail polish. I found this stuff all over my bed. I feel like this makes the child who picks even worse about picking! It's cute and fun set but it can be a little maddening. My 7 yr old doesn't love this set and didn't have much interest in it.

title: I can't drink it
text: The taste is awful. I borderline gagged when I drank this. I just can't drink it. I gave it to my father in law as he does crossfit... no word on how he liked it so that wasn't the best sign. He usually has something to say about protein drinks I've shared.

title: my girls like it
text: I got this for my 7 yr old daughter. We have some other silicone wash product and she likes this one. I don't think it suds up well just like the other silicone product but she likes the feel of it and it's soft. so far it's easy to keep clean and no residual smell. Both my 3 and 7 yr old have used it and I might consider buying another one for their bathroom

title: Okay gummies... a little too squishy for my liking... though they are probiotic...
text:
I thought I would see if I liked probiotic gummies, unfortunately I am not a big fan of these. The texture is too squishy, the flavour is mediocre, and there is a bit of an aftertaste... though at least they are not crystal coated so they are smoother to chew.

At about 25USD, they are very expensive for a 30day supply of a single strain of probiotic bacteria. I doubt I would try this brand again. I am rating this product three stars. As always, your mileage and preferences may vary...

title: Smaller netting and more compressed than the typical shower body scrubs...
text:
Smaller and better at scrubbing, I am hopeful that these may last longer than the usual ones. The mesh is tighter and seems to be stitched into a tighter ball than the others I have obtained. They are slightly more expensive, but worth it if they last longer. The loop also seems sturdier and allows them to hang better on my shower organizer hooks.

I am rating them four stars for now. As always, your mileage and preferences may vary...

title: Good sturdy product with a good sturdy case...
text:
We already had a similar set of these that we use for cleaning our dogs' teeth... we liked them so much, that we decided to get a set for the humans in the family. These are of similar quality, ie. good enough to last for years without any real damage. The case on this set is a bit sturdier and it holds the tools well.

I am rating this four stars, as it is a value at less than 13USD. As always, your mileage and preferences may vary...

title: I thought I would give collagen a try... instead I ended up with more sugar in my diet...
text:
While collagen is good for your skin, hair, and nails... this does not really contain enough to make any difference. Like some others, I ordered this to try without looking at its ingredients and percentages... which seems to be a must lately with supplements.

On top of this, this is one of the worst gummies I have ever tasted. While not coated in sugar like some, it is larger and flat and not as chewy or tasty as any of the others. While the artificial taste of others may not be ideal, it is preferable to all of the sugar and lack of taste in these.

I cannot recommend this as a supplement, but if you like weird consistency gummies and sugar you might like these. I am rating these one star. As always, your preferences and tastes may vary...

title: Inexpensive replacement Oral-B toothbrush heads...
text:
Like all third-party Oral-B replacement heads, these are much less expensive than the first-party branded ones. While the plastic heads and bristles do not feel as high-quality as most I have purchased recently and the price per head is not as cheap as most other brands on Amazon, these offer coloured heads and a smaller size. The coloured heads help to stop mix-ups of the devices and heads. The smaller size helps to get better coverage in the back of the mouth and are more comfortable for people with smaller mouths.

While I prefer the cross-action replacements more, these definitely have a niche for homes with a number of Oral-B users and for those with smaller mouths or difficulty reaching the far back of the mouth.

title: Inexpensive, multi-functional, and battery-free...
text:
I ordered this for my husband... and he loves it. It is light, comfortable to hold, and easy to charge and to change tips. It has all of the power and comfort (no pulled nose-hairs) of his previous favorite nose hair trimmer... and many added features.

The other tip is a hair shaving attachment and there is also an included charge cable and a brush to help clean the tips. The USB charge cable does make it convenient as there are so many USB chargers around the house. Charging is relatively fast, but normal use as a nose hair trimmer does not take much of the battery time.

Cleaning is easy, just remove the tip and rinse it... use the brush if there is anything stuck.

The big pluses are the power, easy of use, the built-in battery with charging, and the cost. It is only about 3 dollars more than I paid for my favorite name-brand one from 5yrs ago. We recommend this... and we will post any updates if issues are encountered.

title: Mild flavor, great potential health benefits
text:
I didn't know much about the potential benefit of noni fruit powder so I did some research. I found out that noni powder is "loaded with antioxidants, polysaccharides, amino acids, vitamins, and minerals." It is supposed to give you an immunity-boost. Who couldn't benefit from that? I added 1 tsp into my smoothie. The noni fruit powder had a mild flavor and blended well. I didn't notice any immediate, noticeable changes but if the information I researched is correct, it is beneficial in ways that may not be immediately apparent. I am going to continue using it for the potential health benefits. I have included the other information I found during my research below:

"Origins of Noni Powder
Noni is the Hawaiian name for the Morinda citrifolia plant, an evergreen shrub that probably originated in Southeast Asia and has spread throughout Oceania. It is believed that noni was a "canoe plant," so highly prized by Polynesian peoples that they brought it with them as they migrated in their canoes to new islands. As the white noni berry is pungent and bitter, it was only eaten during times of famine. However, Polynesians used the noni berry widely as a dye and to treat wounds, inflammations, infections and other ailments.

Health Benefits of Noni Powder
Noni is sometimes known as a superfood because of all its phytochemicals: antioxidants, polysaccharides, flavonoids, fatty acids, and catechins. It contains 17 different amino acids, as well as a significant amount of other nutrients.

1) Antioxidant Powerhouse: Organic noni powder is packed with protective antioxidants, flavonoids, and catechins. These compounds protect cells from oxidative damage caused by free radicals, which helps reduce the risk for premature aging and chronic conditions like heart disease.

2) Immunity-Boosting: Noni is a rich source of polysaccharides which support the body's natural defense system against illness and infection. A study at the University of Hawaii demonstrated that the polysaccharide content of noni juice improves the function of white blood cells in the immune system, which protect the body against diseases. A separate study at the university found that specific polysaccharides, known as noni-ppt, inhibited tumor growth and improved the life span of tumor-bearing mice.

3) Essential Nutrients: Organic noni powder is an excellent source of essential fatty acids and all 9 essential amino acids that our bodies do not produce naturally and must be obtained through diet. Essential fatty acids keep our cells functioning normally and essential amino acids are required to help our bodies make proteins. Additionally, noni powder is an excellent source of vitamin C, dietary fiber, iron, and potassium."

Hope this is helpful information to others!

title: Easy way to get your Vitamin C
text: I added this power into my morning green smoothie and I could barely taste it.  I like that it is an easy way to get Vitamin C without having to take a capsule and without making my smoothie taste chalky or weird tasting.  Great product!

title: Don't love the taste by itself, but it's got good ingredients & mixes well with green smoothies
text: This is a smooth green powder that comes in a ziploc sealed bag. It's easy to mix in water -- but I will say I have a hard time drinking it by itself. I had only that one morning and I didn't like the taste and had a bit of a stomach upset until I ate some solid food. It does mix very well with green smoothies (I usually do kale, half a banana, and maybe some vegan protein powder), and that's how I'll take it from now on.

title: A large supply of a good quality supplement for overall joint health - easy to swallow caplets that promise good benefits
text:
I'm a tall man and I work out pretty regularly, and I do occasionally have joints that complain. I had heard about the combination of glucosamine, chondroitin and MSM, and had been meaning to try it out when I had a chance to try a sample from Viva Labs for the purpose of testing and review. I've purchased a number of their other products and have always been happy with the quality, so I was happy to try these.

The caplets are easy to swallow. The recommended daily dosage is two caplets per day. I've been taking them for about a month now, and I haven't noticed any of the usual (but occasional) joint pain. I can't say for sure whether this is the reason, since I'm not able to compare the results with a placebo in a large double blind study. I do know that research supports an overall increase in joint health with these supplements and I'm fairly confident that Viva labs is a good source with a quality product. I've been happy with it so far, and will buy more when this bottle is finished. (There are 240 capsules, so this is a very generous 4 month supply.)

title: decent generic collagen pills
text: These are decent quality generic collagen pills.  I didnt have any trouble swallowing them, and there was no unpleasant burping.  I didn't really see any benefit from taking these pills tho.  Maybe it requires a few months of usage.

title: great for kitchen messes
text:
My wife has been using gloves when cleaning the kitchen for several years now, and has used all sort of rubber gloves in the process: disposable, "lifetime", thin, thick, different materials, etc.

She reports that these gloves work great. They are easy to put on, have good "traction" when dealing with slippery items, and clean up very well. They don't make her hands feel sweaty or funky.

Overall I would recommend them.

title: tastes just ok on its own, I only use it as a smoothie ingredient
text:
My wife sometimes makes me these ultra-green smoothies, with kale and berries and crazy stuff like that. This package of organic spirulina will likely last a long time, because we only use it in those smoothies..

By itself, it tastes more or less as awful as any other spirulina I've tried (and trust me, I've not tried them all). It is a microfine powder, but since its a plant, it will not dissolve and will leave residue anywhere and everywhere.

Overall I'd recommend it.

title: Very good taste, maybe amazing compared to other sports drinks
text:
I've used a lot of different sports drinks, and I can confirm that this vanilla flavor is better than most when mixed in the proper proportions.

As a protein drink, its very good. I like the fact that it is plant based, probably because I'm such a carnivore... I need more plant based options.

As far as value goes, at this time its $1.25 per serving, and I would like to think that this is based on the fact that it is plant based.

Overall I would recommend it as part of a rotation of protein powders. I don't like to use the same protein powder for months in a row, and this was a good alternative.

title: Very good vegetable protein option
text:
Vegetables actually have a fair amount of protein, and I'm happy to see this vegetarian option in the marketplace.

I do a lot of weightlifting, and the more variety of protein options there are, the better. I can't imagine using the same protein powder for years at a time. I'm always happy to try out a new option, and this offering from GENONE is very good.

Flavor: If you've never tried "workout chocolate before" then let me warn you it is not a candy bar. Nearly every brand of workout supplement that claims to be chocolate is like a semisweet chocolate powder. Have you ever tried cocoa powder? well, thats what this GENONE is like. Personally I am very happy that its NOT SWEET. I tried a "cookies and cream" protein drink recently and was really put off by the appalling sweetness. This GENONE chocolate on the other hand is not sweet and has a relatively decent aftertaste. BUT! If you are looking for the chocolate flavor usually associated with milkshakes made from real ice cream, you won't find it here! (or most anywhere else, for that matter).

It says it has 30 servings, and since I work out 6 days a week, that will last me for about 5 weeks.

Mixing it was fine, it says all you need to do is "shake well" and its nice to not NEED a blender ball to keep it mixed. But I did have to use a fork to stir it, particularly because I had to scrape the bottom and side of the container to get it all mixed in. Really, thats not necessary it was just me being a little OCD about "mixing it all". I felt it mixed well. I just mixed it with water which is how I mix all my shakes, particularly when I'm reviewing them.

Overall I would recommend this for a change of routine if you are looking for a new protein powder to try. It doesn't have EVERYTHING under the sun, like some protein drinks do, but maybe thats a good thing, right?

title: I like it but really some basic statistics would be good.
text:
its kind of like an insurance policy. you hope it works, but there isn't any way you can prove it.

One thing I was very curious about was the ability of the unit to control the air in a certain area. But I can't find anywhere on the website or the amazon product page where its clarified. At the moment I have two of these, one is in the laundry room and the other is in my son's bedroom, which is about 11x10 feet. One presumes that the unit can handle a bedroom, but as I said, its really not clear.

According to the manufacturer, the bulb loses 15% "efficiency" after 4000 hours (5.5 months of continuous use), and should be replaced. I have been waiting until mine burn out before replacing. Replacement bulbs are reasonable. At the time of this review, they are $8 each delivered from Amazon but $14 each from the manufacturer's website.

But lets go back to this 15% efficiency loss. What is this 15% of? Brightness? luminousness? UV rays (quantity)? UV strength (quality)? Germs killed? 15% suggests there is some number, some study, but all we get is 15%. If I'm running it in a small room, and if there is a loss of efficiency, won't all the germs get killed anyway, but just slower? too many unanswered questions.

Guardian's website says:
"UV-C light helps kill the DNA of germs reducing their ability to reproduce. UV-C light kills germs."

I found this a bit confusing. On the one hand, the UV light neuters the germs so they can't reproduce, which does help. The next sentence says that it kills germs. If it kills germs it doesn't seem relevant that it would neuter them.

While I like this unit, I feel that GG needs to provide a bit more depth to their information. They have a lot of grand, sweeping statements like "UV-C has been used to kill germs for 100 years", but very little information about the efficacy or efficiency of their own product.

Basically, they say "Our product must work, because science is happening inside. You can't doubt science." So I remove a star for the lack of information.

I do believe in the science, which is why it gets 4 stars, but I just can't give 5 stars for a "covered wagon medicine show" presentation depth.

Some extremely basic statistics really need to be added.

title: its a must if you nuke your gut with antibiotics
text:
I always cringe when I go to the doctor and they prescribe antibiotics. Because I know I'm basically dropping a nuclear bomb on my gut bacteria. Gut bacteria is proving to be the unsung hero of the human body. Having healthy gut bacteria doesn't just help you to digest food easier and be more regular, it can affect all kinds of things including your energy level and mental health.

This renew life restore probiotic is really a must after you finish your regimen of antibiotics, or, you can even start before your last day and get a jump start on it. With 10 billion CFUs it will really help speed up your recovery.

This was easy to swallow and didn't provide any adverse side effects. I would definitely grab some the next time you have to wipe out the beneficial civilization thats helping you to digest and metabolize your food.

I would recommend these, they seem as good as any other probiotic I've tried.

title: dosage is 3 pills
text:

The product seems to be decent even though the listing is not.

title: taste is good but very low in C & D

Vitamin E is fat soluble so the excess doesn't flush out, where vitamin C is water soluble so any excess will flush out of your system so I have a real problem with this vitamin line up and I won't be getting these again. I should have looked more closely.

text: They only have a file on one side (I feel they should be double sided) these are great for a finish filing to make your nails smooth, it is not abrasive enough to file the nails down to another length but to do the final filing to make the edges smooth, they work great for that. You can use them to make the top of your nails shiny but be careful with that or you may take too much off the nail and make it too thin. The size is good for carrying with you can easily fit into a pocket or purse.

title: Hard to review but seem to be of good quality
text: These seem to be of good quality but it is hard to tell for sure how potent this is, I haven't had any problems with taking them but they seem to be pretty much the same as the other probiotics I have been taking. I have not noticed a difference and don't really know if I should since I take these on a regular basis.

title: Too tight
text: I’ve had the opportunity to test quite a few face masks.  This one would be near the bottom of my list.  Let’s start with the good.  It is very lightweight.  It has a nice formed foam and doesn’t rub on my eyelashes.  It comes with a cooling gel pad.  There are several issues as far as I see it.  First and most important, it doesn’t fit well.  I have it set to the very end of the Velcro and it is still tight on my head.  I do not particularly have a large head.  As a matter of fact, I can wear some youth baseball caps set on the largest setting.  This elastic tugs far too much to be comfortable.  The next issue is that this thing has a cord that isn’t much longer than 3.5 feet.  That means you have to be close to your power source.  You can use a usb battery but they are expensive if you don’t already have one.  With regard to the heat, this mask on the hottest setting just got lightly warm.  Most of the heat seemed to be in the raised areas where the eyes go and not the part that touches your skin.  It means that it has to heat up the air between you and the eye area in order for you to feel the warmth.  It’s just not warm enough for me.  Since the cord has to be attached to the mask via magnet, with such a a short cord, basically I have to sit perfectly still.  No way I could actually wear this to sleep in unless I found a way to mount the usb battery near my head.

title: Band is kind of short
text: This heats up as expected.  The mask isnt too big and gives your nose room without causing pressure on the bridge.  I have a small to average size head, my husband’s, mothers and father’s is a bit bigger.  But I have to open the band almost all the way on the Velcro.  If you have a big head, and don’t like to have the band tight on your head (it is made of elastic) then this may not be the mask for you.  On the plus side, the cord is lightweight but I Don’t feel like it is really long enough.

title: Nicest foot soak I’ve ever seen
text: Compresses down to save space.  Has a remote control.  Heats the water and massages the feet.  Deep enough to get your ankles and part of your calf in too.  Can cover the water and reuse if you really want to.  This one is quite nice.

title: They are ok.
text: These gummies were quite soft but not sticky.  They have a fruit flavor but somewhat of a pasty doughy taste.  They are ok but the flavor doesn’t beat out my regular brand.

title: Great price for a steamer
text: This steamer has a similar footprint to my former steamer - it take up substantial counter space.  However it really cranks out the steam.  This is less than half of the price of my old steamer.  What you get for the price is a really good deal.

title: Overall good set
text:
[[VIDEOID:49a100ccd749c31c31003b444886594a]] The set is nice. The flosser comes with several tips. The brush comes with several heads. The two issues I have are related to the flosser. First you can’t open the reservoir other than the small hole in the back. This makes it a lot harder to get completely empty and air dry or clean. The other is the tube that sucks up the water is stationary. This means you have to contort yourself to get the last of the water out by leaning the unit a particular angle. I have another that the tube is weighted and it rocks from side
To side depending on which way you need to lean the unit while reaching your teeth. Overall this is a decent set. If you need both you might save a few dollars buying a set. Standard replacement brushes can be used on this.

title: There are better products out there
text: If you look at my photo you can’t even tell which side I straightened.  I have used straighteners before and they have taken the frizz out of my hair.  This one not only didn’t really straighten, it didnt help much with my frizz.  Also my hair was brushed completely with my normal brush first.  However this brush caught In and pulled hair out.  It doesn’t perform like a brush helping any tangles out of your hair.  I used it on the highest setting and I was disappointed with this product.  I suggest you could find a better product elsewhere.  It comes with a glove to help prevent burning but my larger had (not fat) it barely fit.  My girlfriend’s hand it fit fine.  It also comes with a nice carry bag.  Overall, I’m not a fan.

title: Really exfoliating
text: Natural and soft but hard and scrubs off my dead skin

title: Really sweet and yummy
text: Love the packaging, it's a really creamy gummy and I love that it has so many different vitamins and supplements to keep me healthy. Would make a great gift.

title: Makes a perfect gift!
text: Bath bombs are very creamy and fizzy. Love the scent and colors. Very fragrant and each have their own little unique pattern. Love!

title: Okay cling wrap, very flimsy container
text: The cardboard is super thin and collapses completely gripping it with one hand. The cling wrap itself is alright, just thicker than I thought it would be. Takes some force to cut it with the little zip tool they give you.

title: Smell so relaxing and sweet
text: Love the different colors in these bath bombs. Makes me feel so relaxed when bathing. They fizz up really nicely and feel velvet soft and smooth in the water. Comes in giftable packaging!

title: Suction is very weak
text: This was not a very good suction tool. I firmly put it over the bite and then pulled the little piece upwards and it’s a very weak suction. Barely feel anything and didn’t do much to my bites.

title: No more embarrassment!
text: This is a great product and it works great. Just a little spritz and you can’t even tell I went. Smells really good, like a floral garden. The bathroom doesn’t smell like a perfume department though, it’s subtle.

title: Simple to use
text: This is handy to keep around my neck when power washing, cutting the grass, weed whacking, etc. the rope doesn’t cut my skin it’s actually pretty silky soft. The rubber stays into my ear fine. Good for reuse if you clean them.

title: So fizzy and bright colors!
text: Lovely set of bath bombs with fun little toys. They all are so fragrant and smell sweet. The colors are bright and make bath time fun!

title: Really nice floss threader with carrying case
text: The carrying case is very secure and closes tightly. No spillage at all. Very good floss threaders too.

title: Smells so fragrant
text: These bath bombs are a nice size and they’re heavily scented. They’re fizzy and the colors change the color of the bath water. I like that they’re in a nice gift worthy packaging as well.

title: Has a lot in a little bag!
text: This is perfect to keep in the car or desk or just in your purse. It has a lot of different items which are useful for everyday cuts and scrapes. The items are handy and pretty good quality. Comes in a red first aid bag.

title: Great price for $10
text: You can use this wet or dry. I prefer dry. I use the soft bristle side on my arms and legs and back to help relieve my stress and promote blood circulation. The rubber side I use to massage and press into sore muscle spots. Effective and simple. Wooden handle is nice, no splinters.

title: Super cute and whimsical
text: This mask fits me perfectly. So cute and soft. It’s actually made pretty well, the ears are 3D and the design is sewn onto the mask. There’s a string in the back that is secure on my head. Great for naps!

title: Quality eyelash curler
text: Very strong and easy to use. Beautiful design with a velvet pouch. The brush is nice to comb out the mascara too.

title: Tasty!
text: These gummies are very tasty and help me stay regular and on track with my fitness goals. They’re squishy and gummy, taste sweet like candy. Kind of like a treat for me! Very tasty.

text: These bath bombs are very heavy and very large. Almost like giant oranges to me. They each have their own individual scent and color. The water changes to whatever color the bath bomb is. Very fizzy and very fragrant. Skin feels moisturized and soft after using. Beautiful gift set to yourself or loved ones. Highly recommend, especially for under $25!

title: Tastes great and helps me stay alert!
text: These gummies taste kind of like strawberry and they’re very sweet. I use to put 1/2 tsp of apple cider vinegar in my water to help me lose weight and it has helped a lot but it tastes awful. These gummies have solved that plus more with the green tea. I’ve noticed I’m more alert after taking this. Really happy with this product!

title: Great for smaller feet
text:
This is a good massager for people with smaller feet. I’m a woman that wears size 8. This fit me perfectly. My dad is wears a 9.5 could not fit his foot in the machine. Those with wider feet would probably have problems with this. So it’s not meant for everyone’s feet.

The bottom base is plastic so I was surprised to see how cheap the quality was. The top grey part is a fabric like material. It has to be plugged in during use.

It’s pretty long and annoying. It squeaks and I can hear the air pressure go off and the plastic pins inside go up and down. The massager parts inside are plastic. For $100, I expected more. I can feel the pins on my heel and toes but I couldn’t feel the rotating balls in the middle of my foot.

There’s a heat setting, speed setting, and air compression setting. It did massage my feet, but I don’t think the massage benefitted my feet and it didn’t make a difference. Not a very strong massage at all but it was okay.

title: Beautiful and powerful
text: This dries my hair super fast. It’s hot, cold, or medium. Has different speeds too. It’s beautiful on the outside and works wonderfully. Very happy with this!!

title: Very well made and a must have for dry feet
text: Finally no more filing by hand! This WORKS. It’s basically a drill on steroids for your feet. It’s tough sandpaper that shaved away really dry cracker feet and calluses into smooth feet. Very happy with this, works in seconds!!

title: Portable WaterPik, Sonic Care Clone
text:
--Toothbrush

Toothbrush is as good as Sonic Care. Way better than manual toothbrush, get that dentist feeling clean if you’ve never used it before.

May have less options on strength and pulse variety depending on what version of Sonic Care you have.

Uses same head attachment as Sonic Care. Glad there’s no propriety brush head. Very easy to purchase more when you run out.

Charges on bottom via USB Type C. Cannot stand straight when charging. Must pull out rubber water resistant cover with pen or coin, and lay it on it’s side to charge.

--Water Flosser

Water flosser is like a portable WaterPik, but is bulky and not as natural to use. The orthodontic and tongue cleaner tips are a very nice addition.

Water pressure is a bit stronger than standard WaterPik head due to the small opening. Recommend you put it on Soft setting first

Head attachment is a bit loose compared to WaterPik. Wobbles when you touch it slightly.

Propriety head and charger. Have no idea why they didn’t go for USB Type C like for the toothbrush

Overall, very decent bundle. Toothbrush is very similar to Sonic Care brand but has odd charging method. Water flosser a bit strong, and must use propriety changing cable (careful not to lose it)

title: Not Responsive, No tactile feedback
text:
Has touch sensitive buttons. Sometimes not responsive, or will not register inputs correctly and will do it's own thing

Sounds recording selections are very odd. Some tracks have duel tracks going at the same time and does not really meld well together.

There should have been more quality control on this product. Would not recommend

title: Wall Powered, Proprietary Plug
text:
Don't like how it's not battery powered. Seems odd seeing that's the trend these days.

Also has a proprietary wall plug. Plug is small so powerbrick/strip friendly at the ends.

Buttons are flush and not tactile. Can get some miss presses.

Some features require you to short press and hold

No individualized buttons for specific sound. Have to cycle through genre of sounds.

Has a great variety of sounds totaling 32 sounds

No visual indicator for the sounds selection, volume loop around, must play by ear.

I like how the speaker is facing upward and not on the bottom of the device

Muted light. Great night light, but not for reading

title: Extremely Compact
text:
Best to familiarize yourself with contents inside before an emergency happens so you don't skiffle around.

Everything is tightly packed, may be difficult to get some items without dumping it all out (especially in a panic).

Quality of items inside is decent. Not the best quality, but gets the job done until a replacement is needed.

Has a belt pass-through for those who like to carry on at all times

title: Line them up
text:
Double security. Will not slip out when shaken.

Do need to line up dot with hole to secure. if you slide in wrong way it will not push down all the way

Finger grove very ergonomic

Has raised dot matrix plastic bumps for blind, so you know which way is up

title: Vaseline clone?
text:
Very similar to Vaseline, but a little bit less moisture/oily.

When applied it works the same, but doesn't' last as long

Better as lip balm than large skin surface areas

Fragrance of Petroleum Jelly is more pronounced

Container is not transparent, not able to tell how much you have left from outward appearance

title: Soft Touch Buttons
text:
Don't like the soft touch buttons on this device. There no tactile feedback when using

Aside from that works as intended.

Sounds are good quality. Good selection

Must press the play button to activate the sounds. Don't get why you can't just press the sound option directly to turn it on. Must use two button press to activate

There is a timer option for 15,30,60,90 and 120min signaled by Asian Female AI voice with broken English.

Volume selection doesn't have same feature and have to play by ear. When reach max volume it does have a beep sound

Night light works well. Able to cycle through several colors.

I like how it uses USB plug instead of a wall outlet. Plug that goes into device is propriety though. Wished it was type C to type C to be more modernized.

Also would be great if it was battery powered. Seeing it's USB out, able to plug it into a power bank

title: Uneven Surface
text:
Beads insides are uneven. Feel unbalanced when wearing. Very bottom heavy

Has some weight to it to help with those who toss and turn a lot when sleeping. Still find myself taking it off subconsciously overnight

Mask is flat so can rub against eye lid

Product placement is large and in your face

Comes with nice clinch bag. Opening is very large and spacious, easy to slip store (no need to cram in)

title: Tethered to wall
text:
First thing to mention is that I think the controls should be inverted: very odd position from wall plug to mat itself. Find myself having the controls upside down most of the time. Not sure if it's meant for other person to control for you?

Works well, heats up fast.

Operation is very simple: on/off button, and heat button. Will auto turn off in 1.5 hours, no option to set specific time (30, 60,90,120mins for example)

title: Chewer's Paradise
text:

Has two ways to dispense: 1 or 2 at a time or in bulk (if you want friends/family to hand pick the one they want off your hands)

No wrapper, may leave garbage or whatever you spit the gum in sticky.

Overall, very good gum. Long lasting and great for those who like to chew their gum for extended amounts of time

title: Very Concentrated
text:
A little (pinch) goes a long way, as the flavor is very strong even for the scoop it comes with. In fact it overpowers a fruit smoothie with even half a scoop

Has a very medicinal, bitter taste to it

Has a lot of good nutritional properties associated with it as it's considered a super food.

Good if you want Ashwagandha Root Powder in bulk vs pill/capsules

Comes in a re-sealable bag which is nice. Also transparent, so you know how much is left without opening up the bag

Overall, good health benefits. Just know it's hard to go down.

title: Good size loofah
text:
These are nice loofahs! I look for a few things when purchasing loofahs:
1. Size (I like larger loofahs)
2. Durability (will the loofah hold up without unwinding)
3. Texture (does it feel like it's cleaning me)
4. Amount (the more loofahs in the pack, the better!)
These meet all my requirements. I love that it's a 4 pack so you don't have to go back to the store every time you need to replace your loofah (which you should do on a regular basis) They will last me a while and seem well built. If anything changes I'll update this review.

title: Works wonderfully, clean nose!
text: This works amazingly well. SO easy to use. Just boil water( so it’s clean) let it cool, put a packet of the solution into the bottle and fill it with the water. Look straight into the mirror and tip the nozzle into your nostril with your breath held(so it doesn’t go down your throat) the solution naturally comes out the other nostril. It doesn’t taste like anything other than maybe a slightly salty water.  Cleans you out and helps with allergies and post nasal drip. I used it and was amazed at how easy it was and how clean my sinuses felt afterwards. Really great to have on hand and use a couple times with week. I definitely will continue using it and recommend if anyone needs a Neti pot type thing.

title: Ineffective
text: Okay, so I love that this product is all natural, but I hate that it doesn’t work! The nutritional facts are based on one scoop, but after placing said scoop into my coffee nothing had changed in terms of flavor. Normally with sugar alternatives you put much less than normal sugar but with this you have to put so much more. The fact is, I don’t like having to put THAT much stuff into my coffee. It took 2 scoops and some to get any sweetness at all. When I tasted the powder on my fingers, it literally just tastes like powder. Not sweet at all unless you REALLY try to find the sweetness. It’s a vegan alternative to sugar, but I think there might be better alternatives for vegans that have much more sweetness.
