If you were to use this is baking, your food wouldn’t end up being sweet at all (if the coffee is any indicator.) I didn’t like it.

title: Helps regulate gut
text: So good for daily use making the gut healthy and making bathrooms more regular. Easy to take and no gross aftertaste.

title: No suction
text: Idk if mine are defective or what but they have little to no suction. I have used other brands before and these just don't work :(

title: Good for you guys kids
text: This toothpaste is good for young kids since it is Floride free. Taste was pretty good but on the expensive side. There are other Floride free option out there much cheaper so probably won't repurchase.

title: Great bang for your buck
text: This pack is such a great deal. You will never need another order or Vaseline for years! I use this for everything. Works wonders on your elbows, feet, knees, anywhere that is dry. You even can use in lips at night and will wake up with the softest lips. Highly recommend for cuticle softening as well as for cracked heels. Such a great buy and love that there is no scent.

title: Defective product
text: I was very excited about this but unfortunately it is defective. Looks like it got melted in production or something. The small indent isn't too bad but the large one shown in pic on the lft lets the pills fall right out. Disappointed.

title: Kids use these on the daily
text: With masks being worn every time we go out my kids NEED these as well have yet to find masks small enough for them. Mt 2 yr old wears it on the tightest setting and my 4 yr old wears it on the middle setting. Super cute and durable these were a great buy and I highly recommend 👌

title: Too oily
text: This essential oil is so wonderful. I love the smell and even though it's a pretty good size bottle, only a few drops add plenty of smell. Good quality but did find it a little overly oily.

title: Beautiful soft colors
text: We ended up using tbese for my daughter's unicorn birthday party. The volors are a beautiful self pastel and had a nice variety. The balloons lasted nicely and were rather easy to blow up once stretch a time or two. Great value and would purchase again.

title: Perfect natural health boost
text: These easy to swallow pills are a great boost to any immune system. I have been taking one a day with my daily multivitamin and they go fine together. Good natural heath boost and price point.

title: Not a fan
text: I don't think this did anything for me. It's honestly cool and comes with the charger. Design is nice but I really saw no differences in my skin.

title: These work
text: These tests work great. They are easy to read and use and overall a great buy. I would highly recommend this brand.

title: Standard Vaseline
text: Good product and works well. Very moisturizing and smooths skin out. Great hydrate as it is occlusive and holds moisture in. Took off a star because it arrives leaking so I’m missing about 1/4 of the container. Great overall product with no smell!

title: Good knee support
text: Supports the knee well. Slips a little bit when you go from sitting to standing position a lot. Good for short period use. Easy to put on and adjust with 3 straps.

title: Great stuff!! Just pricey...
text:
I really like this! I've never been a broth sipping type person before now but I'm getting into it. I've recently become keto and am very satisfied with the change. I feel fantastic! I've had a very carby lifestyle for so long and found out I'm celiac and had no idea! Just a little over a month and I'm feeling like a new person! No more aches and pains! Unless I get glutened but I try to keep that from happening and I've lost 9lb! This bone broth has actually helped too! I've been trying to add collagen in my diet and get my body back to running smoothly from all the damage that's been done from gluten. I can't believe the difference in my hair and nails! I really didn't think anything would be that noticeable at least not this quickly but wow! I'm a believer!
This broth taste great! I do have to add a little sea salt to mine as I'm a salty person! :-) I've been trying to do intermittent fasting but I don't know if it's for me. On days I can't get to lunch, which honestly is most, haha I drink a serving of this broth! It really saves me! It's 90 calories and apparently that would take me out of the fasting BUT it's worked! I'm feeling food and losing weight so whatever I'm doing is working!
I really do like this and I don't drink it everyday! I MAY look for another brand that's not quite so pricey but I may end up coming back to this. I really do like it and it seems quality! Some things are just worth the extra bucks!

title: Good but expensive!
text:
My mom is 85yrs old and I've been suggesting she drink collagen for a while and she decided she would try it. She tried these samples and LOVES it! She said they dissolve fairly well. She's used to using a powder creamer and this takes a little longer she said it's worth it. No flavor but adds a bit of creaminess. She still uses her powder creamer but only about half. She adds her sugar as usual and says it's great! She even put a pack in her tea last night! I've used a lot of brands of collagen and this seems like a good quality.
My issue the price! At $2.78 a pack I just can't justify that! I've had some really good quality that's less than $2.00 an individual pack so I personally will not be purchasing this. I would have personally given this 3 stars just because I think the price is just too high but I gave it a 4 because my mom loves it so much she may be buying this brand. She's one that when she finds something she likes she's not willing to shop around.

title: Great ingredients just wish there was a little more....
text:
Glad to see potassium was in there but I wish it there was a bit more. Also there needs to be magnesium. I have some powdered and I add it to mine but honestly that's a deal breaker for me. What else is a deal breaker is the dextrose. I'd prefer to not have any sugar since I'm keto and 5g is a lot when I'm not getting all the stuff I want in this.

Now for pros...
The Zinc is great! 25mg is a very good amount! Vit C is OK, not bad compared to some I've seen but it could be a bit higher too. Vit D is a nice amount.

More on the cons. I'd like to have seen some B vitamins in there. The elderberry is nice for immunity but 50mg is sooo low. That's almost nothing. Personally I'd have preferred to skip the elderberry and add some B vitamins! This product is advertising it's an electrolyte drink and have the sodium and chloride for it but doesn't have B vitamins. Also the taste is.... OK at best. For 5g of sugar I would have expected this to taste great! I personally don't like the taste.
All in all I don't feel this is a bad product by any means BUT I think it could be better and for this cost it SHOULD be better!

title: Tiny pill!
text: LOVE how tiny this is!! My 8 yr can take this no problem and I LOVE how it has coconut oil in it to help with absorption. I've had to be very mindful when taking my other D3's and make sure I'm taking them with a higher fat meal so I will absorb more but there's no worrying with this one. AND it's only one pill! It's 5000IU too!! That's a great amount! I don't take this everyday though since it is so much. I try to go outside and get D that way but if I can't or if I feel sickness coming I take this. It's a great price too! This is 2 months for more for me. It says to take it morning AND night but if you don't have a deficiency I personally wouldn't recommend that. I am NOT a Dr or even a nurse but I do research a lot and too much D can be a bad thing so research your stuff before you go taking a whole bunch of anything. D is not water soluble and it's like Vit C where you just urinate out what your body doesn't use. You can build up D in the system which can cause unwanted side effects and possibly an ER visit. Only throwing this out there since D is like the "thing" right now. It IS great but be responsible! :-)

title: I really like this brand!
text:
I've been using cloth pads for years!! I have tampons and disposables for when I go out and will be gone a while just purely out of convenience but I'm a stay at home mom and homeschooler of 2 so I'm at home a lot!! ANY cloth pads are sooo much softer than disposable and I try to limit exposure to as much chemicals as possible. I DO find for me that when I walk a lot the pad scoots to my backside and I need to pull it up ever so often. That being said it may be the way I walk because it's all cloth pads, not just these. That's also why I don't wear them places like grocery stores because I can't just stick my hands down my pants to tug on it while I'm walking around a store.
These are fairly absorbent but I have noticed I need to change them more often during my heavy time than some of my other brands. I still really like these and especially for the price you can't beat it!! I bought some handmade ones on etsy one time and they were $15 EACH! This is a MUCH better deal honestly!

title: I don't care for the material
text: I don't like the feel of silicone. It's texture issue for me.  They pick up all kinds of dirt and hold it. This isn't easy to clean to me and while it's easy to carry and fits in your pocket it's gross when you pull it out. I don't like how it fits on my nose either. I have others I like better and I will just wear those. These are cute and I like the colors just not the material.

title: So SOFT!!
text: I LOVE these!! I knew someone who made homemade pads years ago and started using them then and boy I haven't went back!! I DO use disposables for when I'll be out all day or on vacation just because I don't want to bother rinsing and cleaning these while I'm out but they feel SOOO soft!! The lady doesn't make them anymore and I've about worn out the ones I had and when I saw these available I jumped at the opportunity to review them! They are super soft and wash up well. I LOVE that they are dark on the side that needs to be dark because of stains and they seem to stay put pretty well. The little bag is really nice and would be great to take with you to carry clean ones and put the used ones in. I've washed them all 3 times already and they still look brand new. I really like this brand and will continue to use these and purchase more.

title: Maybe it's good?
text: I didn't notice any difference on how I feel with this. It give a smoothie a bright color which is pretty but stains. The taste is blah but mixed with enough stuff it's OK. I don't think i would bother purchasing again since I don't feel like it's making my an healthier and it's not cheap.

title: Taste good!
text: I was surprised at the odd texture. At least for toohtpaste anyway. This does NOT foam at all. I don't like SLS but some toothpastes without it still have a foaming agent but this doesn't. I prefer the foam only because it's what I'm used to but overall I like this product. Has a fresh taste that's good. I don't feel that it makes my mouth feel AS clean or minty as some others but I love the ingredient list on this.

title: seems accurate
text: This item is easy to set up.  It's comfortable to wear.  I got generally accurate readings based on what I get in my doctor's office and what I get on my wrist monitor.  I like that it's battery operated as it's awkward to have to take reading near a wall plug.

title: One of the better sound machines I've used
text: This sound machine functions on many levels.  It's pretty, there's that.  It' is a night light with many color options.  It plays soothing nighttime sounds to help put you to sleep.  There's rain, fire, meditation, ocean and fan.  You can easily control the sound level.  This unit also offers a bluetooth option to play your own sourced material (music, audiobooks, etc.).  I have not used this function so I can't comment but judging by the built in sounds I'd assume you get decent quality.  This would make a great gift.

title: Precision tool for seniors
text: This is not a Dollar Store grabber. It's a precision and high quality tool. It folds for easy storage. The is wide enough to get larger items off the high shelves but delicate enough to easily get a pencil from under the couch. The tip is also magnet which is a great bonus. I've used many grabbers in my day but this is, by far, the best.

title: Dependable
text:
I’ve been using a wrist monitor for many years, mainly because the upper arm monitors can be so bulky and awkward to use. This Antrolife machine is so easy and there’s only one tube which makes it perfect. Actually, my doctor said he’d prefer if I used an upper arm machine.

I like that the cuff is large enough for me. There is no inconvenient power cord to worry about. Needing to find a place to sit close enough to a wall plug always annoyed me with previous models. Not so with this one. A Battery, USB-C connection, and soft storage/travel bag are all included in the package.

The readout is a large LED and backlit module. I find I can depend on the accuracy.

title: Dependable
text:
I’ve been using a wrist monitor for many years, mainly because the upper arm monitors can be so bulky and awkward to use. This Antrolife machine is so easy and there’s only one tube which makes it perfect. Actually, my doctor said he’d prefer if I used an upper arm machine.

I like that the cuff is large enough for me. There is no inconvenient power cord to worry about. Needing to find a place to sit close enough to a wall plug always annoyed me with previous models. Not so with this one. A Battery, USB-C connection, and soft storage/travel bag are all included in the package.

The readout is a large LED and backlit module. I find I can depend on the accuracy.

title: quick and efficient
text: This shaver is specifically designed for guys who want to go bald or stay that way.  You can quicky and neatly get a close head shave via the multiple shavers positioned in a concave configuration.  It can be used either wet or dry.  It comes in a case with several accessories.  The unit charges quickly and the charge lasts through many shaves.

title: Blossom scent is a pleasant light floral
text:
This is a nice pleasant cover-up spray for lingering odors in the bathroom. You're certainly free to use anywhere that has lingering smells. I like that you get two bottles in this set. One for home and one for take-along. No need to offend friends or co-workers.

I've used the Blossom and the Lotus and find them both pleasant. They are not as strong as Poo-Pourri but they seem to get the job done. For me, the Lotus variety is the stronger of the two. It has a more pronounced and sweeter smell. The Blossom is more a background floral scent. They're different but I like them both.

One thing worth mentioning - from the photo in the ad copy I thought the set had two dispencing actions - one aerosol and the other pump. The photo only depicts the product with the cap on and the cap off.

title: I use at night for a peaceful sleep
text: Lovely oil that is lightly scented.  It absorbs quickly leaving a pleasant aroma.  I've been using it before bedtime and I think it leads to a more restful sleep.  I like that it has a metal roller ball instead of the usual plastic.  I'm not very well versed in essential oils and the subtle differences between various types.  I do know that I very much like these MONQ blends.

title: I like to use prior to bedtime
text: Lovely oil that is lightly scented.  It absorbs quickly leaving a pleasant aroma.  I've been using it before bedtime and I think it leads to a more restful sleep.  I like that it has a metal roller ball instead of the usual plastic.  I'm not very well versed in essential oils and the subtle differences between various types.  I do know that I very much like these MONQ blends.

title: Works for many skin problems
text: I've been seeing suction cleaners in so many ads lately that I thought I'd try this for myself.  This model is well designed to fit the hand comfortably.  The instructions were easy to follow.  There are many multiple-sized caps so you should find the one that's right for your condition.  Overall it delivers on all its claims.

title: Nice to have on hand
text: This is a good scrubby set to have on hand for those  nasty pot bottoms.  I like to have my pots and pans hanging out in plain sight which meals that I'm always scraping and scouring.  This little set of sponges and scrubbers both are helpful for those burned on bits.  With a squirt of Ajax or Comet powder and then a little elbow grease it's easy to keep those pot bottoms looking good enough to show off.

title: Cranberry and turmeric
text: I've always been prone to UTI's so have been steadfast in my pursuit of OTC products that include cranberry and turmeric.  It also has Tart Cherry with I also find helpful  This Best Earth product has just that.  For me it only take a small dose but on a regular basis to keep my problem under control.  I find the price point a little spendy for me to use regularly but they do seem to do the job.

title: Works for me
text: For some people the addition of apple cider vinegar works for that acid reflux you get after you go to bed.  I've had great luck with this addition.  I started by drinking a teaspoon of the vinegar mixed in a glass of water and found it unpalatable but necessary.  These pills take the nastiness out of the process.  I take one pill between dinner and bedtime and so far it works like a charm.

title: For children AND adults
text: This can be a godsend when you're sick and losing fluids.  The medical community always says to "stay hydrated" but sometimes this is easier said than done.  This powder mixes easily with fluids and replaces the minerals needed to help you feel better.  This is a perfect product to keep around for flu season.

title: Nice quality
text: This is an excellent neck support travel pillow for planes, trains or (the shotgun seat) in an automobile.  I had to look twice at the price point for this quality memory foam construction pillow - what a deal!  I like that the cover zips off for laundering but must admit that I had a little bit of trouble getting it back in - it has a nylon zip so I didn't want to push too hard to dislodge it.  Other than that one critique I really like this pillow.  It's firm, comfortable and if you choose the bright red color you won't be leaving it behind on the seat.

title: Excellent product!
text:
I've been using Maca root products for years. Mostly in baking quick breads as it not only provides additional nutrition but also produces baked products with better texture and flavor. The fiber components are beneficial and more effective than other products and in smaller amounts.
This is especially noticeable when combined with fruits and vegetables in baking, banana bread, pumpkin bread, zucchini and carrot breads or cakes as well as both fresh and dried fruits. Blueberry pancakes with a quarter cup of Maca powder substituted for 1/4 cup of the dry ingredients is an excellent example. Same with waffles which retain their crunch longer with the addition of the Maca powder.

title: Excellent supplement
text:
I believe this has improved my cardiac response. I have felt less fatigue during the past two weeks and actually have been feeling better each day.
I was tiring by midday during the previous month or so, since I stopped taking a previous product because of some stomach upset.
I have had none of those symptoms with this product and my blood pressure has been more stable than it was.

title: Great flavor, very effective
text:
These are excellent in both taste and effectiveness. I was twice exposed to people with the flu and I doubled up on these and nary a sniffle.
In fact, my upper respiratory system feels better than it has for years during a rather wet winter.

title: Excellent facial tissues with a soothing lotion.
text:
These Kleenex LOTION tissues are very soft, yet tough and do not irritate sensitive skin with rrepetitive use.
I have had some problems with nasal allergies during the past few weeks and these tissues have been so much better than others. There is practically no scent and they do not shred or tear easily.
The boxes are attractive and fit in spaces that rectangular boxes do not.

title: Flavor is not good!  Metallic taste
text:
The drink is just okay and I can consume it with some foods but with others it makes them taste odd and ruins my meal
There is a metallic taste that is unpleasant, especially with cruciferous vegetables. In particular, Brussels sprouts, broccoli, and cauliflower. Also green beans almondine - although I don't know if it was the vegetable or the rather complex sauce that bothered me.
I tried drinking a can AFTER a meal and was only able to consume about half before that metallic flavor rrejpelled me. It reminded of the taste the exposed base metal of a silver-plated spoon where the silver has worn away.

title: Much easier to use than capsules.
text:
I have wanted to use Gardenia Cambogia extract but in the capsules there is always some additive which I can’t take because of allergies.
This “Organic, Vegan, Gluten-Free & Non-GMO is ideal for adding to my smoothies.
The product is easy to incorporate into my diet plan and I have had no problems with it.
This powder is much more versatile than capsules.

title: Hair loss has stopped.
text:
I have been using this for ten days and have noticed that my hair brush has only a few hairs in it after vigorous brushing.
I am an 80-year-old female and have noticed more than usual hair loss for the past year or so. I have tried several products with varied results, some moderate success but not like this.
There was no change for the first few days - five or so, but during the past five days the change is quite remarkable. I also have a lot of tiny new growth hairs at my somewhat receding hairline that I can feel with my fingertips, like "stubble" in areas that have had only some isolated hairs for years. When young I had a distinct "widow's peak" which had almost disappeared. If this growth continues, I will again have one. My hair is now white and the new growth stubble is too fine to show on photos but I include a photo from years ago and one I just took. When the hair is longer and more visible, I will edit this review with another photo.

title: It’s Okay. Spray Snow or Window Clings Are Better
text: Has a strong chemical smell. Looks watery when going on but turns frosty as it dries. Looks more realistic when you layer the sprays. One spritz doesn’t do it. Has to be reapplied often when there’s humidity / condensation. Leaves residue when it melts. I prefer spray on snow over this. Much easier to apply and remove.

title: Visible Stubble
text:
1) The coverage area is too small. It would be faster to actually run a bath, get in, and manually shave my legs.
2) after going over shin area on legs more than once, there’s still visible stubble up close.
3) it doesn’t grab course hair very well, and is even worse on short stubble. There’s no way you could have a clean bikini area.
4) the shape is just awkward. I think the idea was to make it ergonomically comfortable but it’s all wrong.
5) for the price, invest a little more for a name brand shaver, or one with a lot more reviews.

title: Only Three Stars Due To Price
text: This is a good quality peroxide cleaner ready to use out of the bottle. I’ve used it on my floors, using very little elbow grease to clean the grout. My tile just shines. I’ve also used it to wash my windows on the outside. It really works great. The only trouble I have is the price. There are other quality peroxide cleaners on the market that you can get at a fraction of the price. Five star product, but the price kills it for me.

title: Especially Useful When Exercising
text: This mouth bracket and mask loop extenders kit is very useful. The extenders are made of plastic, which I don’t find as flexible as the silicone mask extenders. However, they still work fine with several divots to size for your specific needs. What I like most is the mouth bracket. It fits comfortably over your nose and mouth, and then the mask is placed over it to hold in place. What I find most useful about the mouth bracket is when I’m biking, running or doing any exercising outside, it helps immensely with an elevated breathing pattern and allows for unrestricted airflow.  There are several pieces included in this kit which makes it helpful to put in purses, backpacks, or just carry in the car with you.

title: Great Blend Of Scents
text: Quality thick oil bottled in a roll-on. Can be applied directly to the skin without diluting or mixing with other base oils. I didn't experience any irritation on the skin or in the senses. Soft mild scent is appealing and works well with my yoga and mediation routines.

title: Very Large
text: These dryer balls are much larger than I expected, about the size of a tennis ball. Others I've seen have been about half that size. I've never used them before this and I find them to do the job as described. I am a faithful dryer sheet user just to eliminate static cling. When I used the balls without dryer sheets, I still did get static cling so that's the only down side to not using dryer sheets. There's a suggestion to use essential oils for scented drying, but I'm not too keen on oils coming in contact with my cloths. I'm going to try something a little different with diluting liquid fabric softener and spraying on the balls before use.

title: Rivals Name and Store Brands for Quality and Price
text: This is the 6th Amazon Solimo brand product that I have used and I can't express enough how awesome their products are. The petroleum jelly is no exception. The size of this jar is so convenient. The multi-pack is a life saver. At first, I said, "Who needs 4 jars of this stuff" but after thinking more about it, I now have one for every area of the house that I use it in, and it saves having to travel from one room to the other to retrieve it. I have one in each of my two bathrooms, one at my grandson's diaper changing table, and one in my make-up kit. I just didn't think, until now, that I use this stuff more than I realized. Many uses - cuts, scrapes, diaper rash, make up remover, moisturizer for tough areas, healing cracked skin - especially on the bottom of your feet, the list goes on. I did read one other review about having delivered when it's hot outside. I live in Arizona. The day this was delivered was 99 outside. When I opened my box, I could tell that the heat caused the jelly to swell and popped off the lids. Although the four units were packaged together in shrink wrap, it wasn't tight enough to keep the lids on. I think the jar could be designed with a better "snap" for the lid to keep it on. It wasn't a huge mess, but hard to wipe off. However, I still give it 5 stars.

title: Cleans very well tile floors
text: After weeks using this in tile floor where grease, food and other stuff falls in to the floor I can say it cleans and leaves the area free of stain. is easy to apply and can be used in a regular mop bucket. it dissolves very fast and has a nice scent.

title: Not bad, does the job
text: I have used different style of microfiber mops and they all have a similar results and this one here is not the exception. is a decent mop that helps you pick up pet hair easily and mop your floor when you just want a light cleaning. this will never replace a regular mop but helps you maintain the floor clean for longer time before you need to mop your floor like you should. the microfiber pad is nice for wet and dry work. after each use you can hand wash it or throw it in the washer and will come out brand new. in the sprayer you can put your favorite detergent diluted to give a nice scent to the floor while passing the mop. everything feel nice and no broken part reported after months of use.

title: It helps you get a better posture
text: Using this type of tools this days should be required by medical because having a bad posture in a few year you will look and feel horrible. I play a lot of videos games and work in a computer in night and this helps me with my neck and top part of the back pain. I just use it around 15 minutes everyday and makes me feel better. it has different level of height and make sure use the one that is more comfortable for you. the first few days it bother a bit but you will get use to it in a few days. believe me this will help you a lot.

title: This actually works, and no fishy burping
text: Finally found a way to get omega 3 with no fishy flavor or that burp you get with other pills that is horrible. This taste very nice and are easy to take. 3 gummys a day and you'll be getting all the vitamins you need. I always have my omega low because I don't eat fish and this is a very good supplement to replace that. In my last CBC  the doctor told me that my omega when up and I'm happy with that. I finish the first container and I will buy more of this to keep my system ready.

title: Does a nice job and easy to carry on your bag
text: When I first saw this article I only saw the pear name and was expecting the fruit but is a flower scent. no issues with that and still has a nice smell and does a great job eliminating bathroom bad odor. when your going to use the toilet spray this before sitting 2 times in the water and you will see how this helps. nice when your going out and need to use a bathroom in someones house. sprayer is nice and does not leak.

title: Does an amazing job on pots
text: This is a real working product and great for reviving your pots or pan. as you see in the picture I got one from work and revive it with this amazing product. easy to apply and easy to use. it brings 2 scourer cloth that are great quality and after your done just wash it and your ready for next time.  is recommend to use it on clean surface with no grease for example, make sure to follow the instructions and this will work perfectly.

title: Excellent for working with food
text: I work as a food service employee in a hospital and we use gloves to protect the foods we are working with and even more if is something that is ready to eat like fruits or salads. this are very strong gloves that you can cut meat, cook, serve food and they don't get all greasy and slippery like other. I cut a lot of meat and I like this better than the ones we get at work and feel much comfortable using this. I have the box on my locker and when im going to cut meat or any fruit or salads I use my gloves.  size runs like all gloves I used before and they are very stretchy and strong. other gloves even break trying to put them on but with this one you won't have That issue, highly recommend.

title: Leaves your glasses clean and dries very fast
text: I like this cleaning wipes because is easy to carry and fits even in my back pocket of my pants and they don't break easily. they clean very well my sun glasses and my daughters glasses too. they remove any grease, dust or any finger marks on them.  the wipes are strong and it has the perfect moist and dry very fast. I tested one on my phone and leaves it very clean too.

title: Does the job with my wife shoes
text: My wife has a problem with sweaty feet's and after she gets home after work the odor is horrible when she removes her shoes and socks. after that I apply the spray and does remove the odor and controls that bad odor coming out of the shoes. the smell of the spray is strong, it has different oil in the ingredients but the most strongest ingredient is the eucalyptus. not fan of the smell of the spray but does neutralized the bad odor and the other day when she use them they are ready. we have only tested this in the shoes and not in the feets.

title: Does give an extra energy boost
text: First time I try this brand of energy drink and pretty much everything was good only one issue I had and is my personal opinion and you may have a different one. let go with the good part. comes in a nice black can very colorful and with all the detail of what this contain (nutrition facts )  does give extra boost, I do take it after 1pm because at work after that hour I get sleepy and this help me go though the shift with energy. the only thing I don't like is the sugary flavor. is called rainbow candy and the oversweet kills me and I put some water in it. everything else is great.

title: Keeping my feet looking young
text: Well this is an item that usually people use when they have callus and they don't like how the feets looks. You don't need go wait that to happened and keep does feet looking good by your self at home. in my case I use it in the weekend, feet with Epsom salt in warm water for a few minutes and then the electric callus remover.  Is easy to use by your self and is rechargeable. It has 2 speed but usually I use the lowest speed,the fastest is for people that have big callus. It brings various grinding head and when finish it can easily be clean just by removing the top part. Pretty nice and easy to use to keep your feet looking good.

title: Gentle
text: This stain remover seems to be good for sensitive skin -- the treated area of the clothing doesn't irritate skin which is sometimes affected. It does a good job removing, or at least lightening stains, although some stains still need multiple washes, even when treated with this stick.

title: Decent
text: These tablets are packaged beautifully. The set comes with a chart, but I don't know which color is which scent. The scents are nice, but also very mild. The individual packages are surprisingly easy to open -- those packages are part unlabeled plastic and part cardboard, so half of each goes into recycling, the half into the trash. I appreciate the speed at which these tablets dissolve--I don't take long showers, and if I place one if these directly under the shower spray, it's gone by the time I'm finished. I don't have to deal with chunky, foamy remains.

title: Soft
text: This pillow is nice and soft. The texture bumps are soft but noticeable. The vibration feature has just the right speed and power. The shaking mechanism can be removed from the pillow, and for some reason my kid prefers it that way - a pillow on top of a shaker. But it still works!

title: They work, but are not durable
text:
The little spring-things at the end of ours have become "unraveled" on a few. I would not recommend these for kids, or anyone else who might pull or otherwise treat them roughly.
If you're careful with them, they're fine.

title: Good smell!
text: These tablets have a very strong smell, which is perfect for what they are. They disappear a bit faster than I prefer, but perhaps that is because they are designed for morning use and morning showers are usually quick? You can, of course, use them any time of the day or night, but they are a very good way to start your “day,” whenever it begins, or to give you a little boost to get you through the day or night.

title: Fun scents
text: I really like this variety of scents. They’re not the run-of-the-mill smells that I usually encounter. They roll on easily, and have just the right amount of powerfulness behind them

title: Very pretty
text: These bags are very impressive in person. They are much more striking than the product photos can convey. Good quality, and a great way to present a present.

title: They work
text: Depending on the type of mask you are wearing, these can be quite helpful. They do not diminish the effectiveness of your mask, but they do you keep the cloth or filter paper away from your mouth. Maybe they even improve the functionality of the mask? No real idea on that, though.

title: Fuzzy on the inside
text: The slightly flocked interior of these is odd first, but I quickly got used to it, and they seem to be more comfortable than similar gloves without the lining. The gloves’ fit allow a lot of dexterity. They are a good thickness, go up high on my arms and also fit tightly on my arms, which means I don’t need to worry about splashes getting my arms and hands wet.

title: Coconut Refresher
text: This conditioner provides instant results, and the effects are long lasting. A little bit goes a long way. I used this on several leather products, and everything looks great. It does have a strong, pleasant, coconut smell - I’m guessing it is completely made of a coconut product, or maybe is completely a coconut product.

title: Okay..
text: This sound machine isn't awful but it's not my favorite either. Alot of the sounds in my opinion as a re not very relaxing...and definitely could only sleep to a couple of them...even thought theres so many...it has to be plugged in at all times or wont work...it just wouldnt be my first choice, amazon had alot of other choices I would pick first.

title: Nice scents, horrible colors
text: This would be a nice gift set. It comes with 12, large bath bombs, with 3 scents, lavender, mint and vanilla. They do have a good smell to them, relaxing as far as scent goes, but the yellow and brown bath bombs, and the green make the water gross colors...if they went with more natural colors or pastel...or pretty....ots not very appealing to be left in a brown water mess...like I said, presentation and size and scents make this giftable...but otherwise not picturesque.

title: Awesome!!
text: This is my first heated eye lash curler,  so I can't compare it to others but as a first time, this thing is awesome!!! Its easy to turn on, just hold the button down for 2 seconds, same way to turn it off. It heats up quickly,  and usually goes to about 85 degrees Celsius,  if you click it once, it will raise in temperature to about 95 degrees Celsius,  which is where it tops out, if up click it one more time, the temperature will drop and get cooler. It curls my eye lashes great and they stayed curled up all day,  which is better than my old metal curler.  You can out mascara on before curling or not, either way, I like to put it on before and after. The curler wipes clean really easy. The display is bright and large, easy to read. It also comes with a bag, a charging cord ( but you need the adapter for the wall)  and a couple brushes.  For the price I think it's a good value. Love this thing!!

title: Great value for an awesome product!!
text: This is a really great buy for the price. Not only is it a selfie stick.  But it can also be used like a tripod which is nice for when you dont want to be the one holding the camera. It has a removable shutter button so that you can take the picture from far away and not just a stationary button on the stick itself. It has a good range and even fits my note 8 phone which tend to me wider than alot of other phones! The stick itself doesnt really come with instructions, there are some directions on the box that do not actually mention bluetooth but that's how you set it up.  You have to hold down the shutter button on the selfie stick to turn it on, then turn on your phone bluetooth to search for it and then pair the two. It's really easy to use and a great value!

title: Vitamin D power
text: A lot of us have been suggested by our doctors to take vitamin D.  This formula with vitamin K takes your vitamin D intake to a whole new level.  The pills are easy to take and you get your full Vitamin D amount with some extra punch.

title: Grateful for this
text: I am on a lot of medication, so I take this to protect my liver.  This product is especially helpful now that I have to take even more meds than usual due to two slipped discs in my neck. I take two during the day and have not had any negative issues using it. If you are worried about protecting your liver, give these a try.

title: This is neat
text: These easy to swallow pills are a good way to get ACV without having to deal with the awful taste. This product also contains other good ingredients like Kelp, Apple Pectin, Bromelain, Potassium and Vitamin B-6. I had no bad reactions from taking this.

title: A great probiotic
text: These pills are easy to take and help with the gut. When I take this, I get less gas and cramping. Probiotics are not just some trend, they really do make a difference in gut health.

title: Good for your gut
text:
I really like Digestive Advantage probiotics. I was taking the capsules but now am using these. They taste really good. The only disadvantage I can see to these is that someone might want to eat more than one at a time. These are effective just like the pills are but are much more pleasant to take. Make sure to keep these away from small children and especially pets.

If you suffer from stomach issues and occasional painful gas, taking these, along with simethicone may help you feel better.

title: A rechargeable tank model offers portability and convenience
text:
Hangsun Water Flosser Cordless Oral Irrigator is made in China and the first tank style water flosser that I have used that is rechargeable.

This is a compact unit with a smaller tank than most of the wired tank models. The 450ml tank is good for a two minute cleaning. I do like the idea of a rechargeable tank style not only for the portability but also the flexibility. It is a good choice for use at sinks where outlets are not conveniently located on the side of choice.

I have been using tank style water flossers since they were first introduced many years ago and they work fabulously to keep my close set teeth clean and plaque free. I also use floss tape but would not be without a water flosser. This style is so much easier for me to use than the one piece rechargeables which I find heavy and awkward to hold. This one is easy to use and works well. The hose is clearly labeled for locking in place and there are rubber anti-skid strips on the bottom to keep the unit in place while using.

Hangsun Water Flosser Cordless Oral Irrigator comes nicely presented in a sealed container and comes with two standard nozzles and one tongue scraper. There is a USB charging cable as well as a drawstring fabric carrying bag. It's small, compact and portable and is a quick and easy way to keep one’s teeth clean and healthy.

title: Flavorful broccoli powder
text:
FeelGood Organic Superfoods Broccoli Powder comes in a 7 ounce bag that is well sealed. The source country of the broccoli is not mentioned on the label but it does display the USDA certified organic seal.

This broccoli powder is an easy way to add broccoli taste and nutrients to recipes. I make a lot of slow cooker soups and find this adds a wonderful flavor and aroma to them.

FeelGood Organic Superfoods Broccoli Powder is a healthy and convenient pantry staple. The recommended storage is in a cool, dry and dark location. It is a flavorful organic and gluten-free vegetable powder. The expiration date on the bag that I received is 9 months in the future.

title: Serving size is three gummies
text:
New Elements Omega 3-6-9 + DHA Gummies bottle label does not state the country where made or the source of the ingredients. It does state that they are made in an FDA registered facility, according to Good Manufactuing Processes.

These are vegan gummies that come in orange and lemon flavors and measure a half inch in diameter. A serving size is 3 gummies so the bottle contains only a 20 day quantity.

Since I am a vegan who has trouble swallowing tablets, gummies are my best option for supplements. These are easy to take and provide 130mg of Omega 3, 65mg of Omega 6, 30mg of Omega 9 and 50mg of DHA. Daily values of each have not been established.

New Elements Omega 3-6-9 + DHA Gummies are an option for supplements that may be missing in a vegan diet. The bottle comes with a secure inner seal and the one that I received has a Best By date that is 19 months in future.

title: Left all my screens clean and bright without streaks
text:
Ori-Lemoon Monitor Wipes are made in China and come in a perforated pre-moistened roll of 100 wipes.

Each wipe measure 6” x 4.5” and works efficiently to clean screens. The canister comes tightly sealed and the wipes are sealed in a plastic bag within the canister. It took a few seconds to find the center wipe and a couple of extra came out with it since I had not quite grabbed the end. After that they all came out smoothly as expected.

This comes with a polishing cloth which I used, after cleaning, on my phone and tablet. I have a smart home so, in addition to monitors, I have a variety of AI devices with screens. I cleaned all of them and these wipes left them bright and streak free. They do dry out fast compared to other types of wipes but that may be do to the different ingredients in specific purpose wipes. These do contain ethyl alcohol. They have a pleasant and mild orange scent.

Ori-Lemoon Monitor Wipes work very well to clean fingerprints, smudges, etc. off of electronic screens. I was so pleased with these wipes that I even used them on my eyeglasses which they also left clean and clear. I like these screen wipes and would get them again.

title: Vegan B12 supplement in a form that has good taste and texture
text:
New Elements Energy Gummies Vitamin B12 and Folic Acid Energy Supplement is made in the USA with a natural raspberry flavor.

A serving size is two gummies and each cylindrical gummy measures .375 inches high with a bottom diameter of .625 inches and a top diameter of .5 inches. A serving provides 1000mcg of
methylcobalamin (B12) and 240mcg of folic acid.

I have been taking B12 daily for years and do believe that it helps sustain a good energy level. For me, the only variable is the form of the supplement since I am a vegan who has difficulty swallowing pills.

These New Elements Energy Gummies are among the best tasting options that I have used. They have a sweet natural raspberry taste and contain real sugar. The texture is not too gummy so they are easy to chew. This is a good choice for anyone who wants a vegan gummy with a good natural flavor.

title: Effective and pleasant tasting tooth paste
text:
Spotlight Oral Care Toothpaste for Sensitive Teeth is made in the USA and cruelty free. It contains two active ingredients: 5% potassium nitrate and .24% sodium fluoride.

This vegan friendly toothpaste has a pleasant mint flavor. I prefer using toothpaste with cavity fighting fluoride and the potassium nitrate works effectively to reduce sensitivity to cold. I use it with an extra soft brush and it works well.

The only little quibble that I have is that the cap is a separate screw on style rather than a flip top style which is more convenient to use.

Spotlight Oral Care Toothpaste for Sensitive Teeth is a minty toothpaste that combines two active ingredients to desensitize teeth and prevent cavities. It is very effective.

title: Very stiff memory foam
text:
Yarkor Cervical Traction Device is as described on the product page but, although it is memory foam, it is much harder than I expected. It weighs 11.2 ounces and while it has some give if one presses a finger on it, it doesn’t seem to have any give against one’s neck.

While the traction position does work, it does not relieve my neck pain and the hard material is very uncomfortable for me and doesn’t seem to improve with each use.

I really had high hopes that this would be the solution that I needed and that I would be able to obtain some relief from neck pain but, unfortunately, for some reason my neck felt worse after using it. This may work for some but, for me, using a softer device, even a rolled towel, is a better choice.

title: Clever container design but small scratchy tissues
text:
RONGCHUANG Facial Tissues in a 150 count tube are made in China of native wood pulp. The tissues are 7” squares and three ply. However they are not very soft and I find them to be too scratchy against my skin.

The design of the container is clever in that it fits neatly in a cup holder and makes a tissue easy to grab when on the go. The tube is 8” high and has a 2.75” diameter. It’s a cute container but it’s not easy to find the first tissue to put out.

RONGCHUANG Facial Tissues,4 Pack, 150 Count Per Tube, are currently selling at a premium price so I expected them to be as soft as the less expensive ultra soft brands that I normally use. They are ok in a pinch but I would not get this brand again.

title: My negative first impression changed after using these cloths
text:
Atitifope Eco-Fabric Multi-Purpose Cleaning Cloths are very useful and have a place between paper towels and micro cleaning cloths or sponges.

My first impression was negative because I was startled to see the size of a roll in comparison to paper towels. I’ve attached pictures and it didn’t seem to be an economical choice since some brands of paper towels hold up well for cleaning. I soon realized that my mistake was in comparing them to paper towels.

Once I started using these Atitifope cleaning cloths my impression quickly changed. One thing that made a big difference is how they respond to cleaners containing bleach. Paper towels quickly dissolve. I’ve attached a picture of one of these cloths after using it for a whole day and then wiping down counters and sink with a bleach product. It is starting to show wear but is still in one strong piece.

This product is ideal for those chores where one doesn’t want to use a microfiber or other material cloth because it would be better to throw it away rather than launder. Chemicals used in stainless steel cleaners, etc. are not something that I want to put into the laundry with other items. Now I can have the strength of a soft cloth that can be economically tossed when done.

I would prefer that these came individually folded in a flat box rather than on a roll but that is just personal preference since they don’t require the space of a large paper towel holder.

Atitifope Eco-Fabric Multi-Purpose Cleaning Cloths are a good choice for strong cloth cleaners that are ecologically friendly and can be easily tossed away after standing up to challenging tasks. They won’t replace either my paper towels or my microfiber cloths but they definitely have a use alongside them and work very well.

title: Makes tasty low calorie, high protein vegan smoothies
text:
Tattle Plant Protein Blend, Vanilla Cold Brew is a good combination of pea, rice and hemp protein. It blends well with almond milk to make a tasty vegan smoothie.

Besides the plant protein, the ingredient list includes all natural ingredients including Fruit and Vegetable Juice Powder, Tart Cherry Extract, Probiotics, Turmeric Extract, Stevia Extract, Pink Himialayan Sea Salt, Enzyme Bromelain, Black Pepper Extract. The turmeric gives this a yellow coloring not usually seen in vanilla smoothie blends.

This is a low calorie product with a serving size of one 30 gram scoop containing only 120 calories. A serving also contains 2.5g of fat, 4g of carbohydrates and 21g of protein, 170mg of sodium, 137mg of potassium and 33mg of calcium.

As a vegan, I’m fairly conscientious about my nutrition and I have a protein shake every day. This Tattle Plant Protein Blend is one of the healthiest blends. It’s manufactured in the USA and is certified vegan and non-GMO.

Tattle Plant Protein Blend, Vanilla Cold Brew is a good choice for those looking for a smoothie mix that is both tasty and healthy.

title: Good combination of joint nutrients
text:
My husband has been taking the best selling glucosamine tablets for years. At times, he would stop taking them just to see if they were really helping and found, shortly thereafter, his knees would start bothering him again. So taking joint nutrients is part of his morning routine.

While the brand that he was taking included MSM, it did not contain chondroitin. I started to read about the benefits of the combination and even noticed the ingredients being included in my older dog’s kibble.

This Viva Labs combination seems to be a good balance and requires two servings a day in order to get the same amount of glucosamine that he was taking with one serving of the other brand. Taking the servings twice a day seems preferable for a couple of reasons, the Viva Labs capsules are slightly smaller than the best selling tablet but much easier to swallow. In addition, one can adjust the amount taken to one’s personal preference or needs. Two servings at different times of day would seem to spread out the benefits too.

Disclosure: A complimentary bottle was sent to me for trial and evaluation. I have no connection to Viva Labs and my review is based solely on my perception of the merits of the product.

title: Excellent!
text: I've tried dozens of protein powders and this is one of the best in regards to flavor and blendability. The chocolate caramel tastes great and it mixes thoroughly - no gross clumps or settling at the bottom. This contains both whey protein and bovine collagen, so there's lots of benefits to both joints and muscles and as an anti-aging supplement in general. Definitely give this one a try, you'll be back for more.

title: Delicious, healthy candy substitute
text:
These gummies have a very pleasant peach flavor.
I don't consider this a stand-alone collagen supplement because two of these gummies contains 99mg of collagen and though there are no hard and fast rules regarding collagen dosage, it's recommended that 1.2grams  - 15 grams, (or 1200mg-15,000 mg) per day be taken for benefits to skin, hair, nails and joints. This gummy supplement is good to have on hand when you've decided that if you're going to eat sweets occasionally, it's going to have at least some healthy benefit. I used to eat a LOT of regular gummy candy and now I use gummy supplements for treats, instead. I realized that I was never going to completely give up sugar, but if I can combine it with vitamins or collagen every time - the benefits add up day after day. It's helped me lose some weight because I can only eat a couple of D3 gummies, a few collagen,  a few B vitamins, etc., but it satisfies my sweet tooth and I can tell by the way I look and feel that it's beneficial to me. I take regular supplements, but when I crave sugar I go for the gummies and this is one of the better flavors I've tried.

title: Delicious and vital for good health (D3 deficiencies are common)
text:
This is an excellent gummy D3 supplement - 2 gummies have 2,000 units of vitamin D3 and
Vitamin D3 is critical for staving off some really miserable conditions like depression, fatigue, obesity, alzheimers and skin problems. Studies have found that anywhere from 40% - 75% of people in the U.S. are deficient in D3. (Depending on which study you're looking at) I love this gummy form because it's so easy to take! I hate swallowing pills, so if I can get something in a gummy candy, I do it! This is an excellent vitamin to take, considering how beneficial it is and how common deficiencies are. I had a vitamin D3 deficiency and after taking a 5,000iu daily D3 supplement for only 2-3 weeks, (my doctors advice) I noticed a big improvement in my energy level and in the appearance of my skin.
If you have any of the conditions that I mentioned, such as frequent fatigue, your doctor can give you a blood test to find out what your blood levels are of D3, B vitamins and any others you suspect you may be deficient in. If you don't want or can't afford to go to a doctor, trying this D3 supplement is a safe and easy way to rule out a deficiency in this vitamin. If you take this and in two to three weeks you find that you have more energy, among other things -  you most likely had a D3 deficiency like roughly half the population does. Do a little research on dosages, because there are several factors that you need to take into consideration when you take D3 long-term. D3 is a fat-soluble vitamin, which means that it IS possible to get too much. It can become toxic and that can cause some problems. (Eg. Kidney stones, nausea) You need to consider how much sunlight you get, for instance - whether you use sunscreen, do you live in Alaska, or Arizona- things like that.
This is a very easy, inexpensive supplement to take and it can make an enormous difference in how you look and feel.

title: Excellent flavor, a real energy booster if your diet lacks protein
text: I became a vegetarian a few years ago, so I began using a lot of protein drinks. During the last year or so, I got away from drinking them (I like them, but I got lazy) and was just relying on a fish dinner once or twice a week and an occasional PB sandwich.  One day recently I was asking myself, where has all my energy gone? I was feeling downright weak! I've been drinking this protein powder for about 2 weeks now and I've noticed a huge difference in my energy level. It's amazing how this problem of low energy just crept up on me unnoticed until it was pretty pronounced. I'm glad I tried this one - it's very palatable - it  has an excellent chocolate flavor and mixes easily. I've been mixing it with ice and water in a shaker and it tastes good, it's even better if you use almond, coconut or soy milk instead of water. I'm very impressed with this supplement and will definitely reorder.

title: Bovine source, great, fruity flavor
text: These are very good-tasting gummies for hair and nail growth.  I normally take marine collagen because I stopped using animal products a couple of years ago, but I didn't realize this was a bovine source until I recieved it. As far as the bovine-sourced Collagen goes, this is one of the best in regards to taste and gummies are very convenient to take. They also satisfy your sweet tooth.  If you aren't opposed to using animal sourced products,  this is a good one.

title: Excellent source of vitamins & antioxidants, very versatile
text: I love powdered supplements like this one because there are so many options regarding their use. This moringa  leaf is excellent  - I've added it to oatmeal, tea, smoothies and even soup. It has an extremely mild but pleasant plant flavor that isn't noticeable in anything but the most bland drinks. Moringa is loaded with nutrients and antioxidants for good health, appearance and immune protection. Highly recommend.

title: Beta carotene and vitamin E included - excellent!
text: I love taking liquid vitamins like this one, I add it to my smoothies or herbal/vitamin iced tea every morning and can't even tell it's in there. Also, I've never seen a D3 supplement that also contains vitamin E and beta carotene. Those are two supplements I won't do without, so this is a real bonus and ups the value of this supplement, in my opinion. I've tried the maximum dose in my drinks and still can't detect any taste, there are no bothersome aftertaste or stomach issues, either. Great ingredients, made in the USA with no Chinese influence- I've never seen a better D3 supplement, or even any I've liked better. Highly recommend.

title: Love the energy boost!
text: The pre-workout supplement gives me an excellent boost of energy when I wake up in the morning and helps me to wake up faster and become more alert more quickly than what I'm normally used to. I like it so much better than coffee, which started upsetting my stomach a couple of years ago and caused me to stop drinking it. This drink is delicious and has healthy ingredients like amino acids and B vitamins. There's no fatigue later in the day after using it. This is an excellent brand and I can't recommend it enough!

title: Excellent taste
text: I love the flavor of these vitamin gummies, I think they taste like muscatel grapes. The vitamin C, zinc & echinacea are the best things you can take to strengthen your immune system and the zinc is even great for hair growth. If you have hair loss, it's one of the most effective things you can take to reverse it. This is an excellent supplement that's much more pleasant to take than a tablet or capsule and I'd definitely recommend them.

title: Excellent quality/lots of benefits...
text: This is a great supplement for vegetarians, I stopped eating animal products a year ago and now I use a lot of plant based protein powders. This supplement has 12 grams of protein per serving, (6 tablets) so it's definitely worth taking. It's a really nice change from powders because when I use them, I have to cover up the taste to some extent and they can be a bit inconvenient because they can make a mess trying to use them when travelling. These "tablets" (I believe they're actually called caplets, which are easier to swallow than tablets because of their shape) , are very easy to swallow because of their oblong shape and smooth coating. This is also a good source of iron and potassium; they're pretty important and this can eliminate the need for taking extra pills if they aren't included in any of your other supplements. There are a lot of great reasons for taking this supplement; it's onsidered one of the most powerful superfoods in the world; it was found to have more protein (up to 70% more) than beef or soybeans! This spirulina supplement is all natural and organic; it's an excellent value.

title: Excellent joint health support
text: This supplement apparently has most of the essential ingredients for joint health and reducing pain and swelling; but I decided not to use it because apparently one of the side effect of glucosamine is hair loss. I don't believe it's a common side effect of glucosamine, but seeing as hair loss has been a real problem for me the past few years, I've decided to try something else. If you don't have a problem with hair loss, I'd consider trying this because it has apparently been effective for a lot of people and because if it does have that side effect on you, it's reversible. This appears to be a good quality supplement, it even contains niacin, which is an excellent vitamin for joint and circulation improvement. If you experience joint pain and swelling, I wouldn't discount trying it.

title: Delicious!
text: I am not an athlete, but I use a lot of hydration drinks. I don't like the taste of some of them because to me, they have an underlying flavor that I think is kind of gross! This is one of the good ones, it dissolved very quickly into water just stirring with a spoon and it tastes a lot like lemonade. I've been using a full scoop in a 64 ounce water bottle with some powdered ice, I think it's delicious!

title: "Oil-slick-in-a cup!"
text: Oh my. Not a good look OR flavor. Occasionally I put a teaspoon of pure solid coconut oil in my coffee (it liquefies instantly) and though I can see a tiny amount of oil on the surface it doesn't bother me; it's hardly noticeable, It tastes really good and I think it's healthy. But this leaves a regular oil slick on the surface of your coffee and it just tastes like some sort of unidentifiable oil. They should have called this "creamer" the Valdez Solution; Save the environment, drink the oil slick one cup at a time! I do not recommend this.

title: I really like it, but hard to open
text:
This Pill dispenser is a nice size and it's one of the nicest looking ones I've seen. But, I can't turn it without hurting my hands, it's near impossible! I really wanted this because it would be convenient to carry in my purse and the smooth, round shape would be easy to find amongst all the other paraphernalia.
I still thought it was reasonable to give it 4 stars, because this company is willing to replace the item or refund your money, no questions asked and I may have gotten a dud. I really like the design, if only I could get into it easily!

title: No more sore noses!
text: These tissues are SO soft and so gentle on the nose when you have a cold, allergies, or frequently reach for a tissue for any reason. Using these prevents red, sore skin on and around your nose from frequent, repetitive use. These are an excellent remedy for that. I recommend them.

title: Keeps its promises!
text: I have been using this collagen protein powder for the last 3-4 years, though not this brand because it was not available.  This is a product that absolutely lives up to its claims! After a few months of using this  you will notice a lot of little hairs growing out around your hairline and this is happening all over your head,  it just isn't noticeable for a while. It really does grow hair (revives old follicles??)  and makes your fingernails super hard. I'm not sure how long it was before I noticed that my nails were harder, but it was very obvious when I had to trim them.  When I have read reviews in the past for products like this one, there were claims that, if you have white or gray hair, it will begin growing out dark again.  It happened to me! My hair was pure white/silver (I am 60) and it began getting dark brown, it is now pretty dark in the back and salt and pepper all over. I posted photos of this on Amazon for the brand that I was using at the time and I will try to find them and post them here.  My only problem is that I really liked my white hair! Lol.  I must say, though,  my hair is a lot thicker and shinier after using the collagen and when I stopped using it for a few months (I ran out and put off re-ordering), I began to see a lot more hairs in my hairbrush,  a real bummer.  Just imagine what your body must be missing in the way of nutrients if it has such a drastic effect on your hair! I have read that nutritional deficiencies show up in the hair first and I believe it's true. You won't be disappointed in this product,  I highly recommend it!

title: Improved back pain & posture
text: I really really like this brace. The fabric is lightweight and breathable & easily washable. Easy to put on and adjust. It’s improved my posture and back pain (I work in an office and am at a desk most the day). I highly recommend it!

title: Ehh... they’re ok
text:
So... these are not my favorite.
I did like that they are textured and they look really nice (once I figured out how to assemble it). However, I did not like how flimsy it was. I got these in hopes to use them as bridesmaids gift boxes but it wasn’t going to be possible without reinforcing with strong packing tape on both the I side and outside bottom. I felt like this made the box look tacky. You could definitely pay a bit more and get better quality but for the price & quantity you get with these, you can’t beat it.

title: Keto friendly!
text:
I have been a long-time user of garcinia cambogia and absolutely love the results. I have been following a strict keto diet for a little over a year & started taking a similar supplement long before I began my journey. If you just do a quick search online, you’ll see that it has many benefits such as loss of appetite or desire to eat less than usual, reduced cravings for unhealthy foods, a more positive & uplifted mood (feeling happier, energetic, etc.), an increase in concentration and energy, stabilized sugar levels, improved bowel movements, and a reduction in joint pain. I can honestly say that this has helped in every single one of those areas. I love that this comes in a powder and is tasteless so you could pretty much mix it in anything. I would like to note that if you’re mixing it into something cold then you’ll want to use either a blending ball or a mixer. I did find that if mixed in little by little, it’ll blend nicely into cold water after giving it a good shake.

With all that being said, garcinia cambogia is not for everyone. Those who are diabetic and are taking medication for their condition, who have a history of liver or kidney damage, or those who are pregnant or breastfeeding should probably avoid this before speaking with your doctor.

I didn’t ever feel anything but positive side effects but everyone is different so you might want to try a little at a time before moving up to the recommended dosage.

Overall, I am 100% satisfied with this and look forward to purchasing more once it runs out.

title: NOT Keto/ diabetic friendly!!!
text:
I have been on keto for a year and six months now and was so excited to receive this until it got here and I read the ingredients. Unfortunately at the time of ordering this, the ingredient list was not available. Like many others, I assumed that it was pure coconut milk powder. It’s not. This contains “Organic maltodextrin”. Organic maltodextrin or not, it has maltodextrin. Like another reviewer, I was unable determine if the maltodextrin source is corn, tapioca, potato, or wheat.

Evidence has shown that maltodextrin can affect the balance of gut bacteria, which play an very important role in people's health. Maltodextrin has an even higher glycemic index than regular table sugar. Meaning that maltodextrin can cause a sharp increase/ spike in people's blood sugar shortly after they eat foods that contain it. This is not good for those with diabetes or someone who is doing the keto diet or sugar free diet.

HOWEVER, my fiancé eating habits are much different than mine so he was happy to try it and stated that the taste was pretty good & he seams to enjoy it. For that, I’ll give it 2 stars. He has been using it in his coffee successfully. He was unsuccessful with mixing it in cold water. It will clump if not mixed into hot water.

I will not be reordering. I definitely think the manufacture should choose a different natural sweetener if ever planning to market this to the keto, diabetic or low-carb community.

title: Nice smelling but fragile and unsure of effect
text: These are a great Idea and I was eager to use them. Getting them out of their packaging was a little tricking in that they are very delicate and easy to break. This should have no effect on the their function. Once in the drain, it was hard to tell what they are to do. I suppose they start our having a great scent but over the course of a month I honestly couldn't tell. Not sure what I would do differently but I would like to be able to smell a fresh scent throughout the month, but that didn't happen.

title: Compact, quiet and so far so good
text: [[VIDEOID:389485f41df6f3c585ec5028b8671c02]] I love that it is odorless and ALMOST silent. It is important to keep it in small spaces for the best effect. I used a bathroom that has the great pleasure to have a litterbox, it took about an hour to notice the shift in smell and 2 hours to actually notice the difference. This unit does not put out an odor and only a minimal fan sound. I'm cautiously giving it 5 stars because I like how it is working now and I want to give it some time to see how it works on a consistent basis.

title: Worth getting addicted to...especially if you like really Dark Chocolate
text:
I saw the words "Dark Chocolate" and I lit up. For years now we have been enjoying the lower sugar and positive effects of dark chocolate, braving all the way up to a smooth and cool 90% cocoa -- That's right up there with baking chocolate. I didn't let myself expect much from a commercially made probiotic, and maybe that has to do with my happy surprise. But let me start with the fact that the chocolate is 64% cocoa! Not bad, not bad at all for dark chocolate lovers.

They are the size of a rounded quarter and have a firmness that allows them to be savored - they melt just like a piece of chocolate would. If you are a dark chocolate lover you will appreciate the slight tang and less syrupy sweetness that accompanies milk chocolate. These are really pleasing and they tout that their flora survives our stomach acid 100X better! It took me 4 days, to notice the shift. My roommate took 10 but we both commented on the absence of feeling bloated after dinner and the regularity that ensued (Okay I have to confess that I would often take one at lunch AND dinner)!

These are NOT laxatives but candy bites that are packed with Probiotics or "good bacteria" the stomach needs to help digest our food and maintain a healthy balance of energy and fuel. So rather than feeling that your food takes hours to digest there is really a sense that things are more efficiently being broken down in the intestines. It's not an uncomfortable feeling at all (but could be if you over do them).

They don't taste like they smell, so don't dig your nose in and take a big whiff anticipating a nice rich chocolate smell...You won't. What matters is the flavor and the results both of which you will get.

title: Great
text: I love having a fiber/probiotic in my routine.  These are easy to take and taste great.  They are a chewy and firmer gummy which is what I prefer.  I love that everyone in the house can take them as well to help with gut issues.

title: Flavors
text:
I actually was able to try several different flavors from this line. I liked some more than others, but all of them were not bad. I love how these are both for hydration and also have the added immunity benefits. I just mix with a bottle of water and I am good to go. The packets are convenient for easy use and for the on the go.
I like that these were not salty tasting compared to some electrolytes I have tried. I also like the price point as it is pretty decent for a 30 pack, especially compared to others I have tried.

title: Nice
text:
These wipes come pre-moistened but are very damp. I like that they have enough solution to clean, but not too much that I worried about using on my electronics. As most wipes, you are going to pull from the center and more than what you need will come out. I just push the unused wipes back into the container.

I have used these on my touch screen monitor and also my cell phone. I really like them. Both were left clean with no excess moisture.

title: 3.5 Stars
text: I am not normally a plant based protein fan, but these are pretty good.  I think it will also depend on your flavor preference.  I was able to try both the oatmeal cookie and the hazelnut.  I am a chocolate lover and was expecting to love the hazelnut.  However; I was not a fan of the flavoring on that one.  However; I really enjoyed the oatmeal cookie flavor.  You get both the oatmeal and the cinnamon and it was much better than I was expecting.  It did not have any horrible aftertaste either.  It has a very slight chalky taste, but it was very little.  I am impressed overall.  Still giving 4 stars to both as they both were better than expected even though the one was not my preference (but chalkiness, formula, and etc were still great).

title: Good
text: I am not normally a plant based protein fan, but these are pretty good.  I think it will also depend on your flavor preference.  I was able to try both the oatmeal cookie and the hazelnut.  I am a chocolate lover and was expecting to love the hazelnut.  However; I was not a fan of the flavoring on that one.  However; I really enjoyed the oatmeal cookie flavor.  You get both the oatmeal and the cinnamon and it was much better than I was expecting.  It did not have any horrible aftertaste either.  It has a very slight chalky taste, but it was very little.  I am impressed overall.  Still giving 4 stars to both as they both were better than expected even though the one was not my preference (but chalkiness, formula, and etc were still great).

title: Flavor
text: I use a pre almost every day when I work out.  I prefer to dry scoop but will use one pending how it tastes the best as well.  This one had a chemical aftertaste that was a little bitter.  I tried it both with water and dry scooped.  It is not a favorite for me.

title: Nope
text: I love adding some sort of immunity to my daily routine and was very excited for these.  Others talked about how good they tasted so I thought I would give them a try.  Sadly, these tasted horrible to everyone in our house.  We could not even take a full bite of the gel like substance before the taste would hit your tongue.  It was awful.  We all spit these out.  These are a no from us.

title: We Will See
text:
I have no clue if this will do anything around weight loss, but it has a pleasant taste and does seem to be helping with my night time bloating.
I have been adding this into my sparkling water. I have only added a few drops and have not tried it with just plain water.

title: Great
text: These do not have to be used to make wipes as they really are great for any paper towel needs.  We do not have a dispenser but still use them around the house.  We have one in the bathroom for wiping off hands and one in the kitchen for cleaning up messes.  We just pull from the middle and grab what we need.  They work great.

title: Decent
text: To be honest it has been a long time since we have actually used cling wrap.  We usually grab for foil as it is just easier to manage.  This is great though and really does cling.  It is still a pain to get it to come out of the roll though.

title: Great
text: I use my push mop daily and these are amazing.  They are larger to really get a nice area all at once.  They are soft and really pick up the dirt.  They fit both spray mops that we have that are different brands with no issues.  I love that I can wash them and use them over and over again but have extra for between washes as well.

title: Good
text:
I love having picks on me at all times. These are pretty good but I do wish they were a little thicker/solid. They still get the job done.

It is a great price for how many you are getting as well. They do come in a large travel case which I wish was a little thinner. It would work better for throwing in my purse but I can still make it work.

title: Light
text: I have used clothes like these before and these work pretty good.  As others mentioned, do you expect these to be full of moisture or overly wet.  They are just that.  Wet feeling.  They have a very slight wetness and more of a dry wetness if that makes sense.  I do find that I can use these to clean my glasses though.  I have also used some very similar to these so I was not expecting them to be any more saturated.

title: Lemon
text: I like taking a daily vitamin for my skin and nails.  This one is great and has a lemon taste.  They are easy to take in gummy form.  It is hard to know if they are working, but I do feel taking a Biotin daily has helped me over time.

title: Great
text: I have a Vitamin D deficiency and taking a daily vitamin D pill as really been helping.  I prefer taking a quick capsule and these are great.  They are a great price as well.  I take them daily and have not had any issues.

title: Room Spray
text: This is more of a room spray than a odor eliminator for me.  It smells really good and has a nice light scent.  It smells great but I am not sure about covering up smells.  It does make an amazing room spray though.  I can spray this and still smell it hours later.  I love it using it that way and will buy again for that reason.

title: Ok
text:
I use a BCAA or EAA everyday with my workouts and also my rest days. I love trying new to me brands and flavors. This one is ok. I tried both the strawberry lemonade and the blue raspberry. I did not get a very strong flavor from either. I enjoyed them mixed with another supplement I am using though.

The downfall for me is the expiration. Both say to use within 60 days after opening. I personally do not love using the same flavor everyday. I like the mix it up. I use a few different ones at a time. Unless you plan to only use this one and use it everyday, it will be expired before you finish it. Most of the ones I have use a two year shelf life (some one year).

This did mix well though with no clumping. I just wanted more from the flavoring. I do not really see what is different between the Base and the 9 as both are recovery essential aminos. This formula has a finer powder, but the flavoring is about the same (tried strawberry lemonade in both).

title: Pretty Good
text:
