title: Really feels good
text:
I got this out of curiosity more than anything, but boy does it make my hands feel good.

I work between a laptop and a computer all day and I've been concerned about the effects that continuous movements within a limited rage would eventually cause issues with my hands. My hands feel so good after using this massager that it makes me feel as though I am warding off potential trouble by using it.

I would characterize this massager as more of a compression thing than a massage, but the compression is done in many series of patterns that make it feel like a massage.

There are a number of ways to control the massage, from the amount of compression to the type of goal (refresh, relax, and health care - although I'm not exactly sure what that means) to the inclusion of heat, and it's nice to alternate between them because they are all different.

I'm surprised by how much I like having my hands massaged intros way and I think it's actually a very cool little machine to have. Feels great!

title: Quick way to get the benefits of bone broth
text:
I like to make my own bone broth. Needless to say, doing so isn't always feasible, so having bone broth in this easy-to-make, powdered form is a really great product to have on hand for a quick afternoon pick-me-up. In addition, I have friends who drink bone broth while doing intermittent fasting and I think this would probably be very handy to have around for that as well.

If you make your own unsalted stock (or bone broth) then you'll have a pretty good idea of what this tastes like. It's not as beefy as what I make for myself, but I think that's a matter of taste as well as what ratio of powder to water you use. Unfortunately, the product itself gives no indication of what amount of water to use.

So why four stars instead of five?
Unfortunately, there are no guidelines for how much water to use with this powder. I guess it's supposed to be to taste, but it would be nice to have a baseline amount from which to make personal tweaks.
The other reason is the "organic beef type flavor." I'm not sure what "beef type" is and it would be nice to know.
The cost at $3/serving is also a bit steep, but that may be worth the convenience for some.

It is my understanding that the jury is still out regarding the research being done on the benefits of collagen, however, my personal experience tells me that it works, at least for me. The thickness of my hair and nails is better and I believe I see benefits in my skin as well when I am using some form of collagen supplementation. But it works better with consistent use and having it in quick form like this powder is great.

title: DIdn't work well (with pix)
text:
After dinner, I noticed that I'd gotten a little splotch of oil from oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes on my shirt. I sprayed it with the white bottle as per instructions and ran it through the washing machine.
When I took the shirt out of the washer, it looked as though the stain was gone. Great!
But when I took it out of the dryer, I could see that it was still there. Granted, it was lighter, but the stain was still there and now possibly heat set. Not great.

Spray 'n Wash has removed even set-in stains like this, but I really liked the idea of this product's natural ingredients so I wanted to try it. I'm disappointed that it did not work. Perhaps it is more effective on non-oil stains.

Additionally, the bottles I ordered were supposed to be sandalwood and cedar. The bottles I received were both marked "Unscented," even though a scent was already evident because one of the bottles had a loose top causing it to leak in the packaging. I can guess which scent is which, but it made me think that greater quality control might be a good idea.

title: Spearmint flavor gets lost
text:
I always keep a container of gum like this in the center console in my car, mostly because a blast of mint can revive me at any time of the day, and there are plenty of times when lunch has contained more garlic than it seemed!

This gum is a bit different though in that the pieces of gum are individually coated, similar to Chiclets. So that's fine, but the main thing for me is that there is no mint blast. I taste more of the sweeteners than anything.

On the plus side, the flavor lasts a long time. I just wish I tasted more of the mint.

title: Best if you sleep on your back.
text:
I got this because of the contoured eye area. It does have that and that part works for me. Unfortunately, the rest doesn't because of the following reasons:

-- The mask is molded. That means not have the give it needs to be able to sleep with the side of your head on a pillow. Doing so makes the mask shift, in one piece, off to the side which not only allows light to enter, but is not comfortable.
-- The single strap is wide. To position is properly I have to put is across the tops of my ears. If the strap sits above my ears on my head, it sits too high on my face. Maybe my ears are higher than normal? But I've never had trouble wearing glasses or off the shelf sunglasses, so maybe it's the position the strap.

The eye contour is a great idea and the mask is very comfortable. I think this might be a great mask if you sleep on your back and have low ears (?), but I cannot see this mask working well for side sleepers.

title: Tastes like candy! Easy way to take ACV.
text:
I’m the type of person who never misses taking vitamins, minerals or supplements as long as they come in gummy form. This product is the easiest way to take my Apple cider vinegar on a daily basis. These gummies taste like yummy candy.

I like how this acv includes the mother. It also contains other beneficial ingredients that make it even better than plain acv supplements.

Each bottle contains 35 servings. I’m just about done with mine. I haven’t lost any weight and wasn’t really expecting a miracle because a healthy diet and regular exercise are necessary for that to happen.

I did take one star off because this product is quite pricey compared to many similar acv supplements. And I really can’t say I felt any different while taking these daily.

title: Tastes like candy. Convenient way to take apple cider vinegar.
text:
Before trying this product I was taking apple cider vinegar by the spoon in its bottled liquid form. This meant I had to keep the bottle at home and I had to deal with the acidity that would make me cough even though I tried to sip the acv slowly.

These gummies are so much easier to take apple cider vinegar. This tastes like tart candy so I look forward to taking them every day. Aside from organic acv, this supplement also includes vitamin B-12, organic pomegranate and organic beet root. I like how I can take this anytime & anywhere.

title: Tastes okay. An unusual way to take a probiotic.
text:
This dietary supplement may help with digestive issues. It taste okay. Comes in a paste-like consistency that's dispensed through syringe-type vessels and ingested orally prior to meals or on an empty stomach. Best to consult your physician or medical professional beforehand.

I can't really say I feel any different after taking this product daily but can say that it didn't cause any negative issues so far.

title: Taste is okay at best. Country of manufacture unknown.
text:
This is a generic version of Ensure nutrition shake. I wish I had a bottle of Ensure at home in order to compare the ingredients and nutrition facts.

As a label reader, one of the most important pieces of information I look for is the product’s country of origin. Nowhere on the bottle is there a mention of this product’s country of manufacture.

Because health & safety standards are not as reliable in some countries, I avoid products from these questionable sources. When it comes to anything I need to eat or drink, I want to know where it’s made.

In terms of taste, I’m not too fond of what they describe as strawberry flavor. There are definitely better tasting strawberry flavored nutritional shakes out there.

title: Assorted sizes. Good value. One container missing.
text:
I received a box of plastic food containers in 5 different shapes and sizes. Even though the package was missing one of the two snack containers, I still had 19 containers available to use. Having one less snack sized container is still better than having none.

Each plastic container has a matching translucent blue lid that snaps on to form a waterproof seal. These food storage containers are reusable to a certain extent. They need to be handled with some care because the plastic bottoms are not very stiff and can bend, specially the smaller containers.

These containers are lightweight and durable for normal use. Perfect for sharing food with others because they're inexpensive enough to give away.

title: Works great for around my knee
text: I have a bum knee and the muscles around it get really tight. This makes it easy to massage around, and it's easy to control how much pressure is used.

title: Quality Turmeric
text: These work as expected and seem to be a good quality product. I take turmeric daily to help with pain and joint stiffness and it helps quite a lot.

title: Barely any beef flavor
text: If I had paid for this I would be returning it for a refund. For the price they charge I would expect it to taste like beef bone broth instead of just hot water with a very slight hint of beef. Since I got it for free I'll be buying some organic beef broth and adding it to that instead of adding it to hot water. If you want beef bone broth that actually tastes like beef bone broth you shouldn't buy this.

title: Taste great!
text: Delicious way to support your immune system.

title: Extender is awkward to use, but mask bracket is helpful, although seems small
text: I have only used the extenders a couple of times, but I use the mask bracket all the time. The bracket feels like it's made for a child's face, but it is large enough to keep my mask from suctioning to my face, so I find them useful.

title: Goes good in ramen
text: I've been adding some to beef ramen and I really like it. As to benefits I can't tell if there are any as of yet. Often it takes time to notice positive effects with things like this. If I notice anything positive or negative later on I'll update my review.

title: These are helping me a lot.
text: The description makes it sound like they might be gummies, but they're not. They're reasonably sized capsules. These are a great value, as you only need one per day. Finding a quality probiotic for around $7 a month is unheard of. And these definitely are quality probiotics. I can tell they are helping my digestion. I suffer a lot of bloating and loose stools (sorry for TMI), and these have noticeably helped both of those things in just 4 days. I have only taken one other probiotic that helps me as much, and sadly those have been discontinued. Well, not "sadly" anymore, because now I've found these, and at a far cheaper price. I will be buying these from now on!

title: Better than Gatorade Zero in taste and formulation
text: My boyfriend, who sweats like crazy when he mows his father's lawn every week, didn't much like this when he just tried it in the evening, but then he tried the drink he usually tries when he mows, and it tasted better than that, and it also grew on him with time. It has a more appropriate formulation, so I worry less when he is out there working himself to death. Then on top of that, I felt pretty darn wobbly after having some teeth extracted, so I tried some. I loathe Gatorade and have always hated the taste of salt (one reason I sometimes lack electrolytes), and not only did it taste good to me, but I started to feel better right away. This is the good stuff.

title: Still makes me drowsy, but it's my best last resort for serious allergy situations
text: Despite all my other allergy medications, which may vary according to what's going on, my doctor says I can take diphenhydramine for breakthrough symptoms like hives and itching when I have an insect bite or an allergy to food or medication. It's a good old reliable that has kept me out of the emergency room more than once. I always keep some on hand.

title: Tends to cake a little, but a little stirring loosens it up
text: I added this tasty powder to my oatmeal, and that worked out perfectly. It stirred in without any lumping and added a fruity flavor to my breakfast. I haven't found the scoop yet, but it wasn't hard to estimate the amount. The package reseals well, not like most of them. It's an easy way to add some antioxidant fruit to a meal.

title: who does more strenuous outdoor exercising than I do and manages sugar better as well
text: I got this mostly for my boyfriend, who does more strenuous outdoor exercising than I do and manages sugar better as well. That, however, was before we both got the stomach bug. When you've been throwing up, and now you're feeling queasy but thirsty, an electrolyte preparation seems to help things settle even better than my go-to tummy beverage, cola. This one tastes pretty good, can be diluted as much as you like, and doesn't seem to have that nasty greeny-yellow fake coloring like many lemon-lime sports drinks. If, like I did, you suddenly decide to mix it into ice water, let it sit a few minutes after the initial stir so the powder can dissolve and it will be fine. That works a lot better than stirring frantically and tossing patience out the window. Another small hint: when you try to poke the scoop back into the canister, go for the handle-first option. The scoop part is a lot more difficult to insert into the powder.

title: MASS pre-workout supplement
text: I've tried many pre-workout supplements previously. Most of them contain caffeine or large amounts of B12 but this one does not. The container arrived double sealed and has 240 capsules in the container which are gold in color. This provides only 30 servings per container at the recommended serving size which is 8 capsules! The directions state to use 30 minutes prior to your workout and that new users may want to start with only 4 capsules. I'm not a fan of taking pills and having to take 8 capsules prior to my workout isn't appealing by any means. The capsules are average in size but I'd prefer this to be in a powder format instead. You could open up each of the capsules and put them into a shake instead but I have no idea if that would cause any issues. There are a good mix of ingredients in the supplement which does contain some salt and black pepper. The supplement does work for its intended purpose but I had to lower the rating because of the 8 capsule serving size.

title: Apple Cider Vinegar gummie review
text: I wanted the benefits of apple cider vinegar without the bad taste or smell and these gummies seemed to be a good solution. I'm also not a fan of swallowing pills and having to measure out liquid for each dose also wasn't appealing. These gummies arrived sealed and you get a decent amount in the bottle. There was only a slight odor to the gummies but it wasn't overpowering. The gummies actually taste good with only a very slight bitter taste. They contain a good amount of apple cider vinegar with only a small amount of sugar. I had no digestive issues with these gummies or other side effects. I would definitely recommend this apple cider vinegar supplement.

title: Aggressive Labz Creatine Review
text: This creatine supplement arrived in a double sealed container. I was easily able to find the scoop at the top of the container. With a flavor named "Lion's Blood" I was expecting the taste to either be really bad or be somewhat close to blood orange flavor. I used 24oz of water instead of the 8oz suggested and the taste is actually pretty good. It has a light orange taste (because it is watered down from adding more water). There are no extra unnecessary ingredients and no "proprietary blends" in the powder. There is a higher than average amount of creatine in this powder which is reflected in the additional warnings on the label regarding its use. This supplement is targeted toward the serious athlete or body builder and not the casual gym user. I would recommend this supplement for those that need the additional creatine for their sport but it's probably an excessive amount of creatine for the average person. I would recommend this supplement for its intended audience.

title: Mamlyn face mask review
text: These face masks are well made and comfortable. They have pockets for filters and the elastic ear pieces are adjustable. They come with a carrying case as well as a laundry bag to keep the masks from getting lost in the wash. They provide a good amount of coverage and are thick enough to provide a good amount of filtering even without the filter. There was no odor to the masks upon removing from the packaging and they fit well. I would definitely recommend these face masks.

title: Notebook journal review
text: This is a very nice notebook/journal. I use it to track my workouts so that I can see my progress over time. The notebook is hardback with plenty of pages that have a date and page entry areas at the top right corner of each page. The pages are double sided and the lines are spaced far enough apart to allow easy entry and reading. The pages are off-white or light tan which is easy to look at and the notebook comes with an attached ribbon page marker. The size of this notebook is compact which would make carrying or transporting it very convenient and easy. The only thing that I would have liked to see would be stickers or divider tabs which most notebooks come with. Other than that minor issue it's a very nice notebook that is well made and should last for a long time. I would definitely recommend this notebook.

title: Good supplement
text: I have a Boston Terrier at home. I give him daily vitamins and pro-biotic. I had a bit of a hard time giving this supplement as a treat. To get him to eat this, I crumble the supplement and mix it in with his wet food. This way I ensure he takes his supplement. Dogs usually suffer from joint problem as they grow old, I believe it is good to stay ahead of it my taking supplements like this one. I just wish it was delivered bit more economical.

text: [[VIDEOID:729871bf9646df7de2184245b82a82ac]] I bought it on special and the quality is very good. You can charge it easy. It can with charge but I couldn’t make a great video. I like the colors and the volume level and the most important is that us charge usb and touch.

title: Good ingredients
text: From a quality perspective, I believe this is a good product. It contains good ingredients which helps support with brain functions. I prefer to use it in a shake instead of water due to the taste. People will react differently to this powder. I like it because it provides an extra layer of added nutrients that you wouldn't get on a daily basis.

title: Helps to focus
text: I liked the ingredients listed. I like that the bottle includes the exact amount of capsules required for a month supply. Due to the pandemic, this pill is perfect to help you keep focus when working.

title: Good Quality
text: These shower mesh balls are incredible. I liked that it came it secured bag. I used the "soft" mesh ball and it felt amazing. With only water running through it, the mesh felt very soft. It is not your typical mesh ball you get from Walmart.

title: Economical, good trimmer
text: My dad was in need of a nose trimmer. His old trimmer wouldn't do a good job at trimming anymore. When he used this trimmer, he was so happy and impressed. I like that the trimmer can be charged with a USB instead of battery operated. The trimmer is easy to use. It's awesome that it's not only a nose trimmer but can be used to trim other body parts. The best part is that this trimmer is so economical.

title: Absolutely no!
text: I could only get one dose of this down and I will never recommend it. It smelled and tasted like rotten old vomit. After taking it my whole body seemed to flush and heat up. I started sweating even and after a little bit it was like the stuff was seeping out of my pores. This stuff is not good and should not be taken in my opinion.

title: Annoying to use a little and not immune to insects
text: I love these little things! I use a powder makeup over my foundation and the little pad that comes in them gets grubby after a bit because of the foundation I have on first so it's really awesome to have these reusable ones I can use once, place in a netted bag and then wash them when the bag is getting full. It makes me feel more clean too if that makes sense lol. I also use them for my face cleansers to get the makeup off after the day is done. They're pretty handy things.

title: Better than ped-egg
text: I had aped-egg before this for my rough heels and it did ok but after trying out this “cheese grater” lol, I’ll always use this from now on! It does a much better job and my heels are looking better than before. It gets the dead skin cells off without hurting you and it’s easy to handle and use. I highly recommend it!

title: Helps ulcers
text: I got this for my husband mainly because it claimed to help ulcers. So far from what we've seen and used of it, it does help lessen flareups for him and helps him with other stomach issues. He's been putting it in breakfast jars I make for him and so far it's been working to help stop his ulcers.

title: Decent so far
text: I got this for my husband as he has ulcers and stomach issues often. He puts this powder in smoothies and teas and do far seems to be helping him a little bit. His ulcers have caused him less frequent flareups since taking this which is mainly why I got it for him. So hopefully it continues to be helpful and I hope to get more soon.

title: Works amazing!
text: I've never tried heated curler before, and this one is very easy to use for beginners. It gets heated pretty fast.

title: Good product
text: I didn't know red ginseng extract could be in tablets. I used to have the liquid form, and never liked the taste of it. Thankfully I found this! The tablet is just like any other vitamin pill. It doesn't smell or taste weird at all. I think it's great substitution for the liquid ginseng.

title: It doesn't dissolve in water
text: I would recommend using a matcha whisk or egg whisk to mix it with water (or any other liquid) It doesn't really dissolve, so when you drink it, you can feel the powdery texture, and it doesn't feel that great. Overall good product, tastes natural and healthy.

title: Nice pill organizer!
text: It looks tiny in my hand, but there’s plenty of space for all my pills! I have 3 big capsules plus 2 small ones, they fit in easily. The quality is beyond my expectation, great product!

title: I have tried them all and this is my favorite flavor!
text: This stuff is delicious and definently quenches thirst on a hot summer day! Love this stuff!

title: Great taste and great price!
text: Love the berry flavor its my favorite so far. Great ingredients also as I try to stay away from artificial sweeteners. Love this stuff!

title: Great company and great products!
text: I have ordered orange and lemonade with my own money love the taste and the ingredients such a great product! With my order I got a card saying if I emailed I would get free samples of flavors of my choice so I emailed and they said they wouldn't have the samples for a few weeks but if I wanted they would send me a full size tub I said that would be great so they sent a free cup and the full size berry flavor and I got it within a week. Berry flavor is amazing. Fast forward a few weeks to today I got a package in the mail and they also sent me the free sample packs and another cup. I'm shocked with the generosity of this company I was not expecting to also get the samples sent to me I almost cried when I opened the box how sweet of them. Thank you so much for making my day you have a forever customer. Not only does this product keep you healthy and hydrated but it tastes great. P.S. I love mixing berry and lemonade flavors together it tastes great.

title: Great taste!
text: I got the orange flavor to replace artificial sweetener drink mixes and this stuff great! It has the perfect amount of flavor not too overpowering.

title: Four Stars
text: Use it in my diffuser & smells great. Only recommend 1-2 drops!

title: Five Stars
text: Great to use in my diffuser! Def a calming smell

title: Would buy again
text: Small bottle but only need a few drops in the diffuser to have a lasting smell for hours!

title: Four Stars
text: Use it in my diffuser & smells great. Only recommend 1-2 drops!

title: Five Stars
text: Great to use in my diffuser! Def a calming smell

title: Would buy again
text: Small bottle but only need a few drops in the diffuser to have a lasting smell for hours!

title: Powerful
text:
Just one quick smell of this turmeric supplement and you'll know it's powerful. The scent is strong (in a good way) and robust.

I started taking turmeric a few years ago, on the advice of a friend. It's an excellent anti-inflammatory (which I need because of my heavy workouts and roller-coaster medical history), and also has many other proven health benefits.

These capsules are easy to swallow and I really like them.

title: Pleasant taste
text:
Every day I take some sort of magnesium supplements. Typically that's a capsule or pill, but decided to try this powder variety.

Good choice. It makes a pleasant-tasting before-dinner drink -- just add hot water, let it fizz a bit, then add some cold water. It helps get me into a deep sleep.

I've had other magnesium products that helped a bit more with digestion than this one. Still, this is a good supplement and I'll continue to take it. The nighttime beverage I make from it is very soothing.

title: Perfect for take-to-work lunches
text:
Taking my lunch to work each day right now. Real silverware is great, but then I have to bring it back home and clean it. These compostable forks are just what I need for my daily lunches, which include assorted small entrees and veggies.

These don't feel cheap or flimsy like some disposable flatware. And the 150 pack will last me quite awhile.

title: No label = what the heck?
text:
I took this collagen powder a couple of times without realizing there isn't a package label on the front. (There is a small label on the top of the canister, which includes the word "New Item." Hmmmm.)

It's billed as "unflavored" but I did notice some not-great flavor to it when I mixed it with water.

Got this because I take collagen regularly and I usually prefer a powder over capsules (powder seems to work a bit better, for me). Based on the lack of a legitimate label, and the "meh" taste and scent, I'll likely not use this again.

title: Improves complexion
text:
If age alone doesn't affect a man's face (I'm 54), then the current stressful world certainly does.

I've been a fan of collagen since last fall, when I started taking a collagen powder supplement daily. These multi-collagen pills work just as well as the powder, I think. I take one serving (3 pills) per day, with a full glass of water. They're easy to swallow. I also add a Vitamin C supplement when taking these, since collagen reportedly works better in conjunction with that.

I've noticed my face looks a bit plumper (good) and my skin is less dry. Haven't noticed a pain reduction (I'm frequently sore from exercising), but I never expected collagen to help with pain. For me, collagen is for improving one's appearance and this brand does that.

title: Good buy
text: My wife got this kit for me as a fathers day gift. when I opened it I was surprised to see how much was in it. This kit works great I have done a few tats with it so far with no issues from the machines. The machines vary in weights so Im sure there will be a few that suit just about any one. And it does come with everything you need its a travel kit all on its own or makes a great addition to a set work station. I personally wouldn't use the ink for anything more than practice ink, there is nothing wrong with the ink as far as I can see I just have my preferred brand of ink I use. If you are starting out, doing tats as a hobby, or just need a good little travel kit Id recommend this one.

title: Love it so much. Very pure smelling
text: This is an excellent brand. I was blown away by how pure and natural it seems. If it’s not organic, it’s close to it. I don’t know enough about oils to know if they are or aren’t except by using. I know labels aren’t regulated like I thought they were. But I’ve been using them the past few years and done a ton of research online. This fits the bill. I will definitely be purchasing from them in the future. Very nice aroma without any perfumes or additives. If you’ve never tried clary sage, you will love it. It compliments so many other oils. It has a sort of peppery hint to it. It’s fast becoming a favorite.

title: Everyone wants this!
text:
Everyone that comes to my house is so inquisitive about my handy little facial steamer. This does a great job of steaming your face, but can also be used for a lot more. We also use it as a humidifier to put moisture in the air. It does a wonderful job. It’s also good when you have a cold or sinus infection.
It is very well made, easy to assemble and easy to use. The water container is nice and thick and well marked. It gives a steady stream of steam for about 30 minutes. When the water gets low it will make a beeping sound so you know it’s time to either shut down or refill. It adjusts to the height to suit your needs. It swivels easily for convenient placement of the nozzle, so the hot steam can hit you just right. The four rollers on bottom make it easy to take from one place to another. It is a good quality product and I would recommend.

title: A very effective product
text:
This pen light is a wonderful product to own. My husband had surgery several years ago for torn tendons and a rotator cuff. It has always caused him pain. He has been using this pen light faithfully every evening for the last few months and it has helped so much with his pain.
The stand that comes with the light is very useful. It really helps to have hands free convenience. There is a user manual included and it’s very informative and easy to understand. There are also glasses included and a handy caring case useful for travel.
This is a wonderful product. It Is very good quality and a very useful tool. I would highly recommend the USUIE Red light and Phototherapy Penlight.

title: Really helps and I love that it has a timer
text:
This therapy lamp has been a real game changer for my husband. He has been using it every night for six months now. Surgery from a torn rotor cuff and also ankle injuries from a long ago motorcycle accident left him in constant pain as he has gotten older. This light has really help him. We had read about the benefits of red light but were both skeptical, but willing to give it a try, I am so glad he did! He uses it twice a day for 20 minutes each time, for both ankle and arm. The light is very convenient and light weight. The red lights are kinda bright. The panel has 18 LED’s, 3 639 6 660 and 9 850 nm wavelengths. The lights do seem very bright so don’t look directly at them.
I feel like it is very well built and of good quality. The timer works well and is nice that it cuts off after the timed session is done. I kinda wished it came with a user guide/manual but it is sort of self explanatory.
We are well pleased and would highly recommend this red light! It has made a tremendous difference in my husbands pain levels!

title: Gorgeous and nice for resin work
text: I thought these were so cute. They would be nice for Saint Patrick’s Day. I thought I would use them in some resin work or even some candle making. They are a good quality and are just as advertised.

title: Works great
text: Very good, especially for someone with Plantar Fasciitis. My brother has suffered from that and has pain a lot lately. These have really helped him. They are very supportive and comfortable all day long.

title: Really works as it claims!
text:
This thing really works! I love this so much! As someone who has forever had oily skin prone to blackheads, whiteheads and breakouts I can attest to the fact that this is the best thing since sliced bread!
I once payed a dr a lot for dermabrasion on my skin and this is exactly what he used on me!
It really gets the gunk out if your pores! And it helps your products to sink into your skin much deeper and better. My skin feels and looks so great the next day after using this.
It is a well made device. Works as described. Easy to charge and easy to use.
I would highly recommend this product!

title: So convenient and work so good
text: I really like these. They work good. They are soft but could be softer. But they do clean the face good so no complaints there. They came with a lovely case and a laundry bag. It is so convenient to put in there then throw in washer and dryer when full. The black doesn’t fade on anything. Of course, I wouldn’t want to bleach it. They are as good as new after washing each time. Very much a five star because of all included and how nice.

title: Good quality, easy to swallow
text: Working nightshift, my vitamin D stays low. I’m like a vampire lol. So I have to take a supplement of it. These are easy to swallow and don’t leave a bad taste. They keep my level normal. I recommend them. They are a good price too.

title: Good quality at a good price. Easy to swallow
text: Ok guys, this one will be a repurchase! It’s more affordable for what you get. It also doesn’t leave a bad taste and is easy to swallow. It isn’t hard on the tummy like some seem to be. It has a nice amount of probiotics. And different kinds. I work in microbiology so I was well pleased at what is in these.

title: Great value and work just as well as the name brand
text: These really can’t be beat for the price and how well they work. They do seem a tad cheap. Not bad. They sort of clickety clack a little more than the name brand I had but they work just the same. They aren’t too hard or too soft. I like the different colors and I can’t believe the price is so good. I really am pleased with them and recommend.

title: Seems to be working
text: These seem to be working. I don’t get near as hungry and seem to have more energy. There’s no unpleasant taste or smell and they are easy to swallow. That’s a win win.

title: Not worth the price. One cheap plastic ball. ...
text: Not worth the price. One cheap plastic ball. Similar to those you get for tickets at at an arcade.

title: Worked OK
text: So, my daughter has been wanting to try these heatless curlers. This one is comfortable to wear when sleeping yes, but I can't say that the end product was great. The hair had a little curl to it but nothing great. In the end we still had to curl it ourselves in the morning for her pictures. This one is made for long hair. the rod strips are 13 inches long and it does come with 2 removeable ones. Price is ok. We can say we tried it, but it didn't work for her hair.

title: Great For Teens
text: My husband was tired of sharing his trimmer with the boys, so we decided it was time for them to have there own upstairs. We already have this one and love it so we decided to just get another one. This is a zero gapped trimmer that has 3 different lengths to choose from 1,2 or 3 mm. It charges using usb. Fully charged it will last for 180 minutes. It's small for travel and has a really cool design on it, that the boys love. It works great and we have had no problems with it. Great price for a long lasting trimmer.

title: Meh
text: The taste is pretty rough with this stuff.  The only time it's really palatable is when I'm deep in a work out and super thirsty.  Outside of that, it's pretty bad stuff.  I can't really say if it boosts my workout recovery at all, but it was certainly worth trying.  The taste alone is really what kills it for me though.  If this were better, I feel like I'd probably try to get it more often.  As it stands, I think regular water will work just fine.

title: Weak, But Good Flavor
text: For being a Cherry flavored bar, it wasn't very strong.  Not the worst thing in the world, as it was still tasty, but I was hoping for a stronger cherry flavor.  Worked well to stave off hunger, in instances I wasn't able to get a meal right away.  Was a great alternative to snag, right before heading to gym.  I could then go a few extra hours afterwards, without feeling super hungry.  Great way to help me lose weight.
