text: This order includes 16 vividly colored shower steamers, four in each color and fragrance. The thank you card included in the box tells me that the blue is eucalyptus, the orange is rose, the purple is lavender, and the yellow is lemon. Each steamer is in its own compartment within the box, and each is individually wrapped in plastic. They also each have bits of petal or other plant parts on top of the steamer to enhance the appearance even further. The aroma of each steamer is strong, and I smelled them as soon as I opened the box. Each of the four fragrances is distinctly different. This is a very nice set with a great presentation, and I consider it a good value and a very giftable item.

title: Perfect after a day working in the yard
text: First tried this foot massager after a day of digging up tree roots from a huge pine tree - it'll take a few more days to finish that job.  At any rate, my feet hurt from all the shovel work, especially my left foot.  I initially set the compression control to the lowest settings, the roller setting to high and included the heat.  After a short period I upped the compression to high and that felt great.  I sat back and enjoyed the massage for about 20 minutes and my feet felt great afterwards.  My wife, who has very wide feet with  no arches tried the massager but didn't care for it.  I was just the opposite, I loved it.  I've used the machine three times since that first experience and have continued to enjoy it immensely.  Definitely recommend starting out on the lowest compression setting until you get used to it.  I wear 9.5 shoes and the massager easily accommodated my feet.  I'd suspect that the massager would easily handle significantly larger feet.  Highly recommended.

title: Helps Senior Pet with Improved Mobility
text: I actually got these for my ancient cat, since he weighs as much as a small dog and can benefit just as much from the glucosamine and other ingredients in this treat. When I first offered it to my cat as a whole treat, he was totally uninterested. I broke it up into tiny pieces, but he still wanted nothing to do with it. He goes absolutely nuts over his wet cat food, though, so I have been breaking each treat up into a powder form and stirring it in with his cat food before I give it to him. He's in the habit of gobbling his wet cat food down to the last morsel, and putting this soft chew in his food didn't slow him down one iota. It takes a while for glucosamine to start having an effect in humans, and I figure the same is probably true in animals, but I am starting to see an improvement in his stiffness and his mobility. At one chewy treat per day, and 60 soft chews per package, these will last me for two months. I consider this a good value at $19.99, and I believe my cat does, too.

title: Vibrant Colors, Fantastic Fizz, Fun to Watch
text: These bath bombs have the best spin and fizz of any bath bombs I have ever had. I was so busy watching the show once I dropped one into the tub that I totally forgot to take pictures until it was more than halfway gone, but it was still spinning and fizzing away down to the very last bit. The bath bomb floats on the surface, and if I push it under the water, it bounces right back up, so the entire spinning, colorful effect stays readily visible. The whole show lasted for about 15 minutes. The colors are vibrant. The blue cap dissolves first, and the purple and orange dissolve pretty evenly after that. The fragrance is faintly floral. It leaves my bath water a beautiful reddish orange. The oils and salts in the bath bomb feel very soothing to my skin and leave it feeling clean, soft, and well moisturized when my bath is done. The bath bomb did not leave a residue or a stain of any kind. These bath bombs spin very energetically, and I would not recommend putting one in something as small as a foot bath. Instead, use them in a regular bath tub per the instructions. The only reason I gave these delightful bath bombs a 4 star instead of a 5 star is because the box, instead of being shrink wrapped like most bath bomb sets, is instead held together with a huge piece of packaging tape that goes all the way around the box. When the tape is removed, it leaves a wide stretch of stickiness that prevents the box from being set on anything after that or it will stick to it and spread the adhesive to whatever the box is placed on. This also prevents the box from being used as a gift box, although the bombs themselves make great gifts. Fortunately, this is a problem that can be easily remedied by the seller. Either shrink wrap the box, or just put a tiny amount of tape or another type of seal on the edges of the box, not all the way around the top and bottom. In the meantime, I simply transferred the rest my bath bomb set to another container, no problem. I think these 12 large (4.2 oz), vibrantly colored, fantastically fizzing bath bombs are a good value and very giftable, even if I have to place them in another box each time.

title: Would make a great gift
text: Pack of 12 small bottles (10ml each) in a very nice presentation box.  A nice selection of essential oils.  Pretty much the most popular oils.  I personally use some of them for various repellent concoctions (mice in the basement, deer in the gardens, mosquitoes everywhere).  Others I use in a diffuser.  The oils that I've used so far all have decent aromas, particularly the lemon and rose.  Combined with a small diffuser this set would make a great gift for someone new to essential owners.  Recommended.

title: Easy and Quick to Use, Works Well
text: This order includes a set of 10 markers, 10 crayons, and a plastic sharpener for the crayons. There are six colors designed to match wood types: oak, maple, chestnut, mahogany, cherry, and walnut. There are four colors to match paint instead of wood types: black, white, gray, and burnt sienna. Each marker and corresponding crayon is labeled accordingly. I have used furniture wood repair markers before, but I have purchased them individually as needed, so it's nice to have a complete set on standby. I tested several of the colors on various bits of older furniture around the house, and each worked well. For the current list price of $15.88 for the full set of 10 crayons, 10 markers, and a sharpener, I consider this a good value and a useful item to keep on hand.

title: Not as clingy as others, much more expensive
text: I like the idea of compostable cling wrap although with the amount I use it isn't going to have much of an impact no matter what.  We compost most everything we possible can and I used the resulting compost in my garden.  For me an environmentally friendly product has to produce results similar to its nonfriendly competitors.  For cling wrap I'm not going to pay twice as much for a role of cling wrap that's compostable compared to a better product that's not compostable.  In this case the compostable cling wrap is not as good, or anywhere as cheap, as the noncompostable versions.  Amazon has premium noncmpostavle 100' roles of cling wrap for less than half as much as this product.  And quality wise, I couldn't get the wrap to cling to itself at all.  I did like the cutter, it worked fine.  Bottom line is that it didn't perform as well as competitors and it cost twice as much.  Pass.

title: Quality Steamers at a Reasonable Price & Not Just for Women
text: I've enjoyed a number of different shower steamers over the past few years after discovering some at a resort my wife & I stayed at - so steamers aren't just for women.  I ordered these steamers based on quantity and price.  Eight steamers for $12 is a pretty good deal if the steamers are any good and these are.  I've used two of the steamers so far, the lemon and the sweet orange, and both both smelled good and lasted for more than a single shower.  Used per the directions, placed in a corner not under direct spray, the steamers released a pleasing, relatively strong, true to the indicated fragrance, aroma.  On opening the box I was a bit concerned that the steamers weren't labeled with their scent.  They were packaged with the labels on the underneath side of the individual steamers.  I don't like guessing at what fragrance a steamer has and the labels solve that problem.  This package of steamers would make a nice house warming gift or for most any other occasion.  Highly Recommended.

title: Huge Variety of Sounds, Nice Clear Audio
text: This sound machine is truly impressive with the wide variety of sounds it makes. The instruction manual is detailed and accurate regarding which sounds are there, and in what order, something I don't often find with a sound machine and which I most definitely appreciate. There are six different categories of sound: ASMR (autonomous sensory meridian response, which theoretically stimulates tingling skin and euphoria), Animals, Life, Babies, Nature, and Combination Scene. ASMR includes such unusual sound machine noises as eating potato chips and drinking water, as well as some music selections. The Animals category includes a cicada, pigeon, seagull croak, two different sets of birdsongs, frogs croaking, and crickets. Life includes flipping through a book, a campfire, drinking coffee, keyboard sounds, a train, and a ticking clock. Babies includes two music box selections, two songs being sung, a heartbeat, a lullaby, and ringing. Nature includes dripping water, two different wind sounds, two wave sounds, two thunderstorm sounds, a waterfall, and two rain sounds. Combination Scene includes soft background music (called leisure time), an urban street, a suburban pond, ocean waves, a seashore with playing children with waves and seagulls, an aircraft terminal, a coffee shop, a thunderstorm, sounds in the forest, a farmyard, muffled voices in a library, and something called life force which sounds like blood running though a vein as heard through a stethoscope. There is also a light that can be set at "breathing" (changing intensity), low, medium, and high. There is also a digital readout telling the temperature and the humidity at that location, be it indoors or outdoors. (The instructions do say not to use this sound machine in a high temperature environment, though). There is a timer button (the picture of a clock) with options of 20, 40, or 60 minutes, or continuous playback. There is also a volume button. Press and hold to increase the volume to the desired level, press and hold again to decrease the volume.  On it's own, the sound machine will play each sound one at a time through all the categories. Press the button with bars on it to change from category to category, and the button with musical notes on it to change from sound to sound within the category. If I find one I want to keep listening to, I can press the lock button to keep it set on that sound. It will remember the last sound played when it is next turned on. The sound machine has a battery, and charges via USB cord. The USB-micro USB cord is included, but not a USB to DC adapter. As you can probably tell, I really like this sound machine and all its many features. The original list price was $59.99, but it is currently marked down to $19.99. I think this is an incredibly good deal at this price.

title: Toenail Clippers Worked Great, Fingernail Clippers Did Not
text: This set consists of a pair of toenail clippers and a set of fingernail clippers. They come in a nice tin box. Inside, there is a form-fitting piece of hard foam with nice cutouts to allow me to easily pick up each pair of clippers. I used the toenail clippers first, and was very pleased with them. The action is smooth, the blade is nice and sharp, and the clippers are very heavy duty. There is a nice ridged area on the end of the handle to allow for a sure grip when using the clippers. The upper half of the handle contains a built-in nail file which does an excellent job of filing. The blades are nicely aligned. Normally I clip my fingernails and toenails right after I get out of the shower, because that's when they are the softest. This time I cut my nails when they were dry and hard, and the toenail clippers had no difficulty whatsoever. Then I switched to the fingernail clippers. The fingernail clippers are just a smaller version of the toenail clippers, same design. Unlike the toenail clippers, however, the fingernail clippers were extremely stiff and hard to press. It took me two hands to close the blade the first time. I figured it was just because they were new, so I kept pressing the handle repeatedly until they loosened up a little. They were still so stiff that I could not use the fingers of my left hand to clip the fingernails on my right hand--the clippers were simply too hard to push down. The only way I could use my left hand to cut my fingernails was if I curled my hand in such a way that I was using the palm of my hand to push the handle down on the clippers. Very awkward at best. I will keep working with the fingernail clippers in the hope that the tension on them will loosen up a bit with repeated use, but they are certainly not my favorite pair at the moment. The toenail clippers rate an easy 5 stars, but the fingernail clippers bring my rating for the entire set down to 3 stars.

title: Three Nice Fragrances in Easy Roll-on Applicators
text: Love these roll on applicators. They are 3 1/4 inches tall, and they each seal tightly without leakage after being used, so they are convenient for keeping handy in my pocket, desk, or travel kit. Each applicator ball rolls freely and applies a thin layer of oil without dripping. The three scents are Frankincense, Citrus Glow, and Real Love. Citrus Glow is an essential oil blend of orange, lemon, pink grapefruit, bergamot, and vanilla. Real Love is an essential oil blend of Copaiba balsam, pink grapefruit, geranium, , lavender, Ylang ylang, and black pepper. Each bottle contains 10 ml of oil, which should last for quite some time. These oils are USDA certified organic and non GMO, which is a nice plus.

title: Comfortable, Well Made, Breathable, Adjustable
text: Per my wife: There are so many positive things to say about this mask! The design of the mask leaves a nice little air pocket right below my nostrils, making it easy to breathe even when I take a deep breath. Too many times I have felt the discomfort, bordering on paranoia, of feeling a mask sucked up into my nostrils when I was already short of breath. Never a problem with this mask! The adjustable nose band strip lets me get a perfect fit with every wearing so that I have no gaps and so that my glasses don't fog up even with heavy breathing. The wide, soft, stretchy and adjustable ear loops are very gentle on my ears and make it a pleasure to wear this mask for extended periods of time. The inner mesh lining is smooth and comfortable against my face and is also very easy to breath through. The mask comes with two filters, but the overlapping mesh layers inside the mask make me feel quite safe wearing the mask as is without using a filter for my normal everyday activities. It's definitely nice to know I have that option, however, before entering a more crowded or more unsafe environment. This mask is very well made. The stitches are nice and even, and all the outer seams are sewn with good heavy duty thread. The ear loops are a continuation of the upper and lower edges of the mask as opposed to attached separately, which makes for a much stronger mask. the only way those ear loops are coming off is if you physically cut them off. I have tried quite a number of masks over the last year, and so far this one is my definite favorite. 5 stars.

title: Lightweight, Portable, Easy to Use
text: This little round sound machine stands upright on two legs and takes up very little space on a desk, a nightstand, or in a piece of luggage. It is 3 1/2 inches in diameter and about 1 3/4 inches deep. It has a USB charger, and once charged, will run as a stand alone machine. You could run it plugged in if you lay it on its face or tilted it on it's side, but the charger provided will not plug into the upright machine because the legs sit too low for that. It's quite stable both on its side and on its face, though, so it's not a major deal. The operation of the sound machine is super easy. Hold the power button for three seconds to turn it on (or off), turn the front dial to choose one of six sounds (brook, thunder, white noise, wave, wind, or bonfire). Use the + and - buttons to adjust the volume, and use the button with the picture of a light bulb to turn the night light function on. The choices are one light, three lights, or six lights, and the fourth push of that button turns the night light off. The lights fade in and out in as if they are "breathing." The night light, even with all six lights on, is not actually bright enough to function like a night light in the traditional sense--even in total darkness, it does not light up the surroundings enough to be able to see anything except the lights themselves. I think it's purpose is more to give something rhythmic to focus on while falling asleep. The sound machine can be left on continuously, or you can set a timer for increments of 20 minutes ranging from 20-120 minutes. when setting the timer, the number of lit lights, 1-6, multiplied by 20 lets you know what length of time you've set. For a basic, easy to use, lightweight, portable, stand alone sound machine that can be used at home, at work, or while traveling, this little sound machine fits the bill perfectly. 5 stars.

title: Nice Mask, Poor Translation re Health Tips
text: Per my wife: This package comes with two identical masks, so I'll just describe one of them. This is a very nice mask, well fitting, well made, with good facial coverage for me from my nose to under my chin. It has an adjustable nose band, adjustable ear loops, and a slot for a filter if desired. It's made in China, and the Health Tips as written on the package are a little rough as far as the translation. What the package says versus what I believe they meant : "into the bag after use. Carry this product" (keep the storage bag with you to store the mask when not wearing it). "please divide the opposite side" (open the filter slot and use a filter in it). "do not wear back, anti-external will stick dust powder, direct contact between mouth and nose will be detrimental to health." (Don't wear the mask inside out because the outside can get contaminated). "Wash the poison once a day." (Wash off any contaminates daily).  "wash it with warm water first, then bot and hot to dry". (I think "bot" means "blot it off"). So, no, the seller is not saying the mask is poison, as one person thought who rated the mask a one star because of it. This package comes with two very nice masks, a storage bag for the mask when not wearing it, and a mesh laundry bag to put the mask in when it's being laundered. The universal laundry symbols on the mask say to wash cold (though the Health Tips say wash warm), do not bleach, do not dry flat, okay to iron, do not tumble dry, and okay to dry clean using process A (the dry cleaner should know what that means). Since you can't tumble dry the mask per the universal instructions, perhaps "bot and hot to dry" may mean blot the mask off and dry it in the sun or iron it dry. Not sure. In spite of the language barrier in translation, I like the masks, the storage pouch, and the mesh laundry bag. and am rating this complete package 5 stars.

title: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure
text: At the moment I'm not sick so I haven't taken any of the items in this kit. However I'm 68 years old and I have been sick a few times during my 68 years and Vicks has always been a trusted brand in my parents'  and my households.  This kit includes everything a person would need to fight off the flu or a common cold.  The item isn't actually listed yet on Amazon so I don't know what the sale price is going to be and can't comment on the value of the product but I know I'm glad I've got it in reserve.

title: Tiny Soft gel Packs Powerful Punch - Only Take 1 Per Day
text: Hard to believe this tiny little soft gel contains 625% of the recommended daily value of Vitamin D, but it does. 125 mg of D3 equals 5000 IU. These soft gels are so easy to swallow, too. According to the National Institutes of Health, the safe upper daily limit of Vitamin D is 4000 IU daily, so one soft gel is already arguably too much. It takes very little sunlight, as little as 15 minutes a day for light skinned people, to meet their entire daily needs of Vitamin D, never mind the extra Vitamin D taken in through normal dietary sources. The "recommended use" on the label is to take one soft gel in the morning and another at night, which to me seems incredibly risky. The whole point of taking a supplement is to help you stay healthy, not to put you into the hospital with self-induced health problems. Because of how tiny they are and how easy they are to swallow, I would rate these soft gels at 5 stars, as long as they are taken once a day, not twice.

title: Web Page Info Isn't Quite Right
text: #1 Don't believe what you think you see.  The first two photos on the web page make the scrubber head look ridiculously large, it isn't.  It's a normal sized brush head, same as the other brush I use.  The specifications say that the brush is 15" long, it isn't.  It's more like 13 3/4".  It also talks about bristles on both nice, not true.  I'm dinging it one star for the misinformation.  The brush itself is great.  Two sides, one with bristles, one with flexible rubber type protrusions.  The bristles are fairly stiff, which I like for scrubbing in the shower.  The other side feels good dry.  I use it on my lower back kind of like a massager.  Don't pay a lot of attention to the web page info.  It's a very nice shower brush and I recommend it despite the misinformation.

title: Soothing, Great Way to Fall Asleep
text: Went to sleep last night to the sound of water running over stones in a meandering stream.  Also had a soft white light illuminating the bedroom.  Before heading to bed I tried out all of the options offered by this sound machine/nightlight.  It has sounds/music to match most any tastes.  I gravitated to the nature sounds as they were different from other music/sounds I've used to help me go to sleep.  The machine offers nature sounds, short 4 lullabies and six selections of "white music."  One of the "white music" selections is the sound of a running clothes dryer.  That was surprisingly relaxing.  There is only one soft light and it's white.  there are a number of selectable colored lights but for me they were way too bright to be used when going to sleep.  Although the instructions don't mention it, it's possible to set the bright lights to continually change.  The sound quality is surprisingly good.  The controls are very sensitive "touch screen" type and are easy to remember after using the machine a few times.  Especially at the price I think this sound machine is a good deal.  Recommended.

title: Nice Clear Sound, Super Easy to Use
text: This little sound machine has an impressively clear sound to it. After going through the range of nature sounds, white noise, lullabies, color choices, and volumes, I was thoroughly impressed. There were a few surprises. Under the White Noise section, one of the choices was "Fetal Heart Sound," the sound you would hear with a fetal ultrasound. Another was "Clothes Dryer." Both of those sounds were extremely soothing, and something I could easily fall asleep to. I can understand the heartbeat being soothing, but who would have guessed the sound of a clothes dryer would prove to be a peaceful background noise? Of the color choices, my favorite was one called "Colorful Breath Light." That turned out to be simply rolling through the different color choices and intensities, but it was very pleasing to watch, especially with one of the lullabies or nature sounds playing softly in the background. There is also a timer function that allows you to set the timer for 15, 30, 60, 90, or 120 minutes. I like that the user manual that came with it told me exactly what sounds and colors were on the machine so that I didn't have to figure it out by trial and error. I am genuinely enjoying this sound machine. The only hard part is trying to decide whether to keep it on my computer desk or on my bedroom nightstand.

title: Beautiful Mask, Excellent Face Coverage
text: Per my wife: I really, really like these beautiful Galaxy pattern face masks. They provide fantastic coverage of my face from the bridge of my nose down to the end of my chin, without leaving any gaps. They leave a bit more room inside the masks for my nose than all my other masks do, which means there is a little pocket of extra breathing room that I absolutely love. I am a deep breather, and when a mask presses right up against my nostrils whenever I inhale, it makes it hard to breath without feeling like I'm being smothered. These masks come in a pack of two identical masks. Each mask has two filters. The masks are 4-ply masks, not counting the filter, and with that many layers of protection already, I didn't feel like I actually needed the filter for normal everyday use. It's nice to know the option is there, though, and I will keep them in case I need them at some future time. The ear loops are adjustable, and without adjustment they were long enough that they would easily accommodate a face much larger than mine. The elastic of the ear loops was strong but comfortable. The stitches on the mask were tiny and precise, and the material felt quite durable. I have been hesitant to order 4 play masks because the first few that I tried were too hard to breath through, but that is absolutely not the case with these galaxy masks. If I have to wear a mask, I might as well jazz it up a bit, and these galaxy masks are protective, pretty, and fun to wear all in the same package

title: Comfortable, Form Fitting, Well Made
text: These black masks are extremely comfortable. There is no nose bridge, but the way they are designed created a good fit and there was not an issue with my glasses fogging up. They provided good coverage for my face, and I did not have any gaps either on the sides of my face nor at my chin. The ear loops, though not adjustable, were comfortable and were the right length for me. These masks appear to be well made, with two rows of stitching all around the edges. The ear loops have the same double row of stitching holding them in, which is nice. The mask is thick (the description says it has built-in dual filters), so it is a little harder to breathe through than others I own. I would wear something a bit more breathable for exercising or for all-day use, but for running errands around town this mask is great. 5 stars.

title: Comfortable, Breathable, Great Fit
text: These three black masks come individually packaged, each in its own resealable bag, which is a great way to store each one when not in use. With all the masks out there on the market these days, little things like this make a good first impression on me. This mask fit perfectly right out of the package. I found it to be comfortable, easily breathable, and providing good facial coverage. It did not fog up my glasses. There is no noseband, nor are the earloops adjustable, but because of the shape and cut of the mask, I found those things weren't needed. The mask is handwash and drip dry only, but this is easy enough to do. I am very satisfied with this mask and can easily see myself wearing it comfortably all day long.

title: Quality for less than $0.75 per bag
text: For less than 75 cents per bag these are a heck of a deal.  A variety of sizes for all but the largest gifts.  And if I give somebody a new BMW, I'm not wrapping it.  The bags are very good quality and I'd expect they'll last through a number of back and forth gifts.  They come with pull ribbons installed for very easy closure and they even have gifts tags so you don't have to remember who gets which bag.  Great colors, great construction, great price - a triple winner that gets 5 stars.

title: Extremely Light Weight
text: These boxes are extremely light weight, so they would be fine for a gift like socks or jewelry, for example, but not for something as heavy as a bottle of perfume or cologne. They are very attractive and very easy to assemble. The photos make this box look copper color, but it is actually a brilliant golden color. Because of the thinness of the cardboard, I have downgraded these otherwise fine boxes to a 4 star.  Recommend but only for light weight items.

title: WONDERFULLY LEMON AND USDA ORGANIC!
text: I love lemon EOs! This oil is USDA organic, non GMO, and smells fresh and citrusy. I have sampled many essential oils but this is my first time using US Organic Nature for Nature. I would definately order more products from this brand. A+

title: GENEROUS SIZED SANDLEWOOD EO
text: If you love sandlewood, you will love this oversized bottle of oil. I prefer non GMO and organic essential oils and  even though it isn't labeled as USDA organinc, this oil is light and clean with that familiar scent of sandlewood. It arrived neatly packaged with a sealed lid and a glass dropper.

title: AHHHHH!
text: I have tried a few neck support/release products. This seems to contour my head very well. What I especially like is the grey center support- it is inset with a softer foam and feels amazing-ahhh! For complete immersion, add an eye mask, candle or aromatherapy, spa music, and a bolster or body pillow under the knees for about 15 minutes. You will feel completely rejuvinated!

title: ABUNDANCE OF ANTIOXIDANT PROTECTION
text: This powder has an abundance of antioxidant protection and is a good source of vitamin c. This mixes easily in water and has a neutral balanced flavor with a slight graininess. This could be added to a water bottle for on the go goodness or added to a smoothie for additional nutrition. Another option, would be to add this to soup or sauces to boost the nutritional profile. Great, easy to use product.

title: Seem to be doing its job
text: It’s hard to judge of a supplement is working or not unless you’ve been taking it for a long time, especially if taking multiple supplements. After a month of taking these my strength has increased so I’ll take that as a good sign. I take two capsules after a workout they are easy to swallow and have no taste. So I think I will order more and continue to take them.

title: Good mushroom supplement
text: Since learning  about the health benefits of mushrooms I have been supplementing with them for about eight months now. I have tried many different brands and combinations of mushrooms and would put this One near the top of the list. Not only are they easy to swallow but since taking I can feel the mental clarity and focus which is one of the benefits of taking a mushroom supplement. I would highly recommend

title: Mixes so easy!
text: I LOVE that this is made from all natural ingredients! I’ve used it for a week- one scoop and today I really noticed it. I felt the tingle. I used slightly more in my glass than usual. Usually I cannot stand the taste of these pre workout mixes. They are so digustingly fake sickly sweet with artificial sweeteners and colors. Neon greens, oranges- blah! . This one is just slightly sweet and doesn’t leave that coating of sweetness in  your mouth.  The color is made from natural ingredients. The flavor is slightly floral. I like it!

title: They work
text: I received these last week and finally cleared out my messy Tupperware cabinet in my kitchen. These stack nicely and the lids seal  well. I’ve washed several and they’ve held up fine. They are a great time for leftovers. You can fit about three on top of each other on a shelf in the fridge with a little spare room. I like them. I’d definitely purchase these. As far as sturdiness- they are more of the take along that after months of daily use would probably crack- these aren’t super thick- so I wouldn’t say you’d have them for years and years- but they get the job done.

title: Mixes well
text:
I know this might sound strange, but I’m
Not a huge smoothie fan. I do however drink one cup of coffee before the gym every morning. I add a teaspoon to my coffee and mix well. It changes the taste a little but it’s definitely do- able and enables me to get my greens in first thing! You need so little of it that the bag lasts a long time! I enjoy a healthy lifestyle and this benefits me.

title: Love these things!
text: If you have ever been to physical therapy, you know what these do.  To me, that was my favorite part of physical therapy!  I love the stimulation these give.  It definitely provides pain relief.  This one looks like a small cell phone.  It comes with patches and leads.  The instruction book is easy to read.  The patches stick well and can be used over and over.  You can easily use it while watching TV.  The vibration is very relaxing and pain relieving.

title: Causes good pain.
text: This roller is great for working out stiffness and muscle pain.  It does hurt to use it.  But you get that hurt that helps!  I used it on my calves.  But it was a little too much for my boney lower leg.  It was much better with lightweight leggings on.  I was able to roll it up and down and then change directions and roll sideways.  It has two handles on the sides and one on the top.  I found I was able to roll it on my upper arms by holding one side handle and the top handle.  I was able to roll it all the way around my arm.  I am hoping this also works kind of like a fascia roller.  I have cellulite on my arms that I hate.  Time will tell on that part.  This felt the best on my thighs.  So much more relaxed muscles afterwards.  I even rolled this up and down my lower back.  You don't get the same deep massage because of the way it's made.  But it does help.  I could roll it up and down my hip as well.  I get very painful hips.  This seemed to work out some of the pain.  It's so simple.  But, it does help.

title: Just like the big ones!
text: This little straightener is fantastic!  It's small.  It's only 7 1/4" long.  You can even carry it in your purse.  It's USB chargeable and comes with the charging cord but no plug.  The charge lasts quite awhile. The flat iron plate is flat on one side and the other side has tiny little teeth to help glide your hair through.  It heats up pretty quickly. I took off one star because the temperatures are all in Celsius.  I just used the highest one.  But I don't know what temperature that is.  It does have a light to show when it needs to be recharged.  I could not curl my hair with this.  But in all honesty I have never been able to curl my hair with a straightener.  I can flip the ends under.  I also could use it to add volume on the top.  Perfect little tool.

title: Look for the oil and brush under the plastic container.
text: I was a little disappointed when I thought this unit didn't come with a cleaning brush as shown.  I looked and looked in all the bags and no brush or oil.  It's on the underneath side!  I am glad I checked before throwing the container away!  This is a nice small shaver.  Perfect for travel and everyday use.  It does a good job of getting all the hairs cut.  I have always found manual hand shavers to give a closer shave than electric.  It's true with this rechargeable shaver as well.  But it's so much more convenient to use.  This one uses a USB rechargeable cord.  Charges in an hour and last about one and a half hours.  You can use it on your face, bikini area, legs, and underarms.  There's two different shaving heads.  The combs are useless.  It comes with a bag which is great for travel.  Nice shaver.

title: Thin shiny boxes.
text: These are gold textured boxes.  They are white inside.  Pretty easy to put together with the notches and insert holes.  The top has a flap that comes over and they included clear round patches to keep it closed.  The box is 6 x 6 x 4 inches when assembled.  The cardboard is thin.  But it would be great for small gifts.  Lined with tissue paper or plastic wrap it would be nice for food gifts.  Pretty much like most gift boxes you buy in the store.  Only the gold does make a nicer presentation of your gift.

title: Nice size!
text: I love this size container.  It's perfect for so many things!  If you're wondering how big 25oz. is it measures 5 1/2" x 5 1/2" x 1 3/4".  The tops fit securely on and it has a handy thumb tab on one corner.  They are textured around the bottom.  You can use them in the microwave and also put them in the dishwasher.  These are great for carrying your lunch or for leftovers.  No nasty plastic smells!  The lids are recessed so they nestle on top of each other.  Great for craft supplies, too!

title: If you don't take a lot of pills!
text: These pill containers are oval.  They measure about 2 1/4" long and 1" wide.  It's divided into morning and night - sun and moon.  They are pretty tiny.  You can put (4) large pills in each side - more if smaller pills.  They close with a secure clasp and rest in a plastic tray.  They stay put in the tray very well.  Each container is marked with the days of the week and they are all different colors.  I would not call these "large".  If you don't take a lot of pills you will like this.  If you take a lot of pills you probably better pass on this one.

title: Clean up is a chore
text:
This was a surprise gift for my wife. She was blown away by this Collapsible Spa Massager with Hot Bubbles.

Everything was very adjustable to her liking. The heat, bubbles, vibration and rollers provided additional sensation to the massage experience. For a home foot massager, it was an awesome experience.

Cleaning up was not fun. After such a relaxing massage, I had to make sure the power cord stayed dry while navigating a pail of water to the garden for dumping.

Overall, I would say this is an excellent machine if you can convince your other half to do the clean up after.

title: Lets too much light penetrate through the sides.
text:
I own a different version of a similar eye massager that I recently gotten from Amazon as well. Comparing the 2, I prefer the other version.

The difference between the 2 version are how the eye massager functions. I felt this version is more exposed. The massager nodes are more pronounced and might have a little less padding. It doesn't cup your eyes and block out all the light. The other version blocks off almost all the light and gives a more smoothing feel. Because it is darker without light penetrating through the sides, I felt the other model made me more relaxed.

Other than that, both versions had heat, similar massage and bluetooth music (which I didn't bother to connect).

Overall, if price doesn't matter too much, check out on Amazon:
Eye Massager with Hot Compress and Vibration by LTLKY

title: Charging wire should not be a proprietary cable
text:
The shaver is small and portable. Great for traveling. I don't grow any beard and shave daily to get rid of the stubble. This is great for my usage.

Only thing I wish is that the plug for the charger could have been a USB C or a mini USB port instead of a proprietary charging cable. If you lose the cable during travel, it's so troublesome to find a replacement. It would make more sense to use a common charging port.

title: Smart Hairdryer with temperature control.
text: I have never owned a hairdryer that allows temperature adjustment. I was impressed. Now I can blow my kid's hair without worrying about burning his scalp since he has such fine hair. This comes with 3 attachments and a hairbrush. I have straight hair so the comb nozzle was something I really liked which I have never used previously. For $80 it's comparable to higher end hairdryer. Hairdryers are an investment. I wash my hair daily so I feel $80 is not a bad price for something that is used so frequently.

title: Very good cleaner
text: I have tested a lot of different cleaners. This one is pretty good! Works very well

title: Very good cleaner
text: My wife and I tested this cleaner on our kitchen. And we can confirm it is working and working very good!

title: Super quality
text: Trusted brand and trusted quality. What else you can say!?

title: Excellent olive oil
text:
This olive oil is a very goo product. Tastes excellent with the slight notes of the olive pit!
Ideal for cooking and salad dressing.
My only concern is that it comes in a plastic bottle. I do recommend to put oil into glass bottle instead.
Claims that comes from Italy and bottled in U.S.A.

title: Create your own icy surface
text:
This spray takes a little practice. My first two tries I had a drippy look. It’s really about the proximity to the surface. Once I got that down , I didn’t have any drips. Also the drips do somewhat self correct by the time it crystallizes. Between the drips and the wet look I was sure that the product wasn’t going to work. The can stated to wait and indeed Magic does happen. The formula really does make ice crystals. I tried it on both windows and mirrors with the same fantastic results. The substance does have a strong scent so some extra ventilation can’t hurt. I also wouldn’t let my young kids spray it, even though they wanted to. I would say the scent is a chemical spray paint type of odor. Also, to clean, I had to go over the area multiple times. I went with windex and paper towels. It does work but you really have to get it off or it smears the icicles and leaves a foggy icy look. But with plenty of Windex and clean paper towels, I had a clean surface again.

This stuff is really neat. It would be a festive addition to windows and mirrors for holiday gatherings and Christmas morning.

title: Simple way to keep my pores clean
text:
The face cleaning brush comes with three separate cartridges. Two of them have soft, fine brush bristles while the third is silicone. The handle is quite small and easy to operate. The buttons respond immediately and control the power and way the brush head spins.

For being such a small device I find it to be very powerful. I really don’t need to scrub hard at all and the brush bristles just do their job. My wife and teen daughter do a lot of face masks and other things to keep their faces fresh, but I feel like this more simple electric face cleaning brush is all I need.

title: Deep scrubbing action with little effort
text: These pumice stones have officially made it into my must have section for cleaning supplies. These particular stones are longer and rectangular in shape. They have a lightweight feel but are easy to grip because of their longer size. For me, I use the stones corners for smaller areas or to really work certain areas needing a deeper clean. The pumice does wear away which also helps with melding it to the area I am working with. The stones are natural and I like that they don’t contain any chemicals. I don’t find that they have an odor either. They work well and because they are rough they don’t take very much pressure. Instead consistent pressure and forward/back motion to get an area clean is all it tales. I have used them in sinks, toilets and my tub. Of course not all the same stick. But I do like that this is a multipack. This is also a good set because there are six individual bars to use. They come individually wrapped too so they stay in pristine condition until your ready to use them.

title: Small rolls of gauze
text: These are small gauze rolls but I do like that they are individually wrapped. They are easy to stick inside a first aid kit or keep handy. The gauze is soft.  The rolls are non-sterile but they are latex free and 100% polyester. There is one tiny roll of medical tape included with the set. Overall I find these to be good quality gauze rolls. Again the fact that they are individually wrapped and smaller makes them easy to use and less wasteful.

title: Little polished hearts
text: These hearts are smoothly polished and colorful. My youngest daughter wanted them for her fairy garden she has created. She used them as “stepping stones” up to her fairy house.

title: Helps to relieve the itch
text:
I bought one of these in the brand name version a while back. I was pleased with how it worked and wanted another one to keep in my first aid kit and give my teen for her purse.

The device is extremely similar to the brand name. It works in the same manner as well. I wouldn’t say it’s exactly the same though. The construction seems to be lacking but just by a bit. If I hadn’t used the name brand one then I probably wouldn’t know.

I have had good success relieving the itch in both old and new bug bites. Depending on the bite it may need to be done again for continued relief. While other bites can be a one and done treatment. The younger children just take some practice with it. It does have a light pressure but it’s not painful. I also liked that this one comes with multiple devices versus just the one. It helps to have them stationed in different bathrooms and first aid kits.

title: Very soft on skin
text:
These are very soft cotton balls. They’re made of 100% cotton. My wife likes to use cotton balls to remove her eye make up. She says they are some of the softer cotton balls she has ever used. Her eyes are very sensitive and when trying to rub off her makeup having soft fibers help.

The cotton balls are slightly smaller in size but she can comfortably use one cotton ball per eye to remove her mascara, liner, and shadow. They last the entire time and she can throw them away afterwards.

The cotton balls are not only extremely soft but they are pure white in color.

As for me, I use them to apply medicines or creams for our kids when they get scrapes or scratches from playing. They are soft on their delicate skin. They are hygienic and I can just toss once done.

Cotton balls are useful for a variety things of course and the soft nature of these particular ones make them enjoyable to use.

title: Seems to working well.
text: So far it reduce my appetite.

title: Easy to swallow, good as it "warms" the body during this winter.
text: I can feel that my body feels warm due to this supplement, great for immune support during winter.

text: The animals print and color is vibrant, comes with 2 pcs of lanyard for helping keep the mask.

title: Great looking pill organizer case that keeps pills secure during travel
text:
[[VIDEOID:2b8c1c2319102d75010f71456d961afa]] Super-sized pill organizer and case

It’s the perfect take along organizer; has easy to open sections, two for each day of the week. It is almost 10” long, larger than some small purses. The sections are large enough to hold my pills.

I’m using it for out next two-week trip. I’m able to store two whole days of pills in each section, that’s how it will hold two weeks worth of pills.

I love how easy it is to fill; just pop open each day with the little tab. The lid is on a hinge and pops open. Easy to fill one week of daily morning pills and then turn it to the other side for your evening pills. Each day is color coordinated with large easy-to-read lettering.

The organizer easily slides into the case. Perfect way to make sure none of the tops open while traveling. It’s so secure, you can feel confident even when throwing it in a backpack.

I just LOVE the little travel pill case. It’s about 2” wide and the lid pops open by pressing a small button. Inside, it is divided into three small sections. Perfect to carry aspirin, allergy pills, etc. very handy to grab when you need it.

Great set; just understand that it is a super-sized pill case. And the design of the case is beautiful!

title: Plastic containers with snap on lids, store leftovers for lunch!!
text:
These 24 ounce Solimo Food Storage Containers are The perfect size! They work great for leftovers of soup, salads, pasta, etc. Perfect amount for lunch the next day.

They also work great when

They are BPA free, microwave and dishwasher safe. Their lids snap on nicely, I love hearing that POP! I know for sure they are definitely sealed.

Now I was pleasantly surprised at how nice they are. They are sturdy and stack nicely. The lids also stack! The package comes with six sets of five containers in each. (Total of 30)

title: Nice roller, strong scent of lavender
text:
Very strong scent

The container came and had leaked out quite a bit. Even though it was packaged very well, almost 1/2 of the oil leaked out. It was double wrapped in bubble wrap!

While cleaning the bottle, we noticed it has a very strong scent. I wasn’t able to identify the smell, it my daughter says it is lavender.

I was able to use the towel that was soaked with the oil and spread it on my feet. They were very sore and tired from a full day’s activities. About a half hour later, I realized my feet didn’t hurt anymore.

The bottle itself is very narrow and has a small roller. It works easily and rolls on a small amount, just what you need. Just think the manufacturer needs to add some type of protective tape around the top of the bottle when shipping.

title: Easy setup with Bluetooth remote, started taking pictures immediately
text:
Recently went on a trip with my husband to Acadia National Park. It’s a beautiful place with so many amazing views.

But, ones that don’t allow much room for a tripod to take our own photo. Having a selfie stick allowed us to take some amazing pictures.

This setup is very simple using the Bluetooth. The remote makes it super easy to take photos.

I have an iPhone SX Max. The fit was pretty tight, but it worked.

title: Great way to rehydrate!
text:
Sick little ones is a parent’s worse nightmare! A little one needs nourishment when they are sick with vomiting or diarrhea. These Electrolyte Powder Packs contain just the right amount of vital minerals to keep your little one hydrated.

Mommy’s Bliss Electrolyte Powder Packs are formulated to meet the standard for rehydration solutions established by the World Health Organization.

Our little ones love the Fruit Punch flavor and don’t fight it when they need it. I appreciate the fact that it is free of artificial flavors and colors and has no artificial ingredients. It also has 1/3 less sugar than leading brands.

Summary:
(1) prevents dehydration due to vomiting and diarrhea
(2) works for mommies, too, to recover stamina
(3) easy to dissolve powder formula
(4) quickly mix in with water or other liquids
(5) contains vital minerals to keep kids hydrated
(6) NO alcohol or parabens
(7) NO artificial flavors or colors
(8) dairy, gluten, and soy-free
(9) 100% VEGAN INGREDIENTS
(10) 1/3 less sugar than leading brand

title: Ok
text: I have a new crown on my front tooth that’s about several weeks old. It’s still pretty sensitive to hot and cold so I was hoping this toothpaste would help. There is minimal difference. It’s gotten a little better, but I’m not sure if it’s just do to time or the toothpaste...

title: Great collagen
text: Since this is only 7 days worth, I can’t really account for how it works with its long term benefits, which is what’s needed to prove supplement sufficiency. However, I can tell you that this collagen mixes smoothly in my Greek yogurt and has absolutely no taste to it whatsoever. If you’re wanting to text collagen powder out, this would be a good way to do so. I’d recommend!

title: Son approved
text: I got this toothpaste for my son. His recent dentist visit brought to light a cavity he has that apparently causes the need for a root canal. My son has complained of sensitivity with hot and cold foods. My insurance sucks and the dentist wants $700 so in the interim I was hoping this would help with the sensitivity. IT DOES! My son said he can barely notice it. Great product. I’d recommend!

title: Kid approved
text: I got these to replenish my stash during the winter season. My 11 year old eats these no problem. They’re def kid approved. Personally I could do without the sugar coating, but they taste good and don’t stick to your teeth.

title: Fun and tastes good
text: First of all. I love the name and marketing. Clever. Cute and fun. I get it. :) Good ingredients. It actually tastes pretty good, maybe a bit tart but it’s a lemonade flavor. Mixes well. Does what a BCAA should. I like this product and would recommend!

title: Ok energy boost, terrible taste.
text: Decent enough energy if you’re new to preworkouts but, if not, you may want to look for something stronger depending on your tolerance and needs. The taste was horrific though. I mean awful. If I’m going to use the rest of it I’m going to have to get some flavor drops. Not a fan of the zip close bag either. It doesn’t feel secure and I’m worried about it making a mess in my gym bag.

title: Good taste
text: 7 days isn’t enough time to show results for this type of product, but I have been taking similar ones for the last few months and they do work. Normal hair growth is 1/4 to 1/2 inch per month. Mine has been growing about an inch. The ingredients in this one are good. The gummies taste good too. I would recommend in a higher supply.

title: Strips a little small; does it matter which side goes against teeth?
text:
I had previously tried out some whitening strips that had two different sizes, one for the bottoms, the other for the tops. It was readily apparent what to do with those strips. Just peel them off the film and place a specific side against my teeth. However, after the set time period, I had to peel the strips off of my teeth and was left with a ton of good that I had to spit out. They were easy to use but messy. I saw that these were dissolving, which sounded interesting.

When I opened the packet, I was a little confused how to use these strips. They look as though there’s a piece that you peel off of something, but I wasn’t able to do so. It also wasn’t clear to me if there was a specific side that goes against my teeth. In the end, I just stuck them on and hoped for the best. They did dissolve, though they did leave some goo on my teeth, which I basically ended up swallowing. I assume I did it right, but I wasn’t entirely sure in comparison to the other strips that were easy to tell how I should put them on and what I should do.

The strips are kind of small and not as long as I’d like, so I do wish they were a little bigger. The minty flavor was strong but not overpowering.

These use hydrogen peroxide for whitening.

title: Tastes decent; mixes easily; good value even though jar is maybe half full; jar is glass
text: This is a great alternative to taking magnesium pills. It dissolves easily even in cold liquids, and it tastes decent. It’s tart from the citric acid, but it also has lemon flavor and stevia to balance it out. This comes in a glass jar as opposed to plastic. The jar is maybe ½ to 2/3 full, but that’s not too uncommon with powder supplements. It’s currently about $11 for a 30 day supply, and you get a good bit of magnesium in those servings, so I think this is pretty good.

title: Decent flavor; fiber plus protein and vitamins and minerals; high in sodium
text:
I have both the vanilla and chocolate versions of this product. While I know that these powders are sold by weight, not volume, I was a bit surprised to see that the vanilla version took up a fair bit less volume. I’m not sure if the vanilla powder is heavier or if it was somehow more compressed.

So this product is meant to be a meal replacement and not purely a protein powder, so it has a lot more going on than what a typical protein powder might have. In addition to protein, it has a lot of vitamins and minerals and a lot of fiber. Flavor-wise, it’s OK. It’s got some chocolate flavor, and the sweetness isn’t off-putting. I’ve tried protein powders that were strong with the stevia, which is a sweetener that I don’t really like. This contains some of that too, but it also has cane sugar. I’ve certainly tried far less palatable protein/meal replacement powders. I’d probably rank this high up the list, though that isn’t necessarily saying a lot if you’re coming from never having tried these sorts of things to consuming a lot of them and just getting used to the not-very-good flavors. This does have some grittiness, though I make my drinks the night before, which allows for the powder to hydrate well. Also, given that this has more in it than protein powder, the grittiness should be expected. For example, this has a variety of ground of seeds, which is why it has so much fiber.

In comparison to the vanilla flavor, this has slightly less calories, but it has slightly more sodium, more fiber, and more potassium, so there is some difference between these beyond simply the flavors.

I’m not really keen on the fact that this is $37, is in a huge tub, but only has 15 servings. Granted, these sorts of products are all kind of pricey, so this isn’t overly so. The biggest negative for me is the amount of sodium this contains. There are 480mg of sodium per serving. I’d be a lot happier with this if it had maybe half that.

title: Flavor is decent; has lots of good stuff in it including fiber; high in sodium
text:

title: I have no idea if this does anything; if you're new to probiotics, may want to work your way up
text:
Does this supplement work? I have no idea. Are the ingredients of good quality? No idea. That’s sort of the problem with supplements. They all make these claims, but it’s largely impossible to tell if they actually do anything beyond give you expensive pee. Obviously, I hope this works and provides me with some sort of useful benefit, but it may be the case that the benefits, if any, are subtle or that they take weeks or even months of use to start making a difference. All that I can really say about this is that I have not experienced any negative effects from taking this. Also, this bottle says to refrigerate after opening, so keep that in mind.

This bottle says 50 billion CFU per dose (two pills) and 14 probiotic strains. If you’ve never taken probiotics before, you might consider starting with a probiotic with a smaller dose to see how that affects you before jumping in with this.

Further, regarding supplements in general, you should always pay attention to the dosage. First of all, you can’t be certain, unless you’ve come across 3rd party testing, that the dosage on the bottle is what you’re actually getting. It’s possible that the dosage could be higher or lower. This goes for all supplements. So, be careful and pay attention to any changes in how you’re feeling. Further, before you take any supplement, do some research. Just because something is being sold with a specific dosage doesn’t mean that dosage is safe, or at least safe for everyone. There are some things that have no upper limit when it comes to safety, but there are a great many things that do have tested upper limits, and there are many things that can interact with medication you may be taking or medical conditions you may have.

title: Have no idea if it does anything; have suffered no ill effects
text:

title: Works, but the bristle area is noticeably smaller on these vs Oral B
text: I like the bright colors on these toothbrush heads, and they do fit fine on my toothbrush. I did notice that the Oral B ones have an audible click when I put one on that these don’t have, but they seem to be on there fine. The main issue I could see people having with these, at least from my initial impression (my brush head does not need replacing right now, so I haven’t actually used one of these heads to brush my teeth yet), is that the part with the bristles is noticeably smaller with shorter bristles in comparison to those on the Oral B brush heads. That might make these better for kids; I don’t know. These are inexpensive, though, and the official ones are not.

title: Tasty gummies but not for us.
text:
My wife and I take probiotics. We're not doctors, but we do check with our docs at our annual checkups and this seems like a good choice for us.
We're not able to analyze what's actually in these gummies, of course, so must trust the label in this review.
We're giving this only 3 stars, though, because as we calculate the cost of these, they seem about twice the price of probiotics we've been buying in stores near our home.
The taste is great, but we're not going to pay this much for a resupply. Sorry. Not for us.

title: We love cranberry but this version is too gummy
text:
"Gummy" is the best word my wife and I could come up with to explain why we're giving these Cranberry chewables 3 stars rather than 5. We love cranberry in foods from scones to marinades and cranberries in salads, as well, so we're ideal customers for all things cranberry, including dietary supplements.

But, when we popped these in our mouths, they had an unpleasant, a-bit-dry, chewy texture that we would not want to order again. Especially since the recommended dosage here is 3 of these per day, we're not going to be repeat customers.

title: Good-tasting gummies if you're taking D3
text:
When my wife and I saw these gummies available for review on VINE, we were happy to do so. We've been including D3 in our daily supplements for quite a while mainly in the winter months. Until now, we've been buying a brand that we swallow as capsules. We like the idea of gummies, so we thought we'd try these. And we now think we're going to switch to this product going forward.

We have had gummies that are relatively hard or that stick to your teeth. These are nice and soft and fruity tasting.

We need to stress: We're not doctors or nutritionists, but we have included this in our supplements and, if you do as well, this is 5-star form of D3.

title: Good-tasting fruity gummies if you want a zinc supplement
text:
My wife and I saw this supplement available for review from VINE and we agreed. We are not doctors or nutritionists but we have been occasionally including zinc in our supplements particularly because we've read about its benefit in suppressing colds.

The chief complaint about taking some other zinc products is the taste, which some people, including my wife and I, find unpleasant. That's why zinc often is masked with fruity tastes.

These gummies are soft and good tasting. Of course, we know that any review of food products and flavors is a personal matter. We're pleased to give this 5 stars as a good-tasting way to occasionally get some zinc.

title: Feels so lovely
text: This is well made from soft cozy materials that is super comfy on my feet. It heats up quickly and the direct contact with my skin helps heat my feet up and keep them warm and cozy. This is my new favorite foot warmer! It is currently priced at $46 which seems pretty pricey for what it is but the seller is currently offering a 20% off promo which would make it about $37. Still pricey since but I love it so much I think it's worth it! It would make a perfect holiday gift!

title: Works well but a small area of heating
text: I love how lightweight and portable this is, it is easy to use and comfortable to wear. The main thing I was disappointed with was the area of heat, it doesn't cover the entire pad and it's only hot in a pretty small area.

title: Great Set to Have on Hand
text: This is a great set to have on hand that works on so many different things. It's also a great value for 10 pounds currently prices at $22.

title: Where's the exfoliation?
text: I'm just not a fan of this, there is hardly any exfoliation bits in this. It's thick and applies creamy. It rinses away easily and very messily, getting dark brown all over my shower. It's just a hard pass for me.

title: Very soothing but busted seam
text: We have a 3 and a 6 year old both with ASD, they absolutely love these pillows and use them all the time. The pillows really help calm them down and are well worth the investment for us. If you have a person with ASD or someone with big emotions, I highly recommend this pillow for them. While our blue pillow arrived in perfect condition, unfortunately this one arrived with a big hole in one of the seams and the ASD has my daughter picking at things all the time so it's not possible for her to leave it alone and not make it worse. I just with that it was made better with better stitching and seams.

title: Our young ASD kids love it
text: We have a 3 and a 6 year old both with ASD, they absolutely love these pillows and use them all the time. The pillows really help calm them down and are well worth the investment for us. If you have a person with ASD or someone with big emotions, I highly recommend this pillow for them.

title: Super Soft
text: The bristles are super soft and it provides a nice deep clean. Current price is $35 which makes it a great value that I can recommend.

title: Works Great
text: This works great, easy to set up and operation is straight forward. Pads stick well and conduct the current nicely. No issues at all, it performs as expected and doesn't crush through power like crazy which is nice and important to me. The storage case makes it super easy to store and not lose any of the pieces.

title: The exact style my chiropractor tried to sell me for $60

title: No Info Available anymore

I had ordered them based on info listed and the bottles don't have the supplements the listing said it would. These only have Zinc. I'm really sketched out with this seller and these gummies so I'm going to be throwing them away instead of feeding them to my family. title: What exactly is in these?

Also, the description on Amazon says that they have approximately the same amount of caffeine as a premium cup of coffee, but it doesn't actually disclose how much caffeine is in it, which I wish it did. Overall these do taste pretty good and they seem like a good deal at their current price of $10 for 30 packets.

title: Ok, not long lasting
text:
I'm not crazy about the scent. It smells like a strong faux citrus to me. Aside from that, it does an okay job covering up bad shoe odors. It might also deodorize the shoe to a small extent. It's not a long lasting protection. As long as you're not wearing the shoes within the next few days, it's fine. Otherwise, it starts smelling again once it meets the malodorous feet.

It's better than nothing, but I'm not wild about it.

title: Soft and Effective
text: You get a whole bag of these. There's a small round one, good for eye makeup, and a larger washcloth size for the face. They effectively removed makeup and were soft on my skin. I was able to wash out most of my eye makeup after using, but probably won't bother trying to get them totally clean in the future.

title: Classy wine gift bags
text: These are great for the holidays. The bag is thick and sturdy enough to hold a wine bottle. The design is a nice as it looks in the product image. A nice and classy design that will hardly ever go out of style.

title: Very wide cups
text: I didn't expect these cups to be so wide. They look very different than the wine cups I'm used to seeing, and I don't feel comfortable using them to serve drinks with. That said, they still look really nice, and I'll happily use them as dessert cups instead. They're elegant in a classy way, and can match with almost any decor.

title: Where Have You Been All My Life?
text:
I never would have bought this on my own, but I had the opportunity, and I'm glad I did. They’re great! They look more like goggles than the sleep masks I’m used to, cupping the eye so that the material doesn’t push against the closed eyelid uncomfortably, a problem with some other eye masks. And it keeps out most of the light! That’s what surprised me the most. I assume face shape and size affects this, so it likely won’t be good for everyone, but for me it sealed the area around my nose more effectively than most sleeping masks with that little flap on bottom. Is it perfect? No, but it’s close.

Update: knocking it down a star since this tore down the middle eventually.

The strap is Velcro. I felt like this could be improved a bit. I’m a woman with a normal-sized head, and I had mine pulled almost to the end of Velcro strip, leaving the unvelcroed end of the strap just flapping loose. This could be remedied by a longer strip of Velcro. Still, five stars because it’s fine, just not optimal, and I do really like the mask.

The placement of the straps are fine. It’s impossible to get a mask that doesn’t bother your ears at all, but this wasn’t bad.

The color is nice too, and the material is soft.

title: Good and soft
text:
These tissues feel as soft as the other Kleenex tissues, and slightly thicker. I didn't notice any other differences, but I hope all that vitamin juice or whatever in these tissues is making my nose feel better. I hate colds.

The boxes look nice. They're small, so they take up less desk space.

Edit: these tissues are definitely softer and thicker and longer lasting than the usual Kleenex ones that I've used. They're fantastic tissues.

title: Strong weird earthy smell, no noticable taste
text:
It's a very deep dark green color that makes me think of mold. It smells really bad - like mold and earth mixed together. But I didn't notice any additional flavor after mixing it into my food. As long as you can avoid smelling at it, and even looking at it for too long, you won't really notice it once it's mixed in.

Personally, despite it's acclaimed benefits, I get slightly nauseous after seeing and smelling it for too long, (I think that's all in my head, not from the product itself), so I don't think I'll be using this again.

title: Love the packaging, scent, and giftable.
text: Firstly, the packaging and design make it a nice-looking gift box. The shower steamers come in an assortment of scents and there are 18 individually wrapped shower steamers. I like this gift set for special events and Valentine's Day. The steamers are natural and organic. The essential oils make showering a relaxing experience. I think this aromatherapy is good value.

title: Worked as expected.
text: [[VIDEOID:86ca87c03d69e7d2db502686fa808767]] Check out my video on the operation of this trimmer. I use body hair trimmers so it’s easy to recognize quality and good craftsmanship. This one is lightweight and durable. The ergonomic design makes up for the size of the trimmer. It worked smoothly without pinching or cutting my skin. I am a hairy person so this trimmer had some work to do on my arms. I discovered that the vacuum suction is okay, not great. Hairy people will need to empty the storage bin a few more times before finishing. The only dislike is that there is no battery charge indicator on the trimmer. This makes it difficult to gauge the quality of the battery life. That would have been a great feature for this trimmer. Overall, this one is a keeper.

title: Mild scent with different fragrances.
text: I love aromatherapy shower bombs because they are easy to use. Just place them in the right place in the shower and allow the steam to create an amazing therapeutic relaxing experience. You get 12 PCs in a box and it is giftable. The box is sturdy and decorative. Won’t need to be gift wrapped. The individual bombs are standard size but sufficient enough to give you the relaxation you seek. I like the fragrances. One scent is new to me but smells good.

title: Bedtime Aid.
text: Many of the ingredients are natural and a key ingredient is known to help relax and fall asleep. I regularly use a similar product in a spray. This design is unique to me and works well. Rather than spraying my pillow to get the aromatherapy, this product is a roll on. The scent is pleasant. Not to strong or sweet. It is relaxing to me and helpful to induce sleep. Comes in a variety of scents and a roll on should last awhile.

title: Rigid front
text: I would expect to have heat all around the neck. But the heat is only in the back. It is too rigid to slug the pad tightly in the front.

title: Rigid front

title: The best thing for people with cold feet
text: My wife gets really cold feet. It is almost impossible for her to put her feet on the floor without a layer of socks or fluffy shoes on when she watches tv. This foot warmer is just perfect for her. The fabric is a very good material and comfortable. The heat-up is fast. It keeps warm for a bit even after the auto shut off. One thing that stands out to me is the heating mechanism is on both the top and bottom. Super warm and comfy!

title: Awesome design, it is so relaxing
text: The collapsable design is very nice, so I can put it away because I am using it once a week. For the foot spa, it is so relaxing. I filled it with hot water, and it kept the temperature the same for the whole time, which is the only problem with a traditional bucket when the temperature goes down very quickly. The roller massager is an extra feature, I like to have it roll and pause. The bubbling function is very interesting, I am very ticklish, and I am surprised I still handle it and like it. It comes with a remote, it is the only way to control the setting. The problem is the infrared sensor location, you have to lean forward to use the “remote”. Another concern is the cleaning and drying process, it is not easy to dry at all. Other than that, it is a great foot spa.

title: Great eye mask with cord
text: I tried many eye masks, but this one stands out because the fabric is really comfortable and smooth. The temperature heats up fast and consistently. My tolerance stays in medium heat which is green. Red is too hot for me. I really like the magnetic charging cable. When I fell asleep and turned my body, it disconnected easily without waking me up. The cord is long enough either for my nightstand USB plug or sometimes I just use a small power bank under my pillow. Also, this is very affordable. I love this eye mask!

text: My wife loves this product, she says it's even better and has better ingredients than what she is used to buying, so that tells you that this product by Avant Goods is the real deal.

title: So comforting!!
text:
This pillow is so comforting!! I have a lot of anxiety and hugging this pillow makes me feel so relaxed. It's so soft and cozy and the vibration feels so nice. It's perfect for children or adults as a stim toy or just a source of stress relief. I also really like how the bumpy texture feels.
I do have one complaint: you have to be actively pressing the part that vibrates for it to work, so it's a bit annoying that it shuts off unless you're constantly hugging it tightly. It isn't a big problem, but it would be nicer if you could set it to stay on.

title: Great and super gift-able!!
text: These shower steamers would make an amazing gift. The packaging is really nice and you can smell them before even opening it. They dissolve easily in the shower and make the whole bathroom smell amazing. I would definitely recommend this product for a relaxing shower!!

title: excellent for preventing leg cramps
text: Have used it twice in Florida during golf rounds. One capsule before the round and one at the halfway house plus four 12 oz glasses of water during round. No cramps that night.
