text: Worked great at cleaning my sunglasses. I wear makeup and mixed in with sweat after pushing my sunglasses on my hair, they get pretty dirty. This wiped every bit of it off. Great product!

title: Great Quality Probiotic!
text: Seems to be doing a great job with my system. Quality product!

title: Great gift set!
text: Excellent bath bomb gift set for anyone. Lovely scents and wonderfully packaged. Great value for the money and wonderful for giftgiving.

title: Great scent and odor eliminator!
text: So I have never tried the other popular brand of toilet spray, but I am pretty please with this one and love the scent! It is not overpowering but yet masks odors. I love this particular scent alot too! Great value for the money and you get two bottles. I am traveling soon and look forward to having this. It is a must when sharing a room and bathroom on vacation.

title: Great & Easy to use
text: Wonderful product overall! My biggest concern is the sugar content. I think they could get away from using sugar. I really try to watch my sugar intake as it is in everything. I do enjoy taking my vitamins in tincture form. I think my body absorbs it better and faster.

title: Wow 🤩
text: Not your average bath bomb set. Absolutely stunning set that would make a fabulous gift set. It’s so thoughtfully made and packaged. The scents are immaculate as well. The size of the bath bombs are larger than average. Incredibly impressed!

title: Love..Love..Love
text: Wow, each one of these roller essential oils smells amazing. I really, really love the Big Love one. One of my favorite scents. It is a wonderful blend of different scents that takes grapefruit and turns it into something lovely.

title: Quality
text: Smells really nice and relieving. Quality stainless steel roller ball and pure smelling essential oil. I had a little trouble at first getting the rollerball to stay in the tube but finally got it.

title: Our bottle was spoiled
text: From reading the other reviews, it doesn't seem like we got a good bottle. It smelled a little rotten. I am not going to let my husband take it. I have read where zinc was a good supplement to take after surgery. I found another source. I was too worried her would get more sick from it. What a bummer, seems like others had a good experience with it, unfortunately, we did not.

title: Great Value
text: Great quantity for the price. Enough to make it last the durations without worrying about resupplying your stash.

title: Great Heat Therapy
text: This is a great weighted heating pad. It works wonders and it helps that is weighted and stays in place. Just enough heat to help and super cozy.

title: Great reusable gift bag
text: Super cute and reusable gift bag. The material is super sturdy, thick, and durable. This can be used in a business or as a gift. It is a great swag bag. I love having the variety colors to choose from.

title: Tasty!
text: Very tasty & informative. I really liked the labeling. Also, as soon as you rip the seal it smells like a bowl of fresh oranges.

title: Has an odor!
text: I really wanted to give this vitamin C gummy a chance but just like some of the other reviews listed, it really does smell like a burnt out candle. I thought maybe it was the sealed packaging and have checked it for about 5 days in a row and it still smells like that. Not sure what it is but it is not appealing. It didn’t really taste like burnt candle but it’s hard to get past the smell.

title: Warms me right up
text: This foot warmer is absolutely amazing and effective at warming you up quickly when you've been out in the cold or just feel chilly. Even though it's just a foot warmer, it warms up your whole body quite quickly.

title: Not the best shape to block out light
text: This Comfytemp 3D contoured eye mask is not the best shape to block out light. It is lightweight and feels good on my face, but the shape is off somehow and light is not completely blocked out when I use it when sleeping on my back or on my side.

title: Nice set
text: This Suphoming Ear and Nose Trimmer is a nice set. It comes with several attachments as well as a cleaning brush. This is easy to use and works as intended for the most part. Using it for ears, nose or eyebrows is not as straightforward as using it for just clipping your hair. It is rechargeable which also makes it convenient.

title: Helps with bowel function
text: I have found this magnesium supplement to be very helpful with many things, including bowel function. I really like the balance of ingredients in this particular supplement as my body absorbs them well without any negative side effects. It also helps calm me down after a hard day. I love that it is manufactured in Texas and that all the ingredients are sourced from the United States. This is an overall great product with a great price point.

title: Helpful
text: This supplement has helped me manage my stress better. Since I have been taking this, I have also been able to think more clearly and I have been happier. I like the combination of magnesium and ashwagandha in this supplement as well as vitamin B-6.

title: Good grabber tool
text: This is really helpful to have around to easily grab things that can't be easily reached. I like that this grabber is foldable and that it not only has a grabber, it also has a magnet on it. The magnet is really a helpful addition. While the grabber is strong enough to pick up many things, it is not as sturdy as I had hoped.

title: Big numbers, easy to read
text: I love this blood pressure monitor and how easy it is to use. The cuff is comfortable and the reading numbers are big and easy to read. I also love that the display is backlit and that the system also has a voice assistant function. The only reason that I gave this 4 stars instead of a 5, is because they advertise that it includes a 36 month extended guarantee. However both the box that it came in and the literature inside the box state that it only includes a 12 month warranty.

title: Simple massager that works very well
text: I'm really happy with this lymphatic massager. I was hoping I could use it not just to help with lymphatic circulation for myself but also to easily give my husband a back/shoulder massage and this works very well for both. It's such a simple design but it's very effective. Also, I think the color of the roller ball is pretty neat.

title: So helpful
text: This aspirator is not too large in size and is convenient to use. I had a hard time figuring out how to make this work well at first, but after reading the manufacturer's use suggestions on amazon, I discovered that it works much better when using a saline nasal spray first.  Although it does make a sound when using, it's not very loud unless you use it on the higher settings. I like that you can charge it, and it doesn't need to be plugged in to use.

title: They Do What They Are Suppose To Do But ...  📌
text:
I received one pack of "Nurture Valley Rinse Free Bath Sponges". There are 30 "sponges" in the pack.

I was more curious about this item then anything. Overall, it's not a bad product but could use a little improvement.

The "sponges" are actually more like sheets. They reminded me of sheets of felt. They really did.

The sheets already have soap on them, you just add water. It doesn't take a lot of water to work them into a lather. I wadded the sheet up in my hand and added probably 2 ounces (maybe 3) of water and the "sponge" got very soapy.

The problem is if you are planning to use these for a full body wash you will need to use more then 1. It really depends on your body size & how "dirty" you may be.

The soap in / on them was non-irritating to my super sensitive skin. That was nice.

title: Happy Birthday! This Is Cute! 🎂
text:
I received one roll of "Surhayy 60th Birthday Novelty Gag Gift Toilet Paper". It comes in a cute matching box.

I couldn't resist ... I thought this was cute! It's going to be very amusing when I give it to my boyfriend for his upcoming Birthday.

It is an actual roll of toilet paper. The toilet paper roll is just thinner then a normal roll would be and it has a rougher texture. It feels more like writing paper then actual toilet paper you would wipe your butt on.

I mean you could actually use it for that if you wanted, I guess. I don't see why not. It may be not be as pleasant as your regular brand.

I just like it because it's something cute & funny to help celebrate a special day. I'm pretty sure my boyfriend will just keep his as a sort of keepsake.

According to the box this gag gift toilet paper was designed in the USA but made in China.

title: Nice To Make Your Own Various Wipes With 🔷
text:
I received one bag of "FG Clean Wipes". There are 300 wipes in the bag.

I seriously love these wipes. They are really multi-purpose.

The wipes are really durable. They don't rip or tear in water or other liquids. They don't have any scent. They also don't leave behind lint.

I'm enjoying making my own various kinds of wipes using them. I've made hand sanitizing wipes using Isopropyl Alcohol. Then I store them in a canister (as shown in my photo). I've also made cleaning wipes using original Pine-Sol and water.

These wipes are great for scrubbing because they don't fall apart and after they are dirty I just throw them away. So that's convenient.

I could see myself purchasing these wipes again. I would also recommend them.

title: Different Then I Expected 👱
text:
I received one box of "MISICH Facial Cotton Pads Square". There are 200 in the box.

These are really NOT square facial cotton pads like I expected. Yes, in the box they are folded up into a oblong / square type of shape but they are really sheets.

The sheets once unfolded are kind of like a netted fabric, it's longer then it is wide. The sheets are almost exactly the same size as the box once unfolded (you can see this in one of my pictures).

The sheets are pretty thin but are large enough to wash your face with or even remove your makeup with.

If you didn't want to unfold the sheets they would possibly be a little more absorbent.

I didn't hate this product, it just wasn't what I was expecting from the ad description.

title: Very Durable ✔
text:
The "FG Clean Wipes" arrive in a white plastic bag. There are 150 wipes in that bag.

The wipes are just dry sheets with nothing on them. They are white in color, have no scent and are a large size (12" x 12").

They are also extremely durable. I've used various products (water, cleaner, rubbing alcohol) with these wipes and none of those product caused these wipes to weaken or even tear. They are very durable.

I've even used the same wipe over and over again just rinsing it out between uses. It held up great with no signs at all of wear and tear.

These wipes are marketed toward being used for cleaning but I really don't see why they can't be used for other things as well.

title: I Like It Better Then The Name Brand 😉
text:
I received 12 jars of "Lucky Super Soft Pure Petroleum Jelly". Each jar is 6 ounces.

By appearance this petroleum jelly looks like the more popular name brand product. It features the same color jar & even the same color lid.

It does have a strong scent. Not my favorite but as you use the product you really don't notice the scent, I didn't.

I tried it on my lips and then on my real problem spots ... my elbows.

I have really dry cracked elbows with pieces of dry cracked skin sticking up. That's from me using my elbows to prop myself up in bed and read at night. My elbows really hurt when my bedsheets or any other cloth rubs against them. They are in bad shape or they were until I started applying this product.

This petroleum jelly has a thinner consistency then the name brand but I really think it works better then the name brand. I tried the name brand product on my elbows but it didn't help like I expected it too. I think this products thinner consistency helps it to be absorbed into the skin better.

After applying this product to my elbows for 3 nights, the rough hard pieces of skin on my elbows soften up and layed down.

Plus this petroleum jelly is less greasy then the name brand. It doesn't leave greasy stained spots on my bedding or clothes.

The only issue is the jars blue lid comes off way to easily. I wish it fit better.

I would definitely recommend this product.

title: They Don't Have A Scent 🤔
text:
I received 4 packs of "Drain Cleaner Sticks". The scents are suppose to be Orange, Lavender, Ocean & Lemon.

They are just small sticks that you put down into your sink or tub to prevent organic material from building up.

My observations ... most of the little drain cleaner sticks arrived broken into pieces in the packages. They are still able to be used though.

None and I mean none of the four packs of drain cleaner sticks had a scent. I opened the packs and was expecting to smell Orange or Lemon, something. There was really no scent at all (honesty).

Do these drain cleaner sticks work? That remains to be seen but I'm not holding my breath.

title: A Good Decent Cleaner ✔
text:
The "GreenFist Hydrogen Peroxide All Purpose Cleaner" arrives in a 1 gallon jug. It has no color / is clear but does have a faint Orange scent.

I have used Hydrogen Peroxide cleaners before and actually prefer to use them in my bathroom.

I feel like they clean soap scum off my sink better than regular cleaning products. I didn't have to scrub as much either.

This time I decided to try this brand in my kitchen. I used it on my countertop and to clean my stainless steel double sink.

It removed the food spills off my countertop easily enough, leaving behind a faint Orange scent.

The sink was a little harder, it had a white film on some of the stainless steel from dish liquid and various food / drink leftover build up. I had to use a little power to scrub with this cleaner but then I went back and rinsed my stainless steel sink, it looked good and shiny. I was satisfied with the results overall.

title: Gives a decent shave and trim, but takes too long
text:
[[VIDEOID:4e7127560e0dce32815de1168e58073]] This compact, lightweight 3-in-1 Nose, Ear and Facial Trimmer has the 3 blades that are easy to install, and to remove.

The nose hair trimmer pulled an occasional nose hair as I trimmed my nose hairs. I needed to move the trimmer inside my nose repeatedly to trim the long hairs that I could see, taking longer than it normally takes me to trim the hairs. When I was done, I cleaned this trimmer under running water.
note: I could not remove any parts of the nose hair trimmer.

The round shave trimmer gave a decent shave (I shave multiple times a week), but it took longer to shave my face than it did when using my preferred razor. When I felt my face after shaving, I didn't get as close a shave as I'd like.

The hair trimming blade, with options for 2.0 mm and 6.0 mm, gave a good cut that I liked. This was my favorite of the three blades.

Of the 3 blades, the nose hair trimmer makes the least noise, while the hair trimmer makes the most noise. I did not find this trimmer to be too noisy.

Lastly, the user manual has detailed illustrations; but, the text instructions were a bit confusing. For instance, under in the section "Cleaning and maintenance - machine body cleaning" --- the manual says "...can split the blade and body, it's convenient to clean the hair debris in the gap.....".

title: Gets our surfaces cleaner; abrasive texture; lightweight
text:
[[VIDEOID:b6b9e7fb29337dba3cfed77f93ad002]] These six (6) pumice stones come individually wrapped in plastic.

When I unwrapped a pumice stone, tiny bits of pumice debris fell on to the counter. It's not a big deal, just something I noted.

The pumice stone felt light in my hand. It has an abrasive texture.

I wet the pumice stone before I use it to avoid excessively scratching those surfaces.
I like how well these pumice stones worked to get rid of the stains and rust rings of our sinks and toilets, although it took a lot of scrubbing to remove those stubborn stains.
I like that although the pumice stone does get smaller the more times that I use it, the stone did not break off into multiple pieces.

Lastly, the product description page has good details and tips on how to use the pumice stones. The product I received did not contain any information, just the pumice stones themselves.

Overall, these pumice stones helped make our surfaces look better.

title: Does a decent job in cleaning our bricks; mild lemon scent.
text:
This All-Green Cleaner comes in a 22-oz bottle with a separate sprayer top.
I removed the cap and saw no inner seal. This cleaner has a mild lemon scent, as I sniffed the bottle.
I then put the sprayer top on. I like that the tube touches the bottom of the bottle.

I used this Cleaner to clean the bricks around the fireplace, as follows:
1) I poured water on the bricks to get it wet. A few minutes later, I sprayed the bricks with this Cleaner.
2) After ".....let[ting] the product sit for 30 minutes...." (as per directions on the bottle), I then started scrubbing.

I like that the bricks did not look as dusty as they did before I started cleaning, even though I could not get the bricks to show that classic red color.

My driveway has areas with dirt/grime/debris that were recently made, and other areas that haven't been cleaned in a while. I sprayed all those areas, waited 30 minutes and then started scrubbing. This Cleaner got the areas with the newer stains clean, but I couldn't get the more stubborn stains out.

Overall, this All Green Masonry Cleaner does a decent job in cleaning the bricks and parts of our driveway.

title: Sterile; Soft, stretchy; applies in comfortable, firm, secure manner; Not constrictive
text:
[[VIDEOID:72de899de748e7f7d3bd4af1bdc264af]] This product consists of a box containing 30 rolls of gauze.
Each gauze is individually wrapped in plastic, which I like because it keeps them free of dirt and debris until I need to use the gauze.

The gauze is 4-inches wide.

I opened a roll, and then wrapped it around my lower leg, and left it there for the rest of the day. The gauze is very soft to the touch and is stretchy. It did not feel constrictive and did not cause pain in my leg.

Overall, this rolled gauze has the features that I look for: soft, elastic, and does not feel overly tight against the skin once it is applied.

title: Cleans floor decently; mild pleasant scent
text:
I like the convenience of these Floor Cleaning Sheets: put sheets into a bucket of water, go get my mop and mop heads and when I come back a few minutes later, the sheet has dissolved. While wearing a pair of gloves, I swished the solution around to get a good mixture.

The sheets - dissolved in water - cleans our floor decently. I could not get the more stubborn stains at the bottom of the baseboards cleaned with the mop, so I hand-scrubbed the stains away using another product.
Once cleaned and dry, the floor has a mild, pleasant scent. I saw minimal residue on the floor once I was done cleaning and the floor got dry.

These 30 sheets take up very little space in our cabinet.

Lastly, the product package did not have instructions that I could understand to tell me how much water I should use with one cleaning sheet.

title: Deliciously sweet; soft texture; I take these for my nerve & red blood cells
text:
These Vitamin B12 Energy Gummies come in a plastic bottle with an outer plastic seal around the cap and an inner seal - two good security measures.

The gummies are soft to the touch.
These gummies taste deliciously sweet! I also like that they did not stick to my teeth or the roof of my mouth as I chewed them.

For what it's worth, the shape of the gummies I received do not resemble that shown on the product description page.

I take B12 vitamin supplements for their health benefits, such as beneficial effects on my nerve and red blood cells. However, since taking these gummies on a daily basis for the past 3 weeks, I can't say that I feel more energetic than I did before taking this product.

With 60 gummies, and a daily recommendation to take 2 of them daily, this bottle will last me 30 days.

A daily serving of 2 gummies gives:
-- 1000 mcg Vit B12 (41,667% recommended daily value)
-- 400 mcg DFE folate (100%)

Expiration date is located on the bottom of the bottle. Mine expires 03/2023.

Lastly, I like the high quality manner in which these gummies are made: GMP (good manufacturing practice) seal, made in FDA-registered facility, gluten-free, non-GMO.

title: Basic first-aid kit
text:
[[VIDEOID:46267d34caf579aa53ecbe39a3c1dfcc]] What I like:
-- the elastic bandages feel soft.
-- the gauze pad and triangular bandage are in sterile packages, keeping them clean until I need to use it.
-- antiseptic towelette is good for cleaning a wound before applying a dressing treatment.
-- the bag is compact and portable, and has a number of loops to attach it to something else (for instance, I could put this on a carabiner inside my backpack).

On the other hand:
-- there are too many safety pins and adhesive bandages. The smallest sized adhesive bandages (10*40mm) do not stick well once I place them on my fingers.
-- adhesive tape is too thin in width, being only 1.25 cm wide (1/2-inch), and it doesn't stick as well as I would like. I have to use multiple pieces of tape to secure a dressing.
-- the plastic tweezers are too flexible.

Overall, this is a decent mini first-aid kit.

title: Semi-solid consistency; spreads well on my skin
text:
This petroleum jelly comes packaged in 6-ounce plastic jars with a lid that opens by lifting the lid and closes by pressing the lid down on the jar to snap it shut.
There is no inner security seal; but, these jars are packaged neatly in tight plastic, and when I opened a jar, the petroleum jelly was smooth all over, and not disturbed.

This petroleum jelly has a semi-solid consistency and is soft & smooth to the touch.

I sniffed the jar, and could not smell a scent.

It feels gentle on my skin. It spreads well as I applied it to various areas of my body.
I make sure, when I am applying this, to spread just a thin layer.
note: on my skin, the dead skin cells will slough off; if I put on too much petroleum jelly, it makes it harder for the cells to slough off, and will also trap dirt/debris/bacteria.

On the product description page, the 2nd picture at the upper right left side (2nd picture out of 7 pictures) states, "..tested and approved by dermatologists..."; however, I examined the label on the front and on the back of the jar, and did not see any mention of this. When claims are made, I like to see them on the label.

Currently, I am using this on my dried, cracked skin for the past 3 weeks, and it's helped the skin close together, and eased the pain.

On the bottom of the jar, there is a manufacturing date (9/2020) and an expiration date (8/2023).

Overall, I like how well my skin has responded and that this petroleum jelly did not irritate my skin.

title: Artificial elderberry flavor; mild sweet; chewy; 2 gummies: 90mg Vit C, 100mg elderberry, 7.5mg Zinc
text:
This Elderberry + Vitamin C gummy product comes in a plastic bottle with a protective inner seal.

The gummies have a moderate fruity scent as I sniffed the gummies in the bottle. They taste mildly sweet.
They are chewy; as I kept chewing, some of the gummy stuck to my teeth.

According to the label, a daily serving of 2 gummies gives 90-mg Vitamin C (100% daily value), 100-mg elderberry, and 7.5-mg zinc (68% daily value), and has 18 calories.

When I am taking an herbal supplement, I look to see how the product is manufactured and the ingredients list.
The product label on the bottle makes no mention of the quality and manner in which these gummies are produced.
In the Other Ingredients section, I noticed that one of the ingredients is artificial elderberry flavor.

Expiration date is on the bottom of the bottle; mine expires 11/2021.

While this brand has the ingredients that I need (elderberry, Vitamin C, Zinc) to help with my immune system, I am returning to my current brand that is made in an FDA-registered facility, GMP-certified, and 3rd-party tested and has a higher content of elderberry and zinc per two gummies.

title: Mask protects my face well; adjustable ear loops for good fit
text:
These 2 cloth face masks (each mask is individually packed in its own resealable plastic bag) fit my small-size face in a comfortable manner.
The flexible nose clip helps the mask stay more securely on the bridge of my nose. I find that the more closely the mask fits around my nose, the less often my glasses fog up.
The ear loops are adjustable, allowing a good form-fitting mask without the loops tugging at my ears.

At each side of the mask, the ear loops are sewn into the mask (as opposed to masks that have the loops sewn on the outside or the inside of the masks).

I like that there is a slot inside the mask, where I can put in a PM2.5 filter.
note: filters are not included with these masks. I am fine wearing these 3-ply masks as is, and have not bought filters to put inside the slot.

I like that the bottom part of the mask has a extension such that the mask goes under my chin.

The mesh helps prolong the life of these masks during repeated washings.

There are a number of laundry symbols on the back of the resealable bag. Here's how I interpreted the symbols:
wash in water temperatures not above 30 degrees, do not bleach, do not tumble dry, iron any temperature - steam, any solvent.

On the back of the resealable bag, there are confusing instructions, such as "...wash the poison once a day, wash it with warm water first, then bot and hot to dry..."
The instruction to wash in warm water is in contrast with the laundry symbol that I interpreted above, "wash in water temperatures not above 30 degrees".

Overall, I like how well this mask fits my face from the bridge of my nose to under my chin.

title: Can't fit mop into Wash or Dry compartment without pad lifting off mop
text:
[[VIDEOID:efb7d9cdb254f16979b4f77332c3479b]] Short summary: I had a hard time getting this flat mop and bucket to work in its intended manner.

More details:
I could not get the mop with the microfiber pad to fit into either the Wash or Dry compartment without the pad lifting off the mop.
After repeated attempts to get the mop & pad into the bucket, the sticky part lifted away from the mop (see pic).
However, if I held each side of the width of the mop at one end with my hands, and slowly pushed it into either the Wash compartment or the Dry compartment, I was able to get the mop into the compartments.

To take off the top part of the bucket (so that I could pour out the water), I gently pull out the red handle on both sides. Then, I could lift the top off of the bucket.
After I placed the top part back on to the bucket, I could not fully fit the red handle back into its slot. Instead, the red handle juts out a little. (see pic).

The user manual has clear illustrations on how to assemble the mop & handle. As I am using the mop, sometimes, the handle comes apart. I decided to tape the handle at multiple areas.

As I am cleaning our hardwood floor, the microfiber pad does clean the floor, but, it also pushes some of the dust/debris (instead of picking it up) along the floor as I mop the floor.

I measure the bucket to be 15" tall.
I measure the bucket to be 8-1/2 inches from front to back.
I measure the bucket to be 8-inches from side to side.
I measure the microfiber pad to be 13-inches length x 5-inches width.

In short, this product did not work for me.

title: Rich, smooth, sweet, delicious vanilla taste. 26 Vitamins & minerals
text:
This ready-to-drink Nutrisure protein shake (vanilla flavor) comes in 6 compact plastic bottles that have an outer seal on the cap. Each bottle is 8-fl. oz.

This shake has a rich, smooth, sweet, delicious vanilla taste. It doesn't have a gritty taste (it helps that I shake each bottle vigorously prior to drinking it).

The consistency of this shake is like that of whole milk (whereas, I typically drink low-fat milk, which has a thinner consistency).

Instructions on the bottle label advises, "...shake well...serve cold..."
I agree. I drank one at room temperature, and while it still tasted sweet, it was not as refreshing as the others that I drank after it had been refrigerated.

I like how nutritious a serving size of 1 bottle is:
-- 26 vitamins & minerals (including Vitamins A, K, B12, E)
-- 9g protein

One minor issue: I found it a bit difficult to open the outer seal. I used a knife to lift up the plastic seal, and then I could unwrap it. It's not a big deal to me.

Expiration date is on the cap of each bottle. Mine expires Dec 2, 2020.

Finally, this protein shake should not be consumed by those who have galactosemia, as per writing on the label.

When I don't have time to eat as healthy as I'd like (typically, at lunch at work), I look for drinks that give me a more complete, balanced nutrition. This Basic Care Nutrisure Vanilla nutrition shake suits my needs well.

title: Fairly quiet operation of the motor; some of the trimmers work well.
text:
[[VIDEOID:824e87d93bfdcedb5a52eb24519a145d]] Short summary: I could not get the body trimmer or the nose trimmer to work.
The full trimmer, precision trimmer, and design trimmer (along with the comb guides) work well for our family needs to cut and style our hair.
The handle operates in a fairly quiet manner.
The instruction manual is useful.

More details:
This 6-in-1 grooming kit includes:
-- handle
-- full trimmer, design trimmer, precision trimmer, nose trimmer, micro shaver, body trimmer
-- 4 comb guides (3-, 6-, 9-, 12-mm)
-- comb guide for precision trimmer (4-. 4.5-, 5-, 5.5-mm)
-- comb guide for body trimmer (2.8-, 5.8-, 9.8-mm)
-- charging cable
-- instruction manual
-- base/stand to hold the handle and a few of the accessories
-- cleaning brush

The handle has an On/Off button. There is an indicator light - it turns green when in use. It turns red while charging. At the bottom is the port to charge the handle.

I like the fairly quiet humming sound this handle emits as our family uses the full trimmer, design trimmer, and precision trimmer for the various hair cuts they want.

I could not get the nose trimmer and the body trimmer to work.

Like the other trimmers, I could easily install the microshaver; but, I had a very difficult time removing it. I could easily remove all other trimmers.

According to the manual, charging the handle initially takes 8 hours. I charged it up before I left for work, and asked family members to un-plug it when the handle was done. I forgot to ask them to check the time. Regardless, I've used this to cut 2 family members hairs on just the initial charge. Neither one complained about the trimmers pulling the hairs in a painful manner as their hairs were being cut.
I did not need my hair cut since a family member cut mine recently with another hair trimmer brand.

This hair trimmer performs well for the full trimmer, design trimmer, and precision trimmer.
But, I prefer the hair trimmer brand we currently use, which has all trimmers functional, and its handle has a screen that shows us know how much battery life we have left.

title: Gel, thick consistency; mild minty taste; quality ingredients gentle on my sensitive gums.
text:
This toothpaste product (Fresh Aid, Sensitive Teeth & Gum health) consists of 3 individually boxed toothpaste tubes.

Each 4-oz toothpaste tube has a flip-top cap, and when I removed the cap, has a foil seal covering the opening.

I smelled a pleasing mild minty scent as I held an opened tube to my nose.
The toothpaste is a gel with a thick consistency and a green-yellowish color.

There is just a little bubbles/suds forming as I brushed my teeth.
I did not have any unpleasant aftertaste when I am done brushing my teeth.

The quality ingredients (including aloe vera, ginger, sunflower seed oil, etc) and its lack of irritating ingredients (such as sodium lauryl sulfate) make this a toothpaste that is gentle on my sensitive gums.

The disadvantage of a toothpaste without fluoride is that it doesn't help with cavity prevention.

Expiration date is on the bottom of the box, as well as at the bottom of each tube (in the creased section). Mine expires October 2022.

This Fresh Aid toothpaste is a decent back-up option when I run out of my preferred brand that not only deals with my sensitive gums but also repairs my weak enamel (with its sodium fluoride ingredient).

title: Floss is fragile; I use up more lengths of this dental floss for my dental care.
text:
This all-natural corn starch dental floss product comes in 2 compact rectangular-sized boxes.

Each box measures 2-3/8 inches tall (not including the lid, which I removed) x 1-inch width x 1-inch depth.
I like taking this dental floss with me when commuting; this box does not take up much space in the center console of my car.

Each box contains 50 meters of dental floss. The floss is unraveled from the top.

I find this floss is not as sturdy as my usual brand. If I used the same area of floss to go through 2-3 teeth, the floss will break. But, if I move along the dental floss area in between each teeth, the floss holds up well.
So, the end result is that I use more lengths of this floss during my normal oral care routine, than I would my usual brand.

I can't really taste the mint-flavor as I am flossing; but, that's not a big deal, as I am more interested in cleaning my gums and in-between the teeth.

Ingredients: 100% corn starch PLA, natural plant peppermint oil, candelilla wax
This floss is vegan and biodegradable; the box is made of 100% recyclable material.

While this product is made in a manner that is friendly to the environment, the strength of the floss is weaker than the other brands I use. But, it is a functional dental floss, and I do like using it.

title: Has ingredients to help improve immune system (elderberry, garlic, turmeric, echinacea)
text:
This Immune Blend supplement product consists of 60 capsules, placed inside a bottle with an outer plastic wrap around the cap. Upon removing the seal and opening the cap, there is an inner seal.

Each capsule is oval-shaped, measuring nearly 1-inch in length.
I have no difficulty swallowing these capsules; but, if I were unable to do so, I could open the capsules up, pour the powder contents into a liquid drink, and take this supplement in that manner.

Ingredients include:
-- Elderberry fruit extract
-- Echinacea powder
-- Garlic powder
-- Turmeric
-- Vit C, Vit. B6

The above ingredients have mineral and antioxidant properties that help me cope better with cold, flu, or other health issues that take advantage of a weak immune system.

I note that the ingredient Vitamin E (DL-alpha tocopherol acetate) is in the synthetic form. I prefer to take Vit E products that are of a natural form, which have the "D-alpha" designation.

The product label recommends a daily serving of 2 capsules. So, one bottle will last 30 days.
Expiration date is on the bottom of the bottle. Mine expires April 2022.

While this product has some of the ingredients that I look for in helping to boost my immune system, I prefer the brand that I am currently taking, which has been tested by an independent 3rd party, has Good Manufacturing Practice label, has no fillers, is non-GMO, and has 17 ingredients (including the natural form of Vitamin E) to help improve my body's defense.

title: Fruity, slightly sour; thick liquid texture. I like the boost it gives me.
text:
This Protein 2GO liquid dietary supplement comes in a 2.5-fl. oz. (75mL) compact bottle that measures 4-1/2 inches tall and 4-5/8 inches diameter..
There are twelve total bottles; each bottle has a tight plastic seal around the cap. It takes a bit of effort to remove the seal.

The taste is that of strawberry - a bit fruity/sweet, but also some sourness to it.
The texture of the liquid is a bit thick.

I drank a bottle on its own; its thickness and taste made it slightly tough to drink the entire bottle.

The next day, I drank a second bottle, and then drank water right after. It made the product more tolerable for my taste.

I find this works best for me when I poured the Protein 2GO into a bottle, and added about 6 ounces of water. Makes it less sweet, and more of a liquid. I took it to work, left it in the fridge until I was ready to use it. Tastes great when it's cold.

I have not experienced any side effects (I wasn't anxious, fidgety, etc).

It gives me a nice boost to get me through the last few hours at work, when I am most tired, but still need to be productive at work.

I like that one bottle gives me 26g of protein; there are no fats, no carbohydrates, no sugars, no cholesterol.

Expiration date is located on the top of the cap. Mine expires Jan, 2022.

One curious thing I noted: these 12 bottles are packed in a box. One side of the box says the product is used for surgery, treatment, illness. But, the label on the bottle says, "...this product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease..."

title: Need generous amount on tough odors; fine-mist spray; chlorine smell; no protective seal on bottle.
text:
This Odor-Destroying Spray (by Crutcheze) comes in a 6-oz spray bottle.
There was no outer seal on my bottle.
When I removed the cap, there was no inner seal.
There was no sealant/plastic cap over the spray opening.

The bottle is 7-1/4 inches tall, with a circumference of 5-5/8" - easy for me to hold (I have small size hands).

The bottle delivers a fine mist spray as I press the spray pump, with a moderate chlorine smell.
This bottle works best when held upright. When I held this upside down to spray into my shoes, it did not deliver much spray.

I have very comfortable, but old, shoes and gloves that I love to wear while out gardening; these items are well-worn, and do not smell good.
I took out the insoles of those shoes, then sprayed inside of the shoes, and on the insoles.
I sprayed inside the gloves.
We sprayed the kids' shoes and their backpacks.
We left them outside the house to air out.

The gloves did not have the smell they used to have.
The kids' shoes did not smell as bad as before.
My shoes still smelled a bit; although the odor was not as potent as before. The smell that remained came from deep inside the shoe, at the toe area, where the spray did not get into. With what I had left in the bottle, I removed the cap and poured the liquid down into that area. After leaving the shoes outside for a couple more days, the smell was was still present, but I am fine with the improvement.

The product got used up quickly.

Overall, this product does work in greatly reducing the heavy odors in my shoes.

note: the bottle says that it, "..instantly eliminates odors...", but the description says that it "...does not mask difficult odors...."

title: Useful for various chores around house and yard. Tiny tear on inside of glove.
text:
These medium-sized gloves - 1 pair of blue, 1 pair of yellow - measure 12-3/4 inches at its longest length. The width of the cuff is 5-inch.

I like the ridges/swirls on the palm and the fingers - provides decent grip.

Before using it, I turned the gloves inside out to inspect it; There is a minor tear in one of the blue-color glove (see first pic). It does not extend all the way through the glove. These gloves are not too thin, but slightly thick enough so that I can wash the dishes in hot water without feeling my hands getting uncomfortably hot.

I sniffed the inside of the gloves - didn't smell anything.

The gloves are great to pull out damp weeds and unwanted plants in the yard; it's been raining lately, and with little sun throughout the day, the weeds are too wet to use my regular gardening gloves to remove, as the water goes through the gloves and gets my hands wet.
With these Pacific PPE gloves, my hands have not gotten wet while I am out in the yard, tending to my plants.

The gloves are great to use when I need to remove twigs and small branches and throw them in the yard/refuse bin.

These gloves are also useful for various cleaning chores in the home (washing the dishes, cleaning the hardwood floors, etc).

The materials of the gloves has caused no rashes/itching on my skin so far.

Overall, I use these gloves in a variety of ways around the house and yard. I can easily wash dirt off the gloves, then use regular dishwashing soap to clean them more. Then, I leave them out to dry for next use.

title: Soft, gentle, soothing. Doesn't irritate my nose/face/elsewhere with repeated use. No scent.
text:
What is included in this product:

--- 18 boxes of Kleenex Expressions (soothing lotion)
Each box 65 tissues. Each tissue has 3-ply feature.
Each box is shaped like a cube. It measures just a tad above 5 inches tall, when I have the box positioned upright, ready for me to lift a tissue out of the box.
Overall measurement for each Kleenex box is 5-inch x 4-1/2 inch x 4-1/2 inch.

I easily removed the serrated, oval-shaped cover. Then, I removed the thin plastic lining, with help of the scissors, as the plastic is quite stubborn. Then, once I removed one tissue, another tissue popped up in its place.

These Kleenex facial tissues are soft, gentle, and soothing to my skin.
As I hold a tissue to my nose, I could not smell any scent.

With the cold weather, I am more prone to getting a runny nose. I used these coconut oil- and aloe-infused Kleenex tissues repeatedly, and it doesn't cause irritations to my nose or the area under my nose and above my upper lip. This is very important to me; in the past, I have used other brands (with different features), and after repeated use on my runny nose, I end up rubbing the skin raw, causing painful cracks in the skin.

Also, when I needed to blow my nose, these tissues held well under pressure.

note: the large box that contained these 18 Kleenex boxes were dented in on one side, resulting in 3 Kleenex boxes being dented because they were located on that side. It didn't matter to me, as the Kleenex tissues function in the manner that I needed them.

5-stars for the excellent way these Kleenex tissues function in addressing my needs.

title: Needed 10+ tablespoons of Agave inulin to get mug of hot tea to be sweet.
text:
This product - Super Organics Powder, Agave Inulin, - is advertised as a ".. substitute for sugar in recipes, and add to taste for beverages..".

I needed to use a lot of the product to get the amount of sweetness that I like.

When I drink hot tea, I typically use honey to sweeten my tea. In a pinch, I will use 2-1/2 tablespoons worth of regular sugar to my 16-oz mug.

With this Agave Inulin, I put 2-1/2 tablespoons worth of it in my tea; there was no sugary taste.
I needed to add 4 more tablespoons to get mild sweetness.

The next night, I added 10 tablespoons worth of Agave Inulin to my mug of hot tea. There was a better taste of sweetness.

What I like about this product:
-- it's healthier than the typical sugar product, being non-GMO, organic, Vegan, gluten-free, Plant-based ingredients
-- there is some slight clumping once the powder is placed in hot water, but with vigorous stirring, it dissolves well.
-- easy to open, re-sealable bag

Expiration date is located on the back of the package, in the silver background, below the ingredients label. Mine expires 12/2020.

Overall, this is not a product for me, as I would need to use over 10 tablespoons worth of Agave Inulin in order to get my tea to be sweetened to how I like it.

title: Dissolves well in water with vigorou stirring; spoon is included; like the vanilla flavor
text:
This NeoCell Super Collagen product (French Vanilla flavor) came with an intact protective seal.
After I removed the seal, I smelled a nice slight vanilla flavor when I held it near my nose.

A convenient-to-use spoon is included (to get the spoon, I had to shift the powder around a bit, as the spoon was totally immersed in the powder, and not visible when I first removed the protective seal)

I added a spoon of the powder to 1- cup (via measuring cup) of plain water into a mug. I stirred and stirred. After about 1-2 minutes of somewhat vigorous stirring, the powder dissolved. I couldn't see any significant amounts of the powder remaining. (see pictures).
The taste was somewhat bland, with a slight vanilla flavor.

I did the same thing; but this time, added 1/2 cup (via measuring cup) of plain water. The vanilla flavor was a bit stronger. I prefer this combination of 1 spoon of powder and 1/2 cup of water, just because I like to taste the vanilla flavor more.

I added a spoon of powder to my smoothie. Smoothie tasted fine.
I added a spoon of powder to my refrigerated orange juice. Juice tasted fine.

I prefer using this powder in a juice drink, rather than plain water.

I have used it daily for 4 days; so far, I have not experienced side effects.

Nutritional information (1 spoon serving size):
Calories = 25
Protein = 6 gm
Hydrolyzed bovine collagen = 6.6 gm
Other ingredients: Natural flavors, citric acid
May contain: trace amounts of naturally occurring sulfite residue
Collagen type 1 & 3
No soy, no wheat, no lactose, no artificial flavors
This is Gluten-free, grass-fed
Non-GMO tested
The manufacturer says that you get about 26 servings total per container. So, this product, taking 1 spoon of powder daily, should last about 26 days.
This container is 100% recycled
Does not contain common GE genes or proteins.

Given that I have had no side effects, I will finish out the product, and see how my skin, hair, nails and joint feels. I will upgrade this to a 5-star if I see positive body changes upon finishing out the product. I've only used it for 4 days so far.

title: Soft, chewy, peanut butter in center of bar, delicious. Quite filling!
text:
This Cliff Cubes double peanut bar is soft and chewy, with peanut butter in the middle of the bar - tasty and delicious! This bar was easy to chew, and not sticky while I was chewing it.

Each bar has segments that you can break into smaller pieces. It was easy to break the bar into smaller segments, without too many little pieces of the bar breaking apart.
I prefer to eat the entire bar in one sitting without breaking it into smaller pieces.

I use these Cliff Cubes as an afternoon snack while at work - they are filling, which I like. Eating snack bars often makes me thirsty, so I also drink water. It helped keep up my energy for those last couple hours of a work day.

This is USDA-organic, Non-GMO product.

Nutrition-wise, each Cliff Cube bar has:
Calories = 210
Total Fat = 10 grams (saturated = 2.5, polyunsaturated = 3, monounsaturated = 5)
Cholesterol = 0 grams
Sodium = 200 grams
Total Carbs = 26 grams
Total sugars = 20 grams
Dietary Fiber = 3 grams
Proteins = 6 grams
Calcium = 20 mg
Iron = 1 mg
Potassium = 252 mg

Ingredients = date paste, peanut butter, peanuts, rice starch, palm oil, peanut flour, cane sugar, sea salt, soy flour, sunflower lecithin, mixed tocopherols

title: Does the job well
text: Ginseng has so many great health benefits.  It's been used in Asian medicinal culture for centuries.  This Korean Panax Ginseng is touted to improve alertness, improve daily functions, possibly improve sexual abilities and more.  My key take away is having better alertness and energy.  Ginseng is always a part of my daily supplementation.

title: Love It!
text: This brush is just about perfect!  It has a great bristle side as well as a nubbed side.  The bristles are stiff enough to give a clean, invigorating wash.  The nubbbed side is great for massaging your back after it's been washed.  Definitly worth the price, too.

title: High Quality
text: This is a high quality product.  It blends well with coffee and has no aftertaste.  It works well when added to other foods.  Can be used in Keto breads and puddings for extra texture and a hit of protein.  Unflavored, it doesn't add taste to whatever it's added to.  High quality and a good price.

title: Good Probiotic
text: Probiotics come in all mixes of bacteria.  These have a good quantity of the bacteria needed for gut flora maintenance.  Easy to swallow and no after taste or burping.  They seem like a good quality with the right ingredients.

title: Good basic brush
text: This is a good basic brush with a long wooden handle.  The bristles are soft, very soft.  The handle is unpainted wood and is long enough to reach just about anyplace on the body.  The brush feels quite comfortable and works as one should.  How long will it last is an unknown, but it should outperform many of the competitors.

title: Good so far
text: I definitely enjoy using a good probiotic for gut health. These have four strains of probiotics and the coating to prevent them dissolving before they reach the intestines.  So far they seem to be working.  Can say they are better than other brands though.  Will see how I feel after finishing the bottle.

title: Added to my cold and flu arsenal
text: I’ve been using zinc cold lozenges for years as a cold and flu preventer.  These are a bit different.  They are not a lozenge but a dissolving tablet.  They are not for sore throat relief, but tout the ability to aid in a dry throat.  I presume they will have similar effects as the branded zinc lozenges at a much higher price, though.  That said, I’ve included them in my cold and flu arsenal.

title: Definitely part of my daily supplement list
text: With the substantial evidence that we are ingesting way too many omega 6s, an omega 3 supplement is essential.  This Fish Oil Omega 3 has a good amount of omega 3s in the suggested ratios.  It's hard to rate a specific supplement when it's part of a list taken daily, but this was easy to swallow, didn't have a bad after taste, and seems to work for me.

title: Great tasting, but beware the added sugars
text:
- My goal with this was for Keto ice cream, but then noticed it contains added maltodextrin
- Tastes great and did work perfectly when used to make ice cream
- Used in coffee, it adds a unique flavor
- Added an interesting flavor to mug brownies, too
- Good for multiple purposes as long as you understand that it contains maltodextrin which is not good for you according to many reports and studies

title: Good when half way full
text: These rinse bottles do work, easier to clean sinuses. It is better to keep the bottle half way full otherwise becomes a bit difficult.

title: Easy to use, not the best results
text:
[[VIDEOID:3a29dfcb9f99556b5e007cbacc07f51a]] This is a very easy to use hair straightener brush. Heats up pretty fast, highest temperature is 400 F.
I had some trouble when getting to the end of my hair, I was able to curve it a little, but it was hard if I wanted to have them done completely straight.
Comes with a heat glove.

title: Love vanilla scent, great for diffuser but ...
text:
[[VIDEOID:8195c4552399a2ddc74c4736a5ad13f4]] This is a big bottle of vanilla essential oil. It truly smells like vanilla. I have been using it in my diffuser. Aprox 10-15 drops is enough for a 500 sq feet room.

There is only one thing that I am not 100% comfortable. As you can see in the video, this bottle came with some floating things inside. I am not sure if they are part of the vanilla bean or what but I have never seen an essential oil (especially vanilla) with those floating things.

title: Great quality lubricant
text:
This, almost unscented lub, is great quality. Water-based that includes a few good extra ingredients like aloe vera and green tree. It does not include any synthetic fragrance that are very toxic.
You can almost say it does not taste to anything at all, however, it does taste a little like aloe vera, not bad but it is not super delicious to taste (in case you are a fan of the flavored lubs).
A little goes a long way, so regardless of the small bottles, they will last a few months. Also, small bottle = portable.
Expiration date: July 2023 (1 year 4 month after delivery)

title: Convenient roll-on, cooling, scent not too overwhelmed
text:
This has been working pretty well for my mom with arthritis. She used it on her hands and back basically and she said has helped very nicely when applied at the morning and night.
She feels an instant cooling effect that last a few minutes until it dries.
The roll-on presentation is pretty convenient, just applied and ready. Different from gels or creams that you may need to wash your hands afterwards.
Cruelty-free and made in the USA.

title: Fun rainbow bath bombs
text:
These are huge bath bombs, last during the whole time while my kiddos at the shower.
It is very fun to see how the rainbow forms in the water.
Only thing to consider is that water color at the end is brown-ish due to the mix of all colors. Just set expectations with your kids they won't get 'rainbow water'.
I did not really perceive any particular scent, but still pretty fun during shower time. Kiddos can't decide if they like this over the ones with a toy inside. They are both super fun.

title: Great variety at a reasonable price
text:
I was a little disappointed when I got this beautiful box full of essential oils because the sealed was broken Once I opened the box, I closely examined each one of the bottles and thankfully they were all sealed.
Besides that, I think this is a great selection of essential oils that includes not too common scents like Ylang Ylang, rose and frankincense (which does not really have a scent but I know is great for skin).
They are not as strong as other brands I have tried. For instance, lemon was very soft even when I poured about 15 drops in my diffuser. Others like rosemary and cinnamon where a bit stronger.
At the end, I like the idea of having multiple options to choose from and this set definitely offers that possiblity.

title: You have to be quick!!!
text:
Good pack of eyeglass cleaning wipes, perfect to have them on your backpack, purse, car, drawer any where since they are really portable.
It wipe is good size, easy to clean the glasses, however you have to be really quick because they evaporates super fast, 1 or 2 minutes tops.
I have tried other wipes where I am able to clean my glasses and my cell phone screen, but not with these ones, just the glasses and that's it.

title: So much fun for the kids!!
text:
I like these bath bombs a lot. A few things could be improved such as the scent and foam. But other than that, my kids and I enjoyed them A LOT!!

They all come individually wrapped, and labeled depending on the fragrance. The box is thick and very nice. Gift ready for sure.

Stain free: Yes!
Scent: strong when opened the whole box, but dissipated fast when on the bathtub.
Colorful: OMG YES!! Water was very colorful every time!
Foam: not quite

title: Wanted to love them, but they just don't smell!!
text:
I was so excited when I saw these steamers. Came in a beautiful box, opened the box full of colorful disc with 8 different scents. I smelled each one of them and they really smell nice.
I placed one disc as instructed on the shower avoiding for the water to get directly on top of it. It started to have little bubbles and though scent was coming my way .... nothing, not a single time. I bent down to see if that was really doing something and yes, I could smell a little bit, but that's it.
Good thing they did not stain my tub nor my non-slip shower floor mat.
Leaving 2 stars just because of the nice presentation, other than that, I think they are not really adding any value to your shower.

title: Scent doesn't last .... 98.75% water
text:
This is a great idea, however it is missing an important element, it does not last!
I mean it is good that comes in a small bottle (2.3 oz) that can easily be carried inside your purse/backpack/fanny pack for when you have to go to public restrooms, composting toilets or portable toilets. But when I have used it, I had to spray from 2 to 3 times when I entered the restroom, and then after 1 minute, the scent was completely gone.
Considering the above, using from 3 to 6 sprays per use, this small bottle won't last long.
I guess it can also be a nice addition to you house restroom for when you have visitors, it's just a little overprice for 2 little bottles.

title: Cute and functional facial cleansing brush but ...
text:
Cute cleansing brush. It is comfortable to use and good size to cleanse and massage your face. There are a few particular features that I am not a big fan such as the plug to charge it and the way you have to remove the little cap on the back to charge it. However, I think this is a great tool to integrate into your daily beauty routine that can be used on a daily basis to ensure you are completely cleansing your face and removing dead skin.

Pros:
* Soft silicone
* Comfortable to hold
* Adjustable vibration
* Waterproof
* Portable

Cons:
* Short USB cable
* USB cable has a very specific plug, does not use a standard micro USB cable like many other devices. So if you lose this cable, you will not be able to recharge it.
* The removable little cap that protects the area to plug it, can get lost in a blink. It is tiny and does not have a strap that ties it to the device.
* Price, I think is a little overprice considering all the above. I have seen other cleansing devices for the same price that offers features such as wireless charging and different textures to cleanse and massage.

title: Small difference
text:
This new heated eyelash tool seems to slightly work on my eyelashes. I have never been a fan of the eyelash curler, so this little tool seems to be a relatively good option for replacing regular curlers once in a while. My only concern is that heat has never been the best friend of hair (think how hair gets dry when straightening or curling), so similar thing would happen to eyelashes if not taken care properly (oil or serum is highly recommended).

Some of the positive aspects I have to share are:
1. Easy to use, one button to operate it.
2. 4 different temperature settings depending on your eyelashes need.
3. LED display to show temperature, on/off.
4. Heats up in a matter of seconds.
5. USB cable included.

Negative aspects:
1. No wall adapter for the USB cable.
2. Prolonged use of heat tools on hair/eyelashes can dry and weaken foundation.

title: It works!!!
text:
All ingredients listed are 100% natural, hence I feel confident in using it on my toddler's shoes (little ones that never stop running!) as well as in adult's shoes.
I am very pleased by the results, no more smelly shoes!!

Just spray twice into each shoe, let it dry and done!

title: Great quality rose quartz roller, not impressed Gua Sha stone
text:
This is an amazing set. I am impressed with the quality and all extra goodies it came with such as the hard case to protect the stones, the soft case, the pouch and microfiber.
The roller feels nice and soft when using on your face and neck (bonus if you refrigerate it for a few minutes). It is very relaxing to massage your face before going to bed while watching TV or just doing nothing but massaging.

Reason why I am rating this set 4 start it's because I am not impressed with the Gua Sha stone. I think it is very thin and it does not have concave part (the upper part of the heart) deeper to allow better flow if decided to use on your face.

Everything else, is great quality and will definitely keep using it on a daily basis before going to bed!!

title: Good quality, soft and slick sponges
text:
I am very happy with these konjac sponges. They come in this nice and resealable package where each one of the sponges come wrapped individually.
Each color supposed to have its own benefit. So far I have tried 2, not quite sure I saw a difference while using one or the other one. However, in general they all help to exfoliate your face and it is nice to switch colors. They do not smell at all.
If you have never tried the konjac sponges, you will be amazed on how different they feel from the regular cellulose sponge (the yellow-brownish ones you can get anywhere). They feel hard when new but when you soak them in water become really soft and slick.

title: Totally worth the price!
text:
Nice set of nano nail files. I have found I love nano nail files now. They are softer than regular nail files, they would last forever, have their own hard case and are very stylish.
They do create a lot of dust when filing your nails, but it is thinner than regular one.
Highly recommend to wash them after each use to ensure they will always be as clean and bright as new.

title: Not for me
text:
I'm not a big fan of this b+ complex liquid. Mainly it is the taste I don't like, the strawberry flavor is really light and doesn't cover up the unpleasant taste.

They are also difficult to separate, you pretty much have to use scissors to separate them. Also, I didn't feel any different while taking these, my energy level didn't change.

Frankly, I'd rather just take a pill. If you hate pills and are vitamin b deficient, you might like these more than I did.

title: Lovely scent
text:
This sandalwood oil smells wonderful, I love it. It is not overpoweringly strong but it is strong enough to be smelled across the room.

It also comes in a large leak proof glass bottle with a dropper included.

title: Works well
text:
This glass foot file works great, you can really sand off the dry skin on your feet with it.

It is a little big for my hands, although I have small hands. It also get clogged up a little too quickly. If you have a lot of dry skin, you may have to wash it out while using it.

title: Decent plant protein
text:
This powder mixes in well, although the directions say to mix in two whole scoops. It tastes pretty good, except that it does have a bit of that protein flavor.

All in all, it's pretty decent for the price.

title: Decent plant protein
text:
This tastes pretty good, although it does have a bit of that protein flavor. It mixed in well, although the directions say to mix in two whole scoops.

All in all, it's pretty decent for the price.

title: Powerful
text:
[[VIDEOID:fae867a93a2d423f97686f16afc25128]] This tense device comes with everything you need, including pads and a carrying case. I like that there are so many settings on it, there are three main modes and 8 different types within each mode.

My only complaint is that it is almost too strong for me, but I'm a bit of a wuss. My husband loves how powerful this tens device is.

title: Great roller
text: I love this cold roller, I can get a massage effect while also getting localized cold to any areas that hurt. Mainly I have been using it for my hands to relieve carpal tunnel pain.

title: Love it
text: This is a great milk substitute. It easily dissolves in warm water, and taste good too. I love being able to have chocolate milk again.

title: Great for those that don't like pressure on their eyes, great for travel.
text: This eye mask is great for me. I have a wide face and it is comfortable. I like to sleep with an eye mask as I work night shift often and sleep during the day. I have sensitive eyes and don’t like things touching my eyes so this is perfect for me as it doesn’t even touch my eyelashes. It comes with a cold pack, as well as this is heated. It heats up quickly and gets warm enough for my liking. I get dry eyes and that seems to help soothe them. This comes with a travel pouch, with some ear buds, making this also great for travel.

title: Nice faint scent, doesn’t leave streaking or residue.
text: These floor cleaner sheets dissolve quickly and have a nice faint scent. It works great on my vinyl plank flooring without leaving any residue or stickiness on the floor. The sheets are smaller than expected and make it easy for storing. It takes up less room than a bottle.

title: Best water based I’ve tried yet.
text: This is by far the best water based lubricant I have tried. It didn’t dry up and leave little balls quickly like others have in the past. It is also odor free. It was comfortable to use and didn’t cause any irritation.

title: Great for making detergent.
text: This set of Botox and washing soda are perfect for making at home cleaners and laundry detergent. They come with a scoop and the bags are re-sealable. They come with recipes on the back for making your own cleaner if preferred. You can use the borax for cleaning multiple surfaces.

title: Best tasting way to get ashwagandha
text:
These are delicious gummies, and they deliver a reasonable dose of ashwagandha. Supposedly this supplement helps to reduce anxiety and stabilize mood. I originally got these for my wife who struggles with anxiety more than I do, but she is also a calorie counter so she decided not to eat these, instead taking ashwagandha in pill form. So, I've been taking them. I don't really suffer from anxiety or unstable mood, but I enjoy the flavor of these and I guess they have helped me somewhat during stressful times. Overall, this is definitely the tastiest way to get this supplement for sure!

title: Works well and smells nice (but does that matter if you're just going to wash the clothes anyway?)
text:
These stain removers are definitely impressively effective. I cook a lot and I don't always wear an apron, so I end up with grease or sauce splatters sometimes. If I happen to be wearing a shirt that I like, that's not ideal, so I was excited to try these out. The scents are nice, and a little bit goes a long way to breaking up stains prior to throwing these in the wash. The scents don't seem to matter, however, since you'll just wash the clothes after. I guess you could keep one in the office or wherever else to try and spot treat stains on the go. I haven't tried that yet.

In the end, for around $20, these aren't the cheapest, but they work well, so they're easy to recommend.

title: Great pills, plain and simple.
text:
These are interesting pills. They're made with coconut oil, so they smell vaguely coconutty, which is pretty pleasant. They're also tiny, so they're very easy to get down. The concern of my very calorie conscious wife was that these would be quite caloric due to the coconut oil, but each pill has about 0.6 calories according to the bottle, so that's not a whole lot. The absorbency seems good. We originally started taking D3 after we had covid, and along with some other supplements, it was instrumental in getting us back to 100%. These pills have been a great continuation of the immune benefits. We generally feel very healthy and find that any time we get a cold in our household, the effects are minimal and go away quickly. Overall, these are easy to recommend!
