title: Flavorless, easy to swallow pills
text:
Of all the reasons to get a vitamin supplement, here's an unusual one: vitamin B3 was among my doctor's recommendations as I recovered from a (thankfully) mild case of covid. So, I didn't necessarily want to be taking these, but when I realized I had gotten sick, I wanted to do whatever possible to give my body the best chance to recover as quickly and fully as possible. As one supplement among several, these pills helped me get healthy again quickly and without any lasting effects. I can't necessarily quantify how much of the efficient recovery was due to these specifically (as I was also taking Vitamin C, Zinc, and others), but I can certainly comment on the quality of the pills.

They're standard sized vegetarian capsules, and they're easy to swallow. I liked that the dose was just one pill compared to some that are split into two or three. I found that these helped me with a boost to immune function as I was hoping for. At the $15-ish price range, I find that they're a good value considering their quality. So, whether you're in recovery or just trying to boost your health with vitamin supplements, these are a good choice!

title: Moisturizes well
text:
My skin has gotten more dry over the years, especially during the colder months. And no matter what I do, I cannot get the dryness to ease up. My wife has used some similar products to this and suggested I try this one for myself. At this point, anything is worth a shot, so I did.
It is a small jar and I didn't know how much use I'd get out of it. But, I found that this is a slightly thicker cream so I only have used small amounts. A small amount does go a long way. It absorbs into the skin nicely without leaving an oily feel to it. I've not noticed any shine on my face which is nice because I don't wish to have an oily appearance. After a few days of using this at night, my skin has become much more soft and the usual flaking I get has been eliminated. I'm very happy that this cream has been repairing my dry, flaky skin. Cost is high, but if you only use the least amount needed, this can last for some time.

title: Plant based protein with fiber
text: I like using plant and whey based proteins at different times of the day or sometimes even together.  I like this protein since it has added fiber which helps the drink from being digested too fast so you get better protein absorption.  The Original Marshmallow flavor isn't bad. Different, but not bad. It does have a slight aftertaste, but that's common for sugarless protein drinks. I will usually mix in some yogurt, peanut butter or banana  and that helps quite a bit and also provides extra nutrients.  Great thing is that it has no milk products or lactose so it's nice for the lactose intolerant.

title: Seems to be working for my wife
text:
I've been using milk thistle for myself and my wife wanted to try it for herself. She is getting up there in age, and has noticed her body changing. She does have health issues and keeping a steady diet to support her changes and needs has been an ongoing issue.
I've told her of the benefits of using milk thistle and how it has helped me, so she decided she wanted to try these. This is a lower dose supplement, so this worked out for my wife. So far, she has been taking this as directed on the bottle, and she says she hasn't had any ill effects from it. She also stated that she hasn't noticed anything tremendously different either. Either way, she says she does feel better knowing that the she is being proactive, and that if these support natural detox functions, then it is still a benefit. She says they're easy to take and don't have any bad after tastes/burps. Whether they are helping her liver, she says she isn't sure, but the benefits of the ingredients themselves give her comfort. Also, there is enough to last her for some time and she says she feels confident in the lower dose for her needs.

title: One of the better, more readily absorbed forms of zinc
text:
It isn't often that I have found zinc orotate, a more absorbable form of zinc. I appreciate that this is in a dropper form because dosing is much easier to do, especially for my daughter. She doesn't need as much zinc due to her age, so the number of drops indicated on the bottle help us figure out how much to give without overdosing her.
It is usually added to her water since that's all she drinks. There is a subtle flavor which isn't bad at all. We can give this to her straight from the bottle or add it to her water. Either way, it is easy to dose and get down. Well worth the cost!

title: The kids love this chewable probiotic
text: All 4 of my kids enjoy taking this probiotic because it tastes pretty good according to them.  However, when they chew it, they said it can be a bit gritty, but that dissipates quickly. This probiotic chew is in addition to another probiotic they take.  It's difficult to find a high, multiple strain probiotic that isn't insanely expensive, so we do a couple different ones.  Overall, this hasn't had any negative effects or negative interactions with the other probiotics they take.  The price for the amount is a bit high, especially if there is more than one child taking it.  It would be nice if there could be a multipack at some point.

title: Difficult  for me to.use
text: Other people did not seem.to have any problems but I simply could not manage to set it up.properly the cords would not stay attached while my arm.is small enough I could not get the  arm cuff to stay in place.

title: Disappointing! Did not actually add scent at all
text: Disappointing ! These do dissolve, they don't fizz, they do not disperse any aroma into your shower stall. There is no info as to which tablet is supposed to be which fragrance. The tablets do have a small amount of dried plant material on each tablet and one of the rose tabs and one I've the lavender tab have the correct plant material.on them. You can kind of smell the tab fragrance if you hold them.up to your nose and snort. But most are still unidentifiable and none of the actually worked even though I scrupulously followed the instructions.

title: Good supplement pleasant flavor
text: Tastes like Summer vacation , really, i grew up amongst the ponds in Oregon and this does  have the herbal flavor of what was called pond scum back then. Very fine powder takes a bit of effort to blend it into juice or what ever but it  is pleasant and does seem to give a serious boost to energy levels and general wellness.

title: Useful, works well
text: Not much you can say about a classic hot water bag , does not leak,  the cover has a nice pattern, and the water stays warm quite a while. Still conforms to the body well. Lighter weight than the older rubber kind.

title: Great For Smoothies
text:
I take Moringa powder daily. This company's version is good.

I've tried several different brands, including Super Organics and Maju. In fact, I just bought a pound container from Maju just last week on Amazon.

This brand is just as good as the Maju, in terms of look-- a powdery olive look and the smell.

I just poured a teaspoon along with a teaspoon of spirulina and chia seeds in a glass with Pomegranate-Mango juice. Delicious.

Good brand, no complaints.

title: Burst of Energy
text:
I've been taking this for the past several days as a scoop in a container of orange juice.

Now, I know that it says that you can take it with water or any liquid, I don't think a powder like this would go well with anything other than some kind of citrus drink.

In any case, I've been fortifying my bottle of orange juice with a teaspoon of this and within roughly 45 minutes, a feel a momentary burst of energy, sort of like that first cup of coffee feeling. Except, it's not coffee.

I work during the week in a warehouse, so I'm always on the move, this is great when you need some extra energy.

Very good product.

title: Fresh But Not As Potent As Liquid Variety.
text:
Fragrance is very strong, I lIke that. That signals it's freshness.

I cook with coconut milk all the time. There's nothing better to add to a pot of rice (with or without beans) than coconut milk.

Now, this dried/powdered coconut milk is not as favorable as either the actual liquefied milk or the coconut milk oil. I had to use 3 scoops and the taste was a bit faint. I chalk that up to the process of evaporation.

So, to sum it up: this dried coconut milk is fresh but not as potent as the liquid or oil variety.

3.5 stars.

title: Multi Vitamin
text:
I'm a bit surprised but I have most of these ingredients already in my Centrum vitamin but in much, much lower doses.

And, to top it off the recommended intake is 2x a day. Now, if they had created a formula where some of the smaller (quantity) ingredients like Yucca Root Extract, Devil's Claw Root Powder and the rest as the main ingredients and leave the other ingredients that you're probably already taking in a multivitamin and go from there.

Now, if you're taking a multivitamin and one of those daily vitamin pouches, then you should consider how this vitamin would affect or exceed your maximum daily allowance intake,

There's nothing inherently bad about this vitamin and this is a low-dose substitute for a multivitamin.

title: Yes!  This Works!
text:
I was a bit skeptical as to this giving you an energy boost or make you more alert, but that has been my experience for the past couple of days.

I'm one of those people who need at least one cup of coffee in the morning to get me going. I work long hours and sometimes not even two cups keeps me up. I tried this twice in the past 48 hours during an onset of fatigue and haziness and both times, the sleep and fatigue didn't fully come on. In fact, an hour passed by and I hadn't sat down like I normally would.

This blend includes:

Thiamin
Riboflavin
Niacinamide
Vit B6
Vit B12
* 125mg caffeine from
Guarana Seed Extract
Unroasted coffee bean extract
L-tyrosine
Eleuthero root extract

About half of the ingredients I've never heard of but this formula works for me.

title: Essential.  Moringa Leaf Powder.
text:
About six months ago, I was visiting one of my sisters in Texas and she had several Moringa Leaf plants in her house.

When I asked her about this, she couldn't stop telling me of the benefits of "Moringa." In fact, she pulled off a leaf from one of the three plants that she had and started chewing on the leaf. She gave me one and the taste is not bad.

I can't vouch for the medicinal benefits as I am not a doctor but I am putting a tablespoon of this in my green drink "Green Machine" and I after about 30 minutes, I feel revitalized. Not needing anything like a snack. It feels very good.

I can't over-recommend a green-plant based diet but Moringa Leaf has to be an essential part of that equation.

title: Great In A Plant-Based Smoothy
text:
It's important to do a bit of research on the health benefits of Ashwagandha power. The general consensus, that I found, that it is:

* Good for lowering the heart rate
* Great for improving/maintaining focus.

I found this to be true after I made a bottle of beet/ orange/ tomato/ carrot juice.
I poured a teaspoon (the recommended amount) and pour my concoction in a mixing bottle and shook vigorously.

The power was drowned out by the taste of the beets, but one thing that did strike me was my level of attention didn't deteriorate as quickly in the late afternoon as it normally does.

I will continue as I like the effects that I experienced earlier.

title: Deep scrub!
text: This facial brush has helped improve my oily skin because I can do a deep clean. It doesn’t hurt at all and gives a nice soft scrub. So efficient and love that it’s waterproof so I can leave it in my shower.

title: Great calming sensation.
text: This pillow really gives a calming sensation to my kids with sensory needs. They love being able to hug the vibration. It is easy to use and they can’t leave it on accidentally which I love! I just wish it was rechargeable instead of batteries.

title: Calming sensation. Easy to use.
text: [[VIDEOID:393c3ad18c6fc7e0c3f9c3b71d1ba9c3]] This pillow really gives a calming sensation to my kids with sensory needs. They love being able to hug the vibration. It is easy to use and they can’t leave it on accidentally which I love! I just wish it was rechargeable instead of batteries.

title: Works decently. Doesn’t smell great.
text: I have been using this for my son with adhd. I do think it has helped some with focus for him for sure. However, it doesn’t smell very well so he doesn’t like using it.

title: Vacuums well!
text:
Warning: make sure to put a blade cap on or you will get a very close trim which looks like a shave and leaves you bumpy.

Works great and is so nice to not have to clean up all the hairs in the tub!

title: Scent free!
text: This household cleaner is truly scent free. It is easy to spray and easy to use. It seems to do a good job for a surface cleaner. I love that it is natural cleaner and isn’t putting chemicals into my home. For being a natural cleaner it is very affordable.

title: Not perfect but great nonetheless
text:
I've had a handful of times in the past where I could've used something like this... I was basically stuck in the bathroom trying to find something in the bathroom to kill the smell with no luck. LOL.
These are a great idea and are much more discreet than carrying around a bottle of poo-pouri. Not the best smell, but pickers can't be choosers.

title: Mostly MEH
text: I admit that I have higher expectations when you see that this is a reputable brand, Shaper Image. We have a different foot massager from them, and LOVE IT. This one, not so much. It' just a very meh product. There are Shiatsu massagers under the soles of your feet that spin and rotate. The top strap that goes over your feet then has air bags inflate and deflate to create a rhythmic wave like feeling as it causes the massaging nodes to press harder on the soles of your feet. Generally, I have not been a fan of any of the newer massaging devices that use inflated chambers to simulate a massaging effect. It always feels weak and borderline annoying. It's like having someone give you a back massage but doesn't press down with they hands/fingers and just does circular swirling motions. The next problem I have with this device would be the height of the massager. It's higher off the floor than most massagers, so it feels awkward and uncomfortable. Our recliners are a little higher than the couches, and it still feels a little off. Although the fabric is smooth and relatively soft, I worry about how this would hold up over time. Stretching over moving parts and rubbing dirty feet isn't a recipe for long device life.

title: Nice materials but not perfect
text: This is one of the nicer heating pad/menstrual relief devices, because it is made with thicker, softer materials. Other ones we tried were very thin polyester. It's awesome that it actually comes with a battery pack, since most devices do not these days. However, I wish that it was charged with a USB cable instead of a proprietary charger that you now have to keep track of. Since this is battery operated, it doesn't heat up as fast or as hot as a plug in heating pad, but it does provide nice warmth for comfort.

title: Using for dark spots
text: I got this to treat some dark spots on my face from acne. It's pretty freaky and cool when you try it the first time. I wasn't expecting it to light up and hum like a light saber lol. So far, I am noticing some decreased coloration, but it isn't dramatic and will probably take a lot of time and patience. The only thing I worry about is breaking these delicate glass tubes down the road...

title: Beast mode!
text: If you want to dry your hair fast, this is the hairdryer for you. It packs 1875w and is a beast. With all that power does come noise though. It is almost 94 db, with most of our hairdryers coming in under 90 db. While I normally love new tech integrated into devices, the digital temperature readout and "smart" buttons are superfluous and unnecessarily adding additional steps. I kind of like the simplicity of just 3-4 preset settings instead of the customization that you have to do with the + and- buttons. It's too much power and too much manipulation for my wife's preference - so, it may not be the ideal dryer for everyone.

title: Good to have on hand in case of pink eye and for my puffy eyes at allergy season
text: This product is good to have in case I have any pink eye issues, puffy eyes at allergy season, dry eyes or to try for dark circles under eyes. At first I was skeptical of ordering this type of device because I don't suffer from blephritis, but I do tend to have dry eyes. I will update my review after I have tried it out and have noticeable results after its use. It is a good value for all its benefits listed based on the seller's description, conditions it helps with, rechargeability, cordless and price.

title: A good way to stretch the back of my neck
text: This device is simple and easy to use. It helps to stretch my neck after so many hours in front of the computer. It is a good value for the functionality, ease of use and price.

title: It works really well
text: This Shaver is being used in lieu if a Brazilian wax. It works pretty good for that reason. I have used it as a trimmer then with the 7 head attachment to create a baby bald feel...it removed the hair with no issues at all. I like that it has multiple attachments as well as facial cleanser attachments. It is ergonomically comfortable to hold and use. I love that it is compact, rechargeable and easy to attach and detach the heads. This set is a great value for the size, portability, ease of use, comfort on skin/ease of hair removal and price.

title: Comfy, provides wide coverage, thick, easy to breathe in and washable!
text: Fits well and comfy. They are easy to breath in and wash well. They are a good quality, have a few layers of material and thickness. These masks are not thin. They provide wide coverage.

title: Works well on my face!
text: These facial sponges feel good when I use them on my face. They are easy to use. They are a good value for the amount and quality received. I recommend these facial sponges.

title: Works fine but the scent is so overwhelming
text: We have a fur baby and she sheds like crazy. Even with regular brushing and maintenance. So with that being said, her fur leaves odor and dander all over our rugs. It’s not an awful smell but I prefer not have an as strong dog smell in our home. This carpet powder works okay. The scent isn’t my favorite and a little too strong although will dissipate throughout the day. It’s obviously easy to use and clean up. But the scent is just so fake and perfume like to me and not one I care for so I wouldn’t purchase this a second time.

title: Noticing a difference but does leave my teeth temporarily sensitive
text: I started using these teeth whitening strips with the LED light about a week ago. I’ve already noticed a difference in color - they are starting to look whiter. However, my teeth feel sensitive afterwards. It doesn’t last but still, they’re sensitive for a little bit. This may be due to me already having pretty sensitive teeth so I suppose this will vary from person to person. But it does produce results and does what it claimed to.

title: Works fine but temporary pain relief
text: I am 25 yet I feel like I’m 60+ with my chronic back pain. It’s so frustrating. I can’t even stand up straight for long periods without my back spawning or bend over without it getting “stuck”. Pain killers don’t touch it and I’m not comfortable seeing a chiropractor due to some horror stories I’ve read online. So, I figured I’d try a tens unit. This is my first time using and trying one. I was honestly a little worried as I wasn’t sure how this was going to work. The instructions are a bit difficult to understand if you’re a first time user. But my fiancé helped me out and I was able to get it figured out. I used this on the lower part of my back towards where my spine meets my tailbone. I tried it on a low setting and gradually worked my way up. It alleviated some of my back pain but only temporarily which is disappointing but this isn’t a cure so I wasn’t surprised. Just expected the relief to last a little longer.

title: Barely Fizz
text: These bath bombs smell nice but they barely fizz which is disappointing. I've used a few and each time, they barely fizz. Their scent reminds me of essential oils. There's a few in here that I don't like how they smell but for the most of them, they smell really fragrant. The packaging is okay. Not the cutest. They break down in the tub and didn't notice any residue or of the such. Overall, they're okay but not my favorite and I wouldn't purchase again.

title: Mediocre Straightener - Keep Looking
text: [[VIDEOID:5b0de882eb9f712e866b5cc8745251a5]] I’ve had the same straightener for years, so it was time to replace it. I came packaged neatly. At first, I thought mine was broken because it wouldn’t come on, but you have to hold the power button down for a little longer than you expect. It has adjustable temperature but none of which really worked on my hair. It did heat up really fast and I thought it was fun to watch the temperature climb (refer to my video). But unfortunately, this straightener is mediocre. I have medium thick hair that’s not dyed and it’s wavy so it’s not really a chore to get straight. However, this straightener didn’t work well in straightening it. I did attempt to do the curls with the straightener and it semi-worked. They were more of waves than curls but again, my hair is naturally wavy, so I’d prefer that it curled it. I guess this would be better for thinner hair. I am a little bummed that this wasn’t better. I’ve used cheaper straighteners before that worked better than this. I’d say keep looking, unfortunately.

title: This Stuff Works!!
text:
So I totally did feel a difference after taking this. The Niacin was very Strong and definitely NOT anti-flush.. so be ready for that or start with a lower does. Be sure to check the ingredients since some are extremely high in content, which kind of confused me.. if it’s already stronger than pills due to better absorbency, why add such high amounts of certain vitamins?!
But nevertheless, it did make me feel better.
The taste was Okay.. honestly not that great, but do-able...on the citrusy side of things with a thick consistency and a little chalky. I would recommend orange juice as a chaser. I also do want to stress that one should definitely eat a meal before taking this product to avoid a very upset stomach.

title: Great Addition in the Morning!
text:
I REALLY Enjoyed this Creamer with my coffee and Espresso every morning.
The slim tub made it great for storing right next to my coffee machine and allowed it to be used without much effort. (I am not a morning person).
It mixed really well, gave it a soft and a creamy consistency, added some good fats needed for Keto, was low carb and took the bitterness away from the coffee itself.
My only complaint was that the tub could have either been shorter, or filled more.
Lots of empty space, which could have been utilized better. Other than that, I loved it!!

title: Worth a shot!
text: I honestly haven’t noticed anything while using this product. It was very mild and I would mix it into my smoothies or shakes and you could never detect a taste. I heard it was good for increasing milk supply in nursing mothers but I also did not notice anything with that either. It is definitely worth a try, I didn’t experience anything negative with it.

title: Works Great!!
text: The smell is awful on this Irish Moss Powder, which left me very hesitant to use it in my recipes, but I had to try it out. To my surprise it worked extremely well in thickening pasta sauces and natural gravies and didn’t add any “fishy” taste to it whatsoever. No one knew it was in them and everyone enjoyed the tastes. I loved being able to add better nutrients to my foods without compromising on taste. I would definitely recommend it!! For the many benefits of this, the price is well worth it, and keep in mind you only need one scoop so it will last a long time.

title: Large size, heats quickly
text:
This is a big heating pad that is especially nice for back aches. It covers my whole back, so I don't have to move it around. I'm not sure if the jade stones are a new age healing thing, but they do hold the heat very well and feel good. I like the auto turn off safety feature because I don't have to worry about it being on if I fall asleep.
It is easy to use and feels great. The stones add a different radiant heat.

title: Convenient form of light therapy
text:
This device is a very convenient way to experience red light therapy at home. It works basically like a flashlight, just turn it on and aim it at the source of pain. It is a mild heat that is supposed to penetrate deep into the muscles to sooth and help heal tightness or injury.
It also is supposed to help build collagen, thus fighting wrinkles.
All this takes time , so all I can really say at this time is that the heat feels good and the device is easy to use.

title: Works
text: It took about ten days for me to notice improvement in my digestion. It has given me more energy and I sleep better. The rumbling in my gut has stopped.

title: Painless
text: This is a very effective grooming tool. Can easily reach small areas where it is difficult to reach with scissors. Provides for a smooth painless cut.

title: All-purpose cleaning cloths
text: These cloths are nice for dirty jobs.  More durable than paper towels, but still disposable, I think they are good for grimy jobs because they stand up to hard work.  I keep one roll in the car, one in the garage and one in the house for deep cleaning.  I have found that they work well as a cleaning cloth on my floor mop, too.

title: So Much Fun!
text: I like to keep bath bombs on hand for my step son and nephew. These bath bombs were so much fun too! Each are shaped like a dino egg and then there are a few that are actual toys. The boys loved playing with these in the bath and unfolding the toy eggs to see what dinos they got to play with in and out of the bath. I had a difficult time with a few of the toys, getting them to unfold but once I re-read the directions, I was able to assemble them much easier... so definitely read the direction carefully. We didn't use all of the bath bombs in one setting, so that was nice because we could use them a few more bath times later!

title: Relief
text: This relieve essential oil blend roll on is a great topical aromatherapy relief! I can breathe so much smoother and with ease short after application. The blend is just absolutely amazing. My son and hubby like to use this too! Super impressed with the quality of oil as well.

title: Soothing & Calming
text: This sleepy essential oil blend really helps me to relax and calm down before meditation or bed time. The scent is so soothing and calming. I am super impressed with the quality of this oil as well. My whole family loves to use this, not just me!

title: Kind of works...
text: I have fairly long lashes and thought that this nifty little tool would help with my sometimes crazy lashes. This tool was easy to get set up to get started. It seemed to heat up quickly as well. I followed the directions as well as some videos I found online but this did't really seem to make that big of a difference. I think get better results with an eyelash curler to be honest. I'm not sure if my lashes are just too thick or what, but I had this on the highest heat setting. Great idea in theory but might work better for those with thinner lashes.

title: inShield Wiper
text: I got this inShield Wiper to keep in my car as the windows sometimes fog up from the inside. Makes for easy cleaning and my windows look streak free after using this over a disposable paper towel. That being said, I like that this is reusable! Less waste and it really helps keep things clean!

title: Gel Polish Set
text: This gel polish set is AWESOME! I love all the colors that came in this set so much! The gel applied like a dream and set beautifully. No chips so far and that is big on my terms as a successful gel polish. Overall, a really great set of gel polishes!

title: Everything You Need Glasses Repair Kit
text: I have had my favorite pair of name brand glasses in their case for months, completely unfixable as I could NOT find a screw that would stay in where the original fell out. This kit came with everything I needed to fix my sunglasses and MORE! I was able to fix my sunglasses quickly and still have so much left over to fix them again if need be, my regular glasses and any future glasses issues. This kit literally came with so much, yet is so compact. Almost everything that came with the kit fits in the plastic organizer it came in. I kept the original box to store the case and the few other items that didn't fit in the storage case. If you have a pair of glasses or sunglasses that needs fixing, this is THE ultimate kit!

title: Cloth Pads
text: I really like these cloth pads as an alternative to wearing pads or liners. I wear these when I wear a cup or when my flow is light after removing the cup. I also wear one of these when I know it's ALMOST that time of month for a little extra added confidence that I won't be caught off guard. I think these would would for a full flow as well, but I don't like wearing JUST a pad, but that is just my preference. I love all the cute designs too, although no one will see them. These are so much more comfortable than your average pad and don't have that awful, scratchy, sticky uncomfortable feel. These stay in place for me with a bikini cut or larger cut undergarment versus the smaller ones, but who wants to wear those smaller, cute undergarments that time of the month anyway? These wash up really nicely. I recommend using a gentle stain remover of your choice that doesn't have any scent to protect your skin and body. Overall, a really awesome set of cloth pads!

title: Comfortable Gel Inserts
text: I got these to wear with a few pairs of my heels to help them be a little more comfortable to wear. These are so soft and squishy. They make my heels so much more bearable to wear over a longer period of time. I like that these are transparent too as a sort of "no show" feature. I need these for every pair of shoe I own!

title: Great Toner
text: These toner pads are great. I use them as part of a multi step skin care regime. My skin feels smooth and clear after use. Highly Recommend.

title: No aftertaste!
text: Work as expected, no aftertaste! Would repurchase.

title: Comfortable
text: These ear plugs are comfortable to wear. The small carrying case that comes in the box fits a pair of ear plugs, the rest come in a clear plastic bag. I have no complaints.

title: Awesome!
text: My son's birthday is Halloween so I plan on setting this up for him as a special treat. Seems like good quality decor. I recommend it.

title: I like it!
text: Makes the bath nice and bubbly! Smells good. I don't really notice my skin being any softer but it's great for a good bath bubble bath.

title: Lots of easy to swallow tablets.
text:
Finally, some vitamin C tablets that aren't the size of horse pills. These are easy to swallow.
Standard ascorbic acid, 500mg, nothing fancy, and it has rose hips for their extra health benefits.
This is a large bottle that contains 300 tablets, so it'll last a long time.
Just what I was looking for.

title: Not worth the price.
text:
I often wear ear protection at work. The corded plugs we use there are very high quality, and cost about a buck apiece. My only complaint with them is that they have a plastic cord that likes to stay coiled up. I saw these string corded plugs and thought they might be better.
The flexible cord is indeed nice. No issues with it coiling itself. Doesn't make noise when you are out in the wind, either. It's just barely long enough to tie to a button hole on your shirt to keep it handy.
Unfortunately, the plugs themselves are made from a very soft grade of rubber. So soft they can be very difficult to insert in your ears properly.
They also don't have near the noise reducing properties of the plugs I'm used to. They work, just not as well.
These plugs also cost a buck apiece, but they are roughly the same as the 25 cent plugs. That's about what they're worth, too.
Guess we'll stick with what we have.

title: A good choice for D3 supplements
text: Small, easy to swallow softgels.  They are 5000IU (the same as 125mcg), which is a pretty standard dose these days.  The full dose is in one softgel, so the bottle is good for 60 days.  I like that they are made with coconut oil rather than soy oil.  It gives them an unusual milky color instead of the clear amber soy imparts.

title: Way too soft.  Doesn't do much of anything.
text: When I first ordered this Kerkoor Silicone Back Scrubber I was wondering if it would pull the hair on my furry back.  I've been using it for a few days now, and it turns out the worry was unfounded, it does not pull at all.  Problem is, it doesn't do much of anything at all.  There are thicker fingers on one side, and thinner ones on the other, but my back couldn't feel the difference.  The silicone fingers are so soft they just mush around rather than scrub.  It's also about 6 inches too short for my average build and arm length.  This back scrubber is an interesting idea, but for me, it's a total fail.

title: Easy to use! Great for Travel!
text:
HATTEKER MENS ELECTRIC SHAVER- This small round electric shaver is really nice!
It's lightweight, easy to use, and completely portable! It's the perfect shaver for travel!
It's IPX7 waterproof and takes 90 minutes for a full charge. The runtime on this is around 60 minutes.
My husband loves this little shaver! He calls it his "grab and go." On days when he is in a hurry and doesn't have time to properly shave or is just too tired, he will take this in his truck and shave on the way.
This is a great gift idea for any man!
Great value!

title: Great Nose Hair Trimmer!
text:
SUPHOMING NOSE HAIR TRIMMER- This nose hair trimmer is really nice! It's waterproof and comes with a eyebrow trimmer, and shaver.
It's easy to use and to change the heads out. The trimmers work great! Very convenient!
Great value!

title: Good lightweight shaver!
text: KEENHOT TRAVEL SHAVER- This shaver is great for travel! It's small, lightweight, easy to operate. The charging time is 1 hour for full battery and the run time is 1 hour. It has a travel pouch that comes with it for easy carrying. Decent little shaver at a good value.

title: Great hair dryer! Powerful! Lightweight!
text:
This blow dryer is really nice! I've never operated a hair dryer like this before. You can actually adjust the wind speed anywhere from 50 to 99% and same goes for the temperature. In increments of 1.
The LCD display is really awesome!
The dryer is powerful, gets plenty hot, and is lightweight and so easy to operate. It dries my hair super fast!
The dryer came with 2 concentrator nozzles, diffuser and a round brush.
It really feels like a quality product!
I absolutely love this dryer!

title: Beautiful dryer! Quality!
text:
Wow! This Silmic Lava Ceramic hair dryer is nothing like anything I've ever used before!
First off, the packaging this dryer came in was really top quality. It felt amazing opening the box to find this beautiful blow dryer gleaming back at me. The dryer feels amazing in my hand. It's light weight but feels like it's a quality product. Even down to the cord. The cord feels soft and it's extra long.
As for the dryer, it has 3 speeds and 3 heat settings and a cool shot. It comes with a diffuser, nozzle, & wind comb. The nozzle is magnetic and clicks tightly and so easily to the dryer. The dryer is so quiet! I love that!
So I have above the shoulder length straight hair and it is pretty thick and it took about 3-5 minutes for me to blow dry my hair. That to me is incredible! I have to admit I wasn't so sure I was going to like this dryer right out of the box because it doesn't blow air as strong as my regular blow dryer does. I had to at least give it a chance because it is supposed to be different and thank goodness I did!
I don't need all that air blowing my hair everywhere. This dryer gets hot and I can focus the heat with the nozzle and my hair dried faster than I thought it was going to. Not only that, it was shinier and less tangled when I was done drying it.
I absolutely love this dryer! For the quality and technology I think it's a great value!

title: Great Tens unit!
text:
This Tens unit is really great! What is especially nice about it is how small it is. I used to have one that was big and bulky and heavy. It made using impossible unless you were just sitting in a chair. This unit is so small and lightweight I can clip it onto my belt and not even know it's there!
It comes in a very nice carrying case as well.
This unit has small and large pads included. It has 25 levels of adjustable intensity, easy to use pre-set modes, 60 minutes adjustable therapy timer. I'm loving this little Tens unit!

title: Amazing Red light therapy!
text:
This USUIE red light therapy kit comes with 3 velcro straps to attach the red light pad to various areas of your body. It comes with 2 meters of USB charging cables.
A 20 minute session is when the red light therapy will automatically shut off. It's recommended to do one in the morning and one at night.
Red light therapy improves skin problems and helps with injuries, arthritis, joint stiffness and pain. I'm using this red light therapy for arthritis in my back and after one session my back felt more relaxed. This is a great kit and I plan on getting a lot of use out of it!
Easy to use, instructions are included and easy to follow. Great product!

title: Great headache relief!
text: This is amazing relief for a headache or sinus pressure. It hugs your face and head and feels like a cool gel pack  surrounding your eyes, nose,  and head. I was surprised how cooling it felt without even putting it in the freezer or anything. It is so soft, you can fall asleep with this on. This is an amazing product! If you suffer from frequent headaches or migraines, I would definitely recommend giving this a shot. I haven't had a severe headache yet to test this out on yet, but I did use it and immediately I felt my sinus pressure and tension in my face being relieved. I actually fell asleep for a short nap and woke up feeling pretty refreshed and no more sinus pressure. Good product!

title: Tastey
text: Good protein and taste is very good .

title: Yummy
text: Love hulk juice aka sour gummy bear. Very good pump and good energy . It's only 15 serving size so be aware but good product

title: Just electrolytes
text: Your everyday electrolytes nothing special taste was good . Got them for my survival bag

title: Good ingredients
text: Stim free so its hard to review but my workouts where good. Good pump and have good ingredients

title: Taste is okay
text: Might be the plant based but I didn't like the taste . Doable but not the best

title: Good taste
text: Very good taste and very good pump

title: Mixes very well
text: Flavor was awesome mixed very well its creatine so alittle water retention is expected but honestly didn't see any

title: Taste is good
text: Tasted good decent pump have had better and definitely had worse.  Good floor beginners

title: fell apart quickly
text:
These are poor quality and poor construction. We have tried 2 of these and both fell apart very early with normal usage. what ended up happening was that ends of the tulle came loose then more unfurled as the item was used.
I would not recommend this item or order it again.

title: Best Grapefruit Scent!
text:
I am in love with the scent of this essential oil. It smells like a freshly peeled white grapefruit and it seems to be pure therapeutic grade with nothing added.
I am diffusing it in a waterless diffuser and my main floor living space smells wonderfully.
This would be perfect for home making cleaning products as the scent is so fresh and clean.

title: Silky and long lasting
text:
This personal lubricant has a silky feel. We like the convenient smaller size bottles for portability. We also like that this features a pump that’s easy to dispense the product.
We found this to be long lasting and it did not dry in a way that was sticky.
We enjoyed testing this product.

title: An upgrade
text:
This blow dryer is a major upgrade for me. This blow dryer is smaller and more lightweight than any previous model I’ve used. It has the ability to set the temperature to a specific number of degrees to suit your hair type. This works somewhat faster than my previous blow dryer although I’m not “blown away”.
The issue I’ve had with this blow dryer is that I keep accidentally changing the settings or turning it off. This is due to the buttons being easily depressed and being on the handle where you hold the device. That’s kind of annoying but I can deal with it.
It comes with several attachments-a diffuser and a thin attachment. It also comes with a carrying bag for the dryer and the pieces.

title: Deep scent of Lavender
text:
This essential oil is very heavily scented. I’ve been diffusing it in a small diffuser and enjoying the relaxing scent. This is a very good quantity of therapeutic grade oil that is not mixed with anything like carrier oils.
The packaging of this is very attractive and suitable for presentation as a gift. The box is really pretty and the product is safely situated in a foam surround within the box. It comes with a regular lid and a separate glass eye dropper to dispense the oil.
This might be the first time I’ve received essential oil in the mail without it leeching out.

title: awesomme
text: works well for pre workout and intra workout hydration and energy. id recommend it!

title: great post
text: great post workout drink. doesnt taste that great but chilled its good!

title: Pump city
text: Major pumps and foucs with this product I'd recommend it. Especially if you don't like uppers.

title: Great to put in my water when I workout
text: Love these drops to put in my water when I workout.  You do not have to be Keto to be efficient in electrolytes. I think it is always a good idea to supplement.  The flavor was very mild.

title: Great for cleaning
text: These gloves are thick and have a soft cloth interior.  They are water proof and perfect for use when washing dishes or cleaning.

title: Works Well with Omega-3 for My Knee Joint Pain
text: I am 54 years old and I have minor chronic knee pain (due to partial MCL tear in my left knee when I was in the 20s, and just playing a lot of sports). Doctors suggested that I should take Omega-3 and Tumeric to reduce the inflammation and pain. I tried Omega-3 and it did help a lot, but with combination of this brand of Tumeric, I am pain free. I am able to work out 6 days a week without any knee pain. I am pleasantly surprised. This is an excellent Tumeric (made in USA, organic Tumeric & organic Ginger). If you have any joint pain, try this Tumeric with Omega-3. Recommended!

title: For the Price, This Is Good Enough for Some
text:
I must mention the price first. It is currently priced at $15.85 (Amazon), and you get 120 capsules (60 day serving) of Red Ginseng. This is a great value for your money! However, this is a Ginseng extract and not a root powder. This is why it is cheaper than other Red Ginseng products. It is believed that root powder is better than the extract. As for this particular Red Ginseng, please note:
1. Although it is called, "Korean Panax Ginseng" the bottle shows that "Made In China" so I am not sure about the quality. I had another Korean Red Ginseng, made from Korea (and it is root powder), and it was about $39.00 for 30 day serving. So there is a difference.
2. If you do not see any tangible difference, try "Korean Black Ginseng" (that is made from Korea). Black Ginseng is much much better than Red Ginseng. This is what I use every day. And I KNOW it makes a difference in my overall well-being.
3. Like any other Ginseng, you must wait about 2 weeks or so to see any benefit. Especially if you are over 50 years old, a good Ginseng supplement will help your overall well-being.

title: This Is B-12 Vitamin to Help Your Overall Health Not Just Energy
text: B-12 is beneficial for many things in the body not just boosting energy level. B-12 is good for: brain, eye disease, canker sores, and nerve pain caused by shingles, etc. Especially when we get older this supplement might be needed for those who feel weak and lethargic. This product is easy to chew and tasty. And if you are overall healthy then you might not see any tangible difference by using it, although it is helping. It is always better to talk with your doctor before taking any supplement.

title: Warped Bucket, Can't Put the Top On It
text: I like Microfiber Floor Mop system better than traditional mop and bucket. It simply cleans better. However, this particular system lacks quality. The mop handle and the mop head are decent quality but the bucket came warped and therefore I cannot place the top on it to use it as designed (see the picture). Perhaps mine is just an exception. But be warned.

title: All over shaving made easy!
text: A great shaver that gives excellent results. It's design and shape has made it so much easier to get an even all over headshave. It's simple to operate and comfortable to hold and use. The blades cuts cleanly and there's no tugging, pulling or cuts. It has a great battery life and is rechargeable. The recharge time is quick and USB charging cable is included. The shaver also has a LED indicator to show battery life and usage time. The shaver is easy to clean. It comes with a cleaning brush as well as other attachment heads for longer hair, nose, and etc. It's a great all-in-one device!

title: Outstanding trim and strong suction!
text: This electric trimmer comes with everything that's needed. There are attachment clips for different lengths cutting. A brush, sponge for cleaning the razor each time, a power cord, and a cape to keep hair clipping off the shoulders. The absolute best features is the vaccum that sucks all of the clippings into the storage tank. After a full shave, there are no clippings on the counter that need to be cleaned up! The brush is used to easily dump all of the clippings directly into the trash can and store everything back in the original box. Overall, it's a great electric razor/trimmer with a vacuum.

title: Better circulation!
text: This roller is amazing for my forearms. It fits my forearms well. Very easy to use. Just place on your leg, or put arm between the rollers and pressed down. I wanted a deeper massage on my arm so I just push it against a couch moving it up and down, and that did the trick. No need to have someone else press down for me. I have only used it for a few days and already feel relief.

title: Perfect for shaving delicate areas!
text: This has got to be the best electric shaver I've ever ordered. I have tried lots of them. It has a sturdy handle making gripping nice and easy especially as it's a wet and dry shaver giving you a firm hold even when it's wet. It gives a lovely close shave and it's great for using on all different parts of my body. Great razor I'd definitely recommend it!

title: Worth the try!
text: The powdered mixes easily and doesn't have a gritty mouthfeel. The Taste is amazingly good. Tastes exactly like the flavor suggest and it is really refreshing. I have been sipping this during my treadmill workouts. It seems to help with the energy to keep me going and finish. As far as the other claims go about Muscle Recovery. I cannot mention as I am really not into weights and lifting. For what I do it is definitely helping.

title: Creative Inventions
text: I've always wanted to test out the electric eyelash curler. It actually worked for curling my eyelashes. It heats up well without harming my eyelashes or eyelids. The eyelashes keep its structure for a long period of time. It is safe to use with mascara on before you hate your eyelashes. Always make sure your mascara is dried before you curl those lashes. It is so convenient that I can take it everywhere with me. It is simple and easy to use when you get the hang of it. I highly recommend.

title: Nutritional Benefits
text: I really enjoyed making the wheatgrass juice powder drink. The powder taste bitter if you put too much but it smells sweet. The powder has many benefits giving you more energy. Especially when you do not like eating your greens. This wheatgrass juice powder will give you all your vitamins and minerals in one glass.

title: So comforting!!
text:
This pillow is so comforting!! I have a lot of anxiety and hugging this pillow makes me feel so relaxed. It's so soft and cozy and the vibration feels so nice. It's perfect for children or adults as a stim toy or just a source of stress relief. I also really like how the bumpy texture feels.
I do have one complaint: you have to be actively pressing the part that vibrates for it to work, so it's a bit annoying that it shuts off unless you're constantly hugging it tightly. It isn't a big problem, but it would be nicer if you could set it to stay on.

title: Great and super gift-able!!
text: These shower steamers would make an amazing gift. The packaging is really nice and you can smell them before even opening it. They dissolve easily in the shower and make the whole bathroom smell amazing. I would definitely recommend this product for a relaxing shower!!

title: Nasty Fish Burps 🐟
text: I tried, honestly I really tried but the capsules are so big they are very hard to swallow. Then once you get the  capsules down you are constantly and I mean constantly burping fish burps, gross! you have to take 3 of these capsules a day and with this only being a 60 capsule bottle this bottle won't even last you a month, it may be ok but I wouldn't want to be constantly purchasing this especially at $9.82 a bottle.  Lets also talk about them saying that this has a subtle lemon taste, no, there is no subtle lemon taste there is no lemon taste at all, not that I could tell.  Cannot recommend

title: Meek and Mild
text: Not sure that these are the right thing for cleaning the floor.  They don't seem to have enough power or enough smell.  I know for a fact that I would not buy them again because I had to empty the bucket I was using and refill it and use my normal cleaner and go back over my floors to get them clean.  There might be 60 sheets in the box but when you put 3 sheets in the bucket and it still doesn't work then that makes them not worth the money.

title: 💜 Love the Lavender 💜
text: So I got this one to try because I had the peppermint, Citrus and Lemongrass and loved them all and wanted to try others.  This Lavender scent is very nice and smells like you are standing in a huge field of lavender.  The pump action on these bottles is very smooth and the way you are able to lock the bottle neck is genius.  You get an 8 ounce bottle for a low $6.99 and the scent lasts a long time.  I love these and with continue to purchase this line in the future.

title: Inexpensive device
text: I can't comment on the price of this unit because its currently not available but I can comment on the reliability of the numbers it put up.  The numbers are big and this unit has a back light on the display that allows you to see it well.  I find it to be reliable for reading my blood pressure correctly, it may be off by a couple of points but not enough to make a significant difference.  It comes with a USB-C cord, a battery and a carrying case, the case is great if you decide to travel with it.  The cuff on this unit says it will fit just about anyone, nope I have a very big arm and it barely fit me.  My suggestion would be to measure your arm prior to purchasing a blood pressure cuff.

title: Quality Device
text: When I first started monitoring my blood pressure the machines were so expensive but now they are very affordable.  I can't comment on the price of this unit because its currently not available but I can comment on the reliability of the numbers it put up.  The numbers are big and this unit has a back light on the display that allows you to see it well.  It comes with a USB-C cord, a battery and a carrying case, the case is great if you decide to travel with it.  The cuff on this unit says it will fit just about anyone it says it fit from 10cm to 50cm, nope I have a very big arm and it barely fit me.  My suggestion would be to measure your arm prior to purchasing a blood pressure cuff.

title: Good quality, not too bitter
text: This is a great supplement for lowering blood sugar and aiding digestion. You don't need to go to strange lengths to take it, it's not meant to taste like fruit. You don't need to hide it in smoothies or soup. Just add 1/4 tsp of this into a small cup of warm water 2 times a day and drink. It's not going to taste delicious, but it's really just like a slightly bitter tea. If you're used to herbal remedies, you won't be phased by this. If you're used to gummy vitamins, you probably won't like it.

title: Great all over the house
text: These are used all over hour house. From kitchen to the craft room, and many places in between. My husband even uses them for stuff in the garage and his electronics. They're sturdy and hold a lot. I also love that you can see through them easily.

title: Good dish gloves
text: These are good dish gloves! These aren't lined like my other pair. I like that when the water is really hot I don't really feel it through the gloves. The package has a few ideas on other ways to use these and I used a sharpie to write what I use for what so I don't confuse them. The large is a little too baggy for me so I would have gone for a medium. These are great gloves, I recommend them.

title: Great liver support
text: This is a great whole food source to help support both liver function and helps with insulin resistance. It's well-sourced and good quality, ready to use with foods in smoothies, soups, etc. I'm really happy with the quality and ease of use!

title: Great Antioxidant food
text: This is a great way to add antioxidants to your food! I prefer fresh, but it's not like I can find Acai berries at my local grocers! SO this is the next best way to include them into your foods. Easy to use, versatile - add to yogurt, smoothies, etc.

title: Great for immunity boosting
text: This is a great way to boost your immunity -add a little into your foods for both health benefits and flavor! I love the convenience. I usually prefer using fresh foods, but when something like red reishi mushrooms are hard to find in my area, this is the second-best way to go!

title: Worked until it didn't
text: This head shaver was good while it lasted. Unfortunately, it didn't last very long, and broke after about a month of use. Some of the attachments were no good from the get-go, and were dull right out of the box. The head shaver itself wasn't dull, but again, sadly it fell apart pretty quickly.

title: Eased my plantar fasciitis
text: I thought the added ginger might just be a gimmick, but no. I have used turmeric daily for a couple of years now, and I definitely noticed the added benefit of the ginger. I was sad when these ran out. But the price is really good for what you're getting! I definitely recommend them.

title: Can work if you do, too
text: Like many weight loss products, the effectiveness heavily depends on how much effort you are putting into it. This will mildly to moderately curb your appetite, more so if you aren't consuming a lot of foods that give you cravings for more, like sugar, refined carbs, high sodium or processed foods, etc. Food like that makes you lose touch with your body's natural signals, and it would take a pretty powerful (potentially dangerous) weight loss product to cut through that and still kill your appetite.

title: Somehow both intense and ineffective
text: I gave this toothbrush a number of tries before deciding I just don't like it. The vibrations feel intense, so much that they tickle my sensitive mouth and I have to keep my tongue out of the way. But then when I'm done, it doesn't feel like it cleaned all that well, which is confusing. I get a deeper clean just using my manual toothbrush. Also, the brush part is annoyingly small. It looks and feels sleek, and I like the wall mount it comes with, but it's just not for me.

title: Beneficial but gross
text: It's very well packaged and has great eye appeal.  I love that they are a 100% plastic-free company! There is no added sugar (which is a huge plus). This is a very feel-good & good for you product.  The downside: it does not taste good at all! Be sure to add this to a smoothie or stronger drink. But it's so healthy that it wouldn't throw me off except that the package says “Delicious” & “chocolate fudge.”

title: Serious Caffeine
text: It's just too much caffeine for me, which is not fault of the product. The ingredients are clearly listed on the container. The flavor is pretty good, and it does help to shake it up first to mix it up and break up any clumps that may have formed. The product is fine, just a bit too intense for me.

title: Crazy soft
text:
These are so soft I could cry! They feel absolutely amazing on the skin, and though it seems counterintuitive, they actually clean really well.
I definitely don't recommend using the water-only method for removing makeup. No matter what you are cleaning it with, your skin needs more than just water to really break the products down and cleanse the pores. I use these with the Ordinary's squalane oil cleanser, and they are the perfect pair. They leave my skin fresh, glowing, squeaky clean, and soothed by the soft fabric.

title: It Actually Works
text:
I have invested a lot of money into a lot of disappointing weight loss products, so I expected no different from this one. I was surprised to be wrong!

It really does help with energy and appetite suppression. While taking it, it is a lot easier for me to avoid snacking, and it helps me eat less at meals. It makes me feel more full, I guess? And the cravings are less.

It is kind of strong, though. I made the mistake of taking two the first time I tried it, and it gave me dizziness, a headache, and some nausea. If you are well adjusted to stimulants like caffeine, you might not have the same problem. But I suggest starting out with just one to see how you react.

I will also warn you, these give me really gross burps. And they keep coming all day. It's not that pleasant, but it's also not unique to this diet pill, and honestly it's worth it. For feeling more energized and less hungry, I feel like it's a fair trade off.

title: HORRIBLE Product, Even WORSE Customer Service!!! Do yourself a favor and either buy dailies or use Oxysept!!
text:
For those not interested in my story, please scroll down and just read the 'solution' part.

MY STORY & THOUGHTS ON CLEAR CARE:
Before I started using Clear Care, I was using Alcon's Opti-Free Replenish. I was one of those people who wanted to take the minimum amount of steps/time to clean my contacts (aka laziness). So naturally, when I first bought and used this product, I thought I was taking a big step in taking better care of my eyes. Watching the hydrogen peroxide bubble from the neutralizing disc made me think "ooh yeah!! Now I get to experience CLEAN contacts that won't irritate my eyes after only a few hours of use!" However, in reality, I still had to remove my contacts after 4-5 hours or have people think I smoke a lot of cannabis. Eventually, this made me think that perhaps I just have ultra sensitive eyes. After several visits to my optometrist, I've switched from monthlies to biweeklies to weekly contacts. However, still, same results with Clear Care. I thought oh well, I guess I'll just have to wear my glasses more often.

About a month and a half ago, I ran out of Clear Care. No worries... just buy a new bottle right? Well, this time my experience was much different. I used the new bottle & case EXACTLY TWICE before I threw it in the trash. Those two times, the hydrogen peroxide did not fully neutralize and burned my right eye both times (of course I did not even attempt to put on my left contact after burning my right). Both times, I let the disc neutralize for at least 12.5 hours (to be exact, 12.5 hours the first time, and 28 hours the second).... well above the recommended 6 hours. I flushed my right eye for at least 20 minutes but I still felt the burn for hours.

I immediately tried to contact Alcon to try to get a replacement neutralizing case/disc. I called them three times just to get put on hold for 30-40 minutes each time before I hung up. Then I contacted them through their website by filling out their complaint form, explaining everything that had happened. To be honest, I didn't expect an immediate response... I thought maybe a week later to respond was reasonable.... two weeks would be borderline acceptable. After the second week passed, I threw out the almost full bottle of Clear Care and new case/disc.

Two days ago (which would be over a month and a half after I filed a complaint), I received an email from Alcon saying that they received my complaint and that I should not hesitate to contact them by phone/email with my concerns. LOL wow that's hilarious!!! I replied that the very least they should have done is send me a new neutralizing disc and that they need to check their quality control with their products. Yesterday I received their reply explaining different factors that would prohibit the hydrogen peroxide from neutralizing properly along with ~20 questions about my past incident (which were pretty much answered when I filled out the complaint form on their site... all they had to do was read). On top of that, they "may request return of the solution with the cup & disc for evaluation." Again, this is over a month and a half after I filed a complaint and they have the nerve to assume that I would keep their POS product. Naturally, I politely told them to piss off. Ironically, it is because of their idiotic emails that encouraged me to write this review.

SOLUTION:
During this whole ordeal, I put in a lot of research on cleaning contacts and eye care. The best solution obviously is to just get daily lenses, but that is a very expensive way to go.... especially if you wear your contacts every day. I know some people who wear their glasses most days and contacts only when they go out, so for them dailies are a viable option. For someone like me, who wears contacts at least 5 out of 7 days of the week, I highly recommend Oxysept. This is a product similar to Clear Care in that it uses a neutralizing hydrogen peroxide system to clean your contacts. The difference is the speed of neutralization. Clear Care neutralizes most of the peroxide in about 20 minutes. In other words, the peroxide will only effectively clean your contacts for about 20 minutes. You can witness this for yourself by seeing how it bubbles intensely right away and after 20 minutes the bubbles subsides. With Oxysept, peroxide neutralization is a much slower process, thus making it more efficient at disinfecting your lenses. However, there are a few things to keep in mind. Oxysept is not a one step process. You need to clean your contacts with a daily cleaner (Lobob SOF/PRO2 or Walgreens Extra Strength Daily Cleaner) and rinse with saline prior to disinfecting with Oxysept for at least 6 hours. And before your put on your contacts, you need to rinse them again with saline. Also, once a week you need to add a tablet of Ultrazyme to remove protein buildup from your lenses. This may sound like a lot of steps and a PITA (and it is at first), but trust me, it's VERY simple and the results are light years ahead of Clear Care.

Like I said before, I used to only be able to wear my contacts for about 4-5 hours before my eyes become dry, irritated and red. Now after switching to Oxysept, I am able to wear them all day and even through the night when needed and I can truly feel the difference in the health of my eyes. I have yet to experience any irritation and on top of that, I am also able to extend the life of my contacts (I've been using the same weekly lenses for about 4 weeks now and they STILL feel like new).

One more thing to keep in mind though... Because there are more products being used along with Oxysept (daily cleaner, saline and Ultrazyme), it is more expensive to use than Clear Care. However, because you only need 2 drops of daily cleaner per lens, and only use Ultrazyme once a week, they will last you for a long time.

Bottom line... If you care about your eyes, STAY AWAY FROM ALCON PRODUCTS
