title: Terrible taste
text: The taste stayed with me for hours.  I gave it away.  I’m sure the ing are fine, I just couldn’t deal with the taste.

title: Still slipping
text: Slipping was not helped, very disappointed

title: Great
text: I love having a fiber/probiotic in my routine.  These are easy to take and taste great.  They are a chewy and firmer gummy which is what I prefer.  I love that everyone in the house can take them as well to help with gut issues.

title: Flavors
text:
I actually was able to try several different flavors from this line. I liked some more than others, but all of them were not bad. I love how these are both for hydration and also have the added immunity benefits. I just mix with a bottle of water and I am good to go. The packets are convenient for easy use and for the on the go.
I like that these were not salty tasting compared to some electrolytes I have tried. I also like the price point as it is pretty decent for a 30 pack, especially compared to others I have tried.

title: Nice
text:
These wipes come pre-moistened but are very damp. I like that they have enough solution to clean, but not too much that I worried about using on my electronics. As most wipes, you are going to pull from the center and more than what you need will come out. I just push the unused wipes back into the container.

I have used these on my touch screen monitor and also my cell phone. I really like them. Both were left clean with no excess moisture.

title: 3.5 Stars
text: I am not normally a plant based protein fan, but these are pretty good.  I think it will also depend on your flavor preference.  I was able to try both the oatmeal cookie and the hazelnut.  I am a chocolate lover and was expecting to love the hazelnut.  However; I was not a fan of the flavoring on that one.  However; I really enjoyed the oatmeal cookie flavor.  You get both the oatmeal and the cinnamon and it was much better than I was expecting.  It did not have any horrible aftertaste either.  It has a very slight chalky taste, but it was very little.  I am impressed overall.  Still giving 4 stars to both as they both were better than expected even though the one was not my preference (but chalkiness, formula, and etc were still great).

title: Good
text: I am not normally a plant based protein fan, but these are pretty good.  I think it will also depend on your flavor preference.  I was able to try both the oatmeal cookie and the hazelnut.  I am a chocolate lover and was expecting to love the hazelnut.  However; I was not a fan of the flavoring on that one.  However; I really enjoyed the oatmeal cookie flavor.  You get both the oatmeal and the cinnamon and it was much better than I was expecting.  It did not have any horrible aftertaste either.  It has a very slight chalky taste, but it was very little.  I am impressed overall.  Still giving 4 stars to both as they both were better than expected even though the one was not my preference (but chalkiness, formula, and etc were still great).

title: Flavor
text: I use a pre almost every day when I work out.  I prefer to dry scoop but will use one pending how it tastes the best as well.  This one had a chemical aftertaste that was a little bitter.  I tried it both with water and dry scooped.  It is not a favorite for me.

title: Nope
text: I love adding some sort of immunity to my daily routine and was very excited for these.  Others talked about how good they tasted so I thought I would give them a try.  Sadly, these tasted horrible to everyone in our house.  We could not even take a full bite of the gel like substance before the taste would hit your tongue.  It was awful.  We all spit these out.  These are a no from us.

title: We Will See
text:
I have no clue if this will do anything around weight loss, but it has a pleasant taste and does seem to be helping with my night time bloating.
I have been adding this into my sparkling water. I have only added a few drops and have not tried it with just plain water.

title: Great
text: These do not have to be used to make wipes as they really are great for any paper towel needs.  We do not have a dispenser but still use them around the house.  We have one in the bathroom for wiping off hands and one in the kitchen for cleaning up messes.  We just pull from the middle and grab what we need.  They work great.

title: Decent
text: To be honest it has been a long time since we have actually used cling wrap.  We usually grab for foil as it is just easier to manage.  This is great though and really does cling.  It is still a pain to get it to come out of the roll though.

title: Great
text: I use my push mop daily and these are amazing.  They are larger to really get a nice area all at once.  They are soft and really pick up the dirt.  They fit both spray mops that we have that are different brands with no issues.  I love that I can wash them and use them over and over again but have extra for between washes as well.

title: Good
text:
I love having picks on me at all times. These are pretty good but I do wish they were a little thicker/solid. They still get the job done.

It is a great price for how many you are getting as well. They do come in a large travel case which I wish was a little thinner. It would work better for throwing in my purse but I can still make it work.

title: Light
text: I have used clothes like these before and these work pretty good.  As others mentioned, do you expect these to be full of moisture or overly wet.  They are just that.  Wet feeling.  They have a very slight wetness and more of a dry wetness if that makes sense.  I do find that I can use these to clean my glasses though.  I have also used some very similar to these so I was not expecting them to be any more saturated.

title: Lemon
text: I like taking a daily vitamin for my skin and nails.  This one is great and has a lemon taste.  They are easy to take in gummy form.  It is hard to know if they are working, but I do feel taking a Biotin daily has helped me over time.

title: Great
text: I have a Vitamin D deficiency and taking a daily vitamin D pill as really been helping.  I prefer taking a quick capsule and these are great.  They are a great price as well.  I take them daily and have not had any issues.

title: Room Spray
text: This is more of a room spray than a odor eliminator for me.  It smells really good and has a nice light scent.  It smells great but I am not sure about covering up smells.  It does make an amazing room spray though.  I can spray this and still smell it hours later.  I love it using it that way and will buy again for that reason.

title: Ok
text:
I use a BCAA or EAA everyday with my workouts and also my rest days. I love trying new to me brands and flavors. This one is ok. I tried both the strawberry lemonade and the blue raspberry. I did not get a very strong flavor from either. I enjoyed them mixed with another supplement I am using though.

The downfall for me is the expiration. Both say to use within 60 days after opening. I personally do not love using the same flavor everyday. I like the mix it up. I use a few different ones at a time. Unless you plan to only use this one and use it everyday, it will be expired before you finish it. Most of the ones I have use a two year shelf life (some one year).

This did mix well though with no clumping. I just wanted more from the flavoring. I do not really see what is different between the Base and the 9 as both are recovery essential aminos. This formula has a finer powder, but the flavoring is about the same (tried strawberry lemonade in both).

title: Pretty Good
text:
I have tried so many of these and I was expecting these to be thrown in the garbage. I am pleasantly shocked with the flavor on these. They really did bring an orange flavoring with no chalky aftertaste. I really like it.
I mixed in a standard size bottle of water and just shook. I had no issues with clumping. I love the added benefits of these as well.

title: Texture
text: I love a good sweet potato.  These really caught my attention especially with only being 80 calories per bar.  They have a leathery texture, but did taste like a very bland sweet potato.  I just was not a fan of the blandness or the texture.  If you are not a person who minds that, you will probably like these.  They were just not for me.

title: Nice Set
text: This is a great set pending price.  We have recently been working to build our home gym.  I actually have most of these already, but my nephew likes using them.  This was perfect for him to have to get started with his own equipment.  I love that it has the rollers and also the bands.

title: Pretty Good
text: I only recently started adding creatine into my routine.  I am enjoying this one.  I enjoy the flavor and it mixes easily with just water and ice.  I do only use this a few times a week as I do seem to wake up feeling a little more water retention.

title: Great
text: These are great to have on hand.  Both my husband and I both use these and I like having them so we can change them up every few weeks and not let them sit too long.  I do not personally care about the different levels of softness, but others may really love that option.  They seem to be around the same price as the store, if not a tad higher.  You are getting three though which is great.

title: Taste
text:
I take a BCAA/EAA daily, even on my off days. I loved that this was small packets so I can take them on the go. I am giving this one star for that reason as I love the idea.

Sadly, I did not like the taste of this at all. I could only take one to two sips before I just had to dump this out. It had a chemical flavor and was not pleasant at all. This one was not for me.

title: Great Brand
text:
I tried a pre-workout from this brand awhile back and really loved it. I was excited to try the BCAA as I use one everyday even on my off days. They are great for recovery.

This tastes great and mixes really easily. I always use a pre-workout before my workouts, so I wish they would have left out the added caffeine. It is a smaller dosage, but not something I personally love in my BCAA. I drink these during my workouts. I will definitely use this on days when I use less pre-workout or on my off days when I need a little extra boost.

I really like them though and hope to try more flavors.

title: Must Have
text: I love that these are compostable.  We love having these on hand for quick meals or when we do not need to dirty any dishes.  I do not like the waste they provide though, so knowing these are compostable is great.  They are a sturdy fork and great.

title: Great Concept
text:
I received four black lanyards. I was expecting to get some with a design, so I am not really sure if you are supposed to get that or only black.

You need to pull the tighten thing all the way to the end and then add the mask. The clasps were a little hard to push, but if you just pull the string through, it went easier. Make sure you are doing this and not just trying to put the loop over your head, as it does not go on that way and is way too small.

I like that I can have my masks hanging now and not worry about just throwing them down. Great idea.

title: Yes
text: I have been using these types of sponges for years.  I just love how soft they get once you add water and that they help exfoliate my skin without being too rough.  I am not really sure if the different ones really do anything different, but I still like them all.  I like that this is a set so you can just throw them out when you are done using them.  It says you can use them for up to two months, but I tend to only use them for a few weeks before changing them out.

title: Ok
text:
I use a BCAA everyday even on my off days. I like the added EAA with this one. I was just not a huge fan of the taste of this one. I did not get much flavoring and tasted more of the coconut water flavoring than apple. I even tried adding more and it was just the same. I did not mind the taste, just not my favorite.

My issue was the blendability. I use the same type of shakers for every brand I use. I do not use a ball and just water and ice. This would not mix that well and I was left with a gritty texture when I was drinking it. I did not like this aspect of it. I tried shaking again and again and it was still a little gritty.

title: Great
text:
I really love using this after my workouts! I mix this with unsweetened almond milk and a shaker bottle. It blends easily with no clumping. The best part is the flavor. It tastes great! I want to try all of of the flavors.

I have tried several items from the brand and I have loved them all!

title: Great
text: I have really stepped up my vitamin game lately and have really started to see a difference since adding a probiotic and collagen into my routine.  I like mixing this with my fiber and a drink packet.  I will even mix with my protein.  Works great

title: Great
text: I really like this duo.  Right now we are cleaning more than ever.  This works great!  It works well on our counters and our glass.  We use it clean everything with no issues.

title: Hear Me Out
text: I ended up giving this away as it was not for me.  So why I am giving this four stars.  It tasted really good and I am sure it will do what it says it does by providing energy.  This just had too many carbs for my liking.  I am on WW and really like lower point drinks for recovery.  This had seven points and it was just not worth it for me.  If you are looking for the extra carbs, this is a great option.

title: Not For Me
text:
I use a BCAA during every workout and was super excited for these. The bottles are large and would be great to drink during and after your workout. However; I could not stand the flavor or aftertaste. Also, do not smell this before you drink it as it smells horrible. I was hoping to get past the smell while drinking it, but it turned me off from wanting to put this to my lips. The flavor just needs improvement for me personally.

I am giving this three stars though as it is a great concept. My friend gave these to her husband and he enjoyed them. I think this is going to be a personal taste preference if you like it or not.

title: Pretty Good
text: I like these.  It is hard to explain what the taste is like though.  I have tried the peanut butter chocolate ones and I do prefer those a little more than these.  These do not have as much flavor as they did to me.  This was more of a nutty natural taste.  I did not get much sweet or cherry taste. They are still pretty good though.

title: French Vanilla
text: I love using MCT oil in my coffee, and I loved the idea of this creamer.  I love it even more since it is flavored!  It is easy to use.  I did have some issues with blending at times, but I just use a drink mixer and it is perfect.

title: Great
text: I really like using pre-workout and this one is now on my list to buy again. I really like the taste. I take this 15 min before my workout and I am ready to go. I just added some in water and I was good to go.

title: Yes and no
text: These are pretty good.  I really love them, but my husband does not.  They are more so nuts and seeds tasting.  They are not very sweet at all.  They are a smaller size, but great for on the go.  I would like a little more flavoring but I still really enjoyed them.

title: On The Go
text: I have to take my medicine throughout the day, so I always have medicine on me.  I love this pill organizer and the case which makes it great for on the go.  The case is adorable and I love the added pop it brings to my accessories.  It is easy to carry and the case closes with no issues.

title: Not For Me
text: I personally do not like the taste at all.  It reminds me of sparkling water though and I know people love those.  It was very seltzer like.  I will give these to my friend as I think she will love them.  I ended up pouring mine out.

title: Love
text: I am a huge believer in essential oils. I love that this comes in a rollar ball so I can take it with me while traveling. This has been purse friendly as well with no issues of leaking which is another plus. I like using this when I am feeling stressed and also when I am going to bed.

title: Pedi
text: We like to have pamper nights and the previous foot callus remover we had was getting gross.  This one is huge and is more the size like an actual cheese grater.  This works really well though at taking off dead skin.  It really works on the heels.

title: Roller Ball
text: I am a huge believer in essential oils.  I love lavendar and love that this comes in a rollar ball so I can take it with me while traveling.  This has been purse friendly as well with no issues of leaking which is another plus.  I like using this when I am feeling stressed and also when I am going to bed.

title: No Taste
text: I use collagen everyday.  Today I tried this in my smoothie.  It is easy to use and did not effect the taste.  I like that it blended with everything and did not clump up like some other brands I have tried.

title: So Far So Good
text: Ok.  I have only tried this once and not alone.  I tried this mixed in with my smoothie.  It did not change the flavor and I like that I can hide in within different recipes.  I need to explore the benefits of long term use and how to use it a little more.  For now, I will stick to adding to my smoothies everyday.  I love the idea of adding a superfood item into it, especially if it will help with stress

title: Need Another One
text: This is a really nice umbrella.  We have one at the house and in my car.  My husband needed one so this was great.  It opens and closes with no issues.  We have not used it besides testing it out yet, so we will see how it holds up overtime.

title: Needed a New One
text:
I had a previous unit but ran out of pads. It also stopped working after a few uses. I have been using this for a few weeks and so far so good. I will definitely update this review if it stops working within a few weeks/months.

These are great for my lower back pain.

title: My Mistake
text: My doctor has been recommending getting on a Probiotic, but I was not sure where to start with the right one for me.  I thought these were gummies, but they are not.  They are a one pill a day capsule.  I have only taken it for 2 days, so we will see.  Seems to be priced nicely compared to some others I checked out.

My issue was the blendability. I use the same type of shakers for every brand I use. I do not use a ball and just water and ice. This would not mix that well and I was left with a gritty texture when I was drinking it. I did not like this aspect of it. I tried shaking again and again and it was still a little gritty.

title: Great
text:
I really love using this after my workouts! I mix this with unsweetened almond milk and a shaker bottle. It blends easily with no clumping. The best part is the flavor. It tastes great! I want to try all of of the flavors.

I have tried several items from the brand and I have loved them all!

title: Great
text: I have really stepped up my vitamin game lately and have really started to see a difference since adding a probiotic and collagen into my routine.  I like mixing this with my fiber and a drink packet.  I will even mix with my protein.  Works great

title: Great
text: I really like this duo.  Right now we are cleaning more than ever.  This works great!  It works well on our counters and our glass.  We use it clean everything with no issues.

title: Hear Me Out
text: I ended up giving this away as it was not for me.  So why I am giving this four stars.  It tasted really good and I am sure it will do what it says it does by providing energy.  This just had too many carbs for my liking.  I am on WW and really like lower point drinks for recovery.  This had seven points and it was just not worth it for me.  If you are looking for the extra carbs, this is a great option.

title: Not For Me
text:
I use a BCAA during every workout and was super excited for these. The bottles are large and would be great to drink during and after your workout. However; I could not stand the flavor or aftertaste. Also, do not smell this before you drink it as it smells horrible. I was hoping to get past the smell while drinking it, but it turned me off from wanting to put this to my lips. The flavor just needs improvement for me personally.

I am giving this three stars though as it is a great concept. My friend gave these to her husband and he enjoyed them. I think this is going to be a personal taste preference if you like it or not.

title: Pretty Good
text: I like these.  It is hard to explain what the taste is like though.  I have tried the peanut butter chocolate ones and I do prefer those a little more than these.  These do not have as much flavor as they did to me.  This was more of a nutty natural taste.  I did not get much sweet or cherry taste. They are still pretty good though.

title: French Vanilla
text: I love using MCT oil in my coffee, and I loved the idea of this creamer.  I love it even more since it is flavored!  It is easy to use.  I did have some issues with blending at times, but I just use a drink mixer and it is perfect.

title: Great
text: I really like using pre-workout and this one is now on my list to buy again. I really like the taste. I take this 15 min before my workout and I am ready to go. I just added some in water and I was good to go.

title: Yes and no
text: These are pretty good.  I really love them, but my husband does not.  They are more so nuts and seeds tasting.  They are not very sweet at all.  They are a smaller size, but great for on the go.  I would like a little more flavoring but I still really enjoyed them.

title: On The Go
text: I have to take my medicine throughout the day, so I always have medicine on me.  I love this pill organizer and the case which makes it great for on the go.  The case is adorable and I love the added pop it brings to my accessories.  It is easy to carry and the case closes with no issues.

title: Not For Me
text: I personally do not like the taste at all.  It reminds me of sparkling water though and I know people love those.  It was very seltzer like.  I will give these to my friend as I think she will love them.  I ended up pouring mine out.

title: Love
text: I am a huge believer in essential oils. I love that this comes in a rollar ball so I can take it with me while traveling. This has been purse friendly as well with no issues of leaking which is another plus. I like using this when I am feeling stressed and also when I am going to bed.

title: Pedi
text: We like to have pamper nights and the previous foot callus remover we had was getting gross.  This one is huge and is more the size like an actual cheese grater.  This works really well though at taking off dead skin.  It really works on the heels.

title: Roller Ball
text: I am a huge believer in essential oils.  I love lavendar and love that this comes in a rollar ball so I can take it with me while traveling.  This has been purse friendly as well with no issues of leaking which is another plus.  I like using this when I am feeling stressed and also when I am going to bed.

title: No Taste
text: I use collagen everyday.  Today I tried this in my smoothie.  It is easy to use and did not effect the taste.  I like that it blended with everything and did not clump up like some other brands I have tried.

title: So Far So Good
text: Ok.  I have only tried this once and not alone.  I tried this mixed in with my smoothie.  It did not change the flavor and I like that I can hide in within different recipes.  I need to explore the benefits of long term use and how to use it a little more.  For now, I will stick to adding to my smoothies everyday.  I love the idea of adding a superfood item into it, especially if it will help with stress

title: Need Another One
text: This is a really nice umbrella.  We have one at the house and in my car.  My husband needed one so this was great.  It opens and closes with no issues.  We have not used it besides testing it out yet, so we will see how it holds up overtime.

title: Needed a New One
text:
I had a previous unit but ran out of pads. It also stopped working after a few uses. I have been using this for a few weeks and so far so good. I will definitely update this review if it stops working within a few weeks/months.

These are great for my lower back pain.

title: My Mistake
text: My doctor has been recommending getting on a Probiotic, but I was not sure where to start with the right one for me.  I thought these were gummies, but they are not.  They are a one pill a day capsule.  I have only taken it for 2 days, so we will see.  Seems to be priced nicely compared to some others I checked out.

title: Nice smelling but fragile and unsure of effect
text: These are a great Idea and I was eager to use them. Getting them out of their packaging was a little tricking in that they are very delicate and easy to break. This should have no effect on the their function. Once in the drain, it was hard to tell what they are to do. I suppose they start our having a great scent but over the course of a month I honestly couldn't tell. Not sure what I would do differently but I would like to be able to smell a fresh scent throughout the month, but that didn't happen.

title: Compact, quiet and so far so good
text: [[VIDEOID:389485f41df6f3c585ec5028b8671c02]] I love that it is odorless and ALMOST silent. It is important to keep it in small spaces for the best effect. I used a bathroom that has the great pleasure to have a litterbox, it took about an hour to notice the shift in smell and 2 hours to actually notice the difference. This unit does not put out an odor and only a minimal fan sound. I'm cautiously giving it 5 stars because I like how it is working now and I want to give it some time to see how it works on a consistent basis.

title: Worth getting addicted to...especially if you like really Dark Chocolate
text:
I saw the words "Dark Chocolate" and I lit up. For years now we have been enjoying the lower sugar and positive effects of dark chocolate, braving all the way up to a smooth and cool 90% cocoa -- That's right up there with baking chocolate. I didn't let myself expect much from a commercially made probiotic, and maybe that has to do with my happy surprise. But let me start with the fact that the chocolate is 64% cocoa! Not bad, not bad at all for dark chocolate lovers.

They are the size of a rounded quarter and have a firmness that allows them to be savored - they melt just like a piece of chocolate would. If you are a dark chocolate lover you will appreciate the slight tang and less syrupy sweetness that accompanies milk chocolate. These are really pleasing and they tout that their flora survives our stomach acid 100X better! It took me 4 days, to notice the shift. My roommate took 10 but we both commented on the absence of feeling bloated after dinner and the regularity that ensued (Okay I have to confess that I would often take one at lunch AND dinner)!

These are NOT laxatives but candy bites that are packed with Probiotics or "good bacteria" the stomach needs to help digest our food and maintain a healthy balance of energy and fuel. So rather than feeling that your food takes hours to digest there is really a sense that things are more efficiently being broken down in the intestines. It's not an uncomfortable feeling at all (but could be if you over do them).

They don't taste like they smell, so don't dig your nose in and take a big whiff anticipating a nice rich chocolate smell...You won't. What matters is the flavor and the results both of which you will get.

text: These come in a nice box and are great as a gift for a tween. The price is just right and the colors are super fun.

title: Leave white marks - don’t clean
text: I tried using these tablets on several different occasions but I never had a good result. The tablets usually leave white marks that need extra rinsing later which defeats the purpose of using the tablets at the first place. I tried washing my kids cups as suggested and that was a fail but it further and tried cleaning ice machine which was another “no result” situation.

title: Great combo
text: I am about to hit 40 and lack of collagen is starting to show on my skin and joints. I take this supplement daily. These are capsules, no smell and easy to swallow. I used to take powder drink collagen but the flavor was horrible and I found myself cheating just because I was dreading tasting it. This is much easier and works better for me. Additional Vitamins are always a bonus. Good for immunity and skin.

title: Not pain but tedious process
text: Using this whitening kit is a little tedious because molds are large and cause your mouth to salivate, then the gel from molds get mixed with saliva. Then you have to put the light against your teeth and hold it with your lips which further increases salivating 😑 I honestly think the gel gets diluted with all that saliva and have a hard time telling is there any difference. My teeth are sensitive and I usually have to deal with pain when using whitening kits but this one wasn’t painful at all.

title: No foam - under average quality
text: I’m not too crazy about these bath sponges. The scrubbing part is similar to used up sanding paper. The spongy part is VERY DENSE, no matter how much soap I pour in, I can’t get it to foam up like my loofah or my other bath sponge. Yes I add water 🙄 but I just can’t get that foaming effect. Lastly, chunk of scrubbing part tore AND the top nearly completely separated from the rest of the sponge. 3 uses only!  I would only get this at a dollar store, because, well it’s a dollar store and you can’t expect much for $1.

title: Great wipes - unexpected scrubbing power from perfectly smooth wipe - need a dispenser
text:
I almost said these are just a very durable disposable towels when the table I am supposed to review arrived. The metal legs were covered with something that looked like dried up boogers ( or a glue?) but I wasn’t able to remove it by scratching off with my finger nails. I tried dipping paper towel in water just to see the reaction to water, was it gonna soften or something but no, 0 result. Then I saw these and decided to give them a try. I dipped in water and pressed hard... it was COMING OFF! It wasn’t the water, it was the wipe a d I could tell by the way it wS coming off. It wasn’t melting, it was sort off coming off in tiny chunks. Regular paper towel didn’t do anything, nada! I don’t know much about fibers and exactly were these made but they are thin yet VERY DENSE. You can literally wash it, rinse it and reuse it. I really think the density of the fibers is what gives them scrubbing power. I then sprayed my bathroom sink with a bathroom cleaner and used this to wipe off..OMG! I didn’t use anything to scrub like usual (scotch scrub sponge), I just wiped with this wipe which scrubbed the sink and absorbed cleaner at the same time leaving my sink looking clean and shiny after just a few wiping moves, seriously? I then went onto my kitchen cabinets that were ahem kinda due for a scrub... did great.

The only downside is the packaging. It’s a plastic bag with a stack of large square towels. That’s it. It takes large space to lay flat and you need to keep it flat so it’s easier to remove one wipe at the time. That’s another part of the same problem, it’s not easy separating and pulling one out. Some sort of dispenser would be 100x better.

title: Excellent ingredients , I would go for a 2pack for better price!
text: This is a great zink supplement with significant addition of other vitamins, antioxidants and immunity boosters. Excellent quality ingredients,  Well rationed. From some reason 6pack is so much more expensive per serving then a 2 pack of the same brand. I would go for a 2 pack, it’s better value, just make sure to plan on a refills accordingly.

title: konjac sponge is the most natural and gentle exfoliant
text:
Konjac sponges are made out of konjac root, a porous root vegetable that grows in Asia. They work great to exfoliate the skin gently. When soaked in water, the konjac sponge becomes incredibly soft and almost feels slimy. Because of its texture, you can exfoliate every day. I have used konjac sponges for my babies too. These are six sponges in different colors, all infused with other ingredients:

White - Pure konjac powder,
Black - Bamboo activated charcoal,
Yellow - Turmeric,
Dark pink - Red clay,
Green - Aloe vera,
Pink - Sakura (Cherry Blossom)

Each sponge has a little string, which is very helpful to hang it dry. Out of the bag, these sponges are hard as a rock and need to be submerged in water for a couple of minutes. My other konjac sponge came with the instructions to microwave on high for 2 minutes to sanitize, but this brand doesn’t ask for that. After use, it’s important to rinse, squeeze out the water; your sponge will last longer and be cleaner. That should be routine with any washcloth, though, so this may be an unnecessary comment.

These are great, I scrub my face EVERY DAY with my Red Clay konjac sponge, and my skin does not get irritated. They are recommended to change every two months, but I first have to see if they can live for two months.

title: Best for babies
text:
Dreft Newborn smells better than any other laundry soap in the world, period.
It’s gentle and doesn’t cause any skin irritation to my baby and her clothes smells amazing. It cleans the clothing well although for heavy stains from baby food I have to use dish soap to rinse the stain first. Honestly, no laundry soap I had a chance to try was able to wash the bibs without pretreating the stain first. I love this new packaging, it is very practical and I love that I don’t have to screw dispenser cup back on, this version is a cartoon box and there is a insert for the cup on the top so it’s easier to just place the cup there. I keep my soap on the shelf above my kids reach so there is no safety concern. I am also very pleased to see more environmentally friendly packaging. I definitely appreciate the opportunity to preserve our planet for the sake of our children and grandchildren.

title: Practical way to add protein to your diet (or your kids)
text: This protein powder has a consistency similar to almond flour. It dissolves quickly and completely, does not lump up at all. I mixed it with water and it’s practically flavorless. I mean, I can “taste” little something but it’s like a different tastes of water. I am adding to cookies and most of our food because my boy doesn’t want meat or beans so this is a good protein addition to his diet without fighting at a dining table. I am very happy with this product. I received this free of charge for the review but will definitely continue to buy. If this is offered on Amazon subscribe and save I will definitely add to my subscriptions. 👍

title: Tested positive before missed period but overpriced comparing to leading brand
text: This pregnancy test by Natalist comes with detailed instructions and is easy to use. Pee on the stick, wait for couple minutes and read your results. 2 lines are pregnant even if the second line is less visible. Packaging is nice and discreet. Reason for star down is the price. I never heard of this brand before yet is costs more than leading brand. Clearblue early detection costs $8 for 2 tests or $15ish for 4. If I was buying unknown brand I would look for the cheaper price but if I was spending $16 I would buy Clearblue and get 4 tests instead 3. That being said, both Clearblue and this test tested positive before missed  period!!!

title: Seeds compressed into a bar - label states 13g carbs per bar NOT 3g as in product description
text: These bars are made out of seeds, bunch of different seeds compressed into s bar. Similar to granola bar it can get a little messy but not as messy as granola. They are not too chewy considering it’s all seeds. I first had nutmeg and I could definitely tell there is coconut before reading the label. They are sweet but they are not sweet, it’s just the tease. They make me anticipate for more sweetness but it’s only 2g so it’s really just the hint. They do have 13grams of carbs though. Description here says 3g of carbs but the bar label says 13g of carbs. I don’t know which one is wrong. I am not overly impressed but I won’t dismiss these either. I suppose if I was following strict diet and these bars would fit in my diet plan I would get them but otherwise no.

title: Big difference 😍
text: This device is super easy to use. I have a lot of lashes but they need curling, I usually apply mascara on the top of the lashes then use traditional curler and apply mascare from the bottom up. This heated curler gives mu lashes different dimension, they are not as curled like with the regular curler but they are lifted and they look great, like there is a volume and the difference is big. I really what this little tool does! It has different heating options and it’s really easy to use, at first I felt uncomfortable about putting something hot by my eyes but now I realize that was silly. This is going to a main makeup bag where all the favs are.

title: I still have sensation in my hands! Great gloves with grippy surface
text:
I was afraid these gloves are going to be very thick and I will hate using them then probably completely void because I can’t get a good feel and I just never feel things are clean unless I get a good sensation in my hands. I hope this makes sense. However, these gloves are not one of those thick rubbery gloves that numb your sensation for touch. They are still thick and durable but feel more like a silicone then rubber and allow my hands and fingers to have a good sensation to touch. I have medium sized hands and M fits me well with a little extra room too. The fingers are not too long and the overall fit is very good. They are even decorated and have a little trim design around the hand opening. They are not too deep, see photo. They come about half way to my elbows. The palms and fingers are textured in a cute way and this allows for a better grip when holding something in a soapy water. I received 2 pairs, white with blue fingers and plain purple and both colors are cute if that matters.

Bottom line, I always hated rubber gloves but I use these without dreading it, it’s a first. Good pair of gloves.

title: Helps controlling anxiety
text:
My husband is getting ready to go to Afghanistan and I have young babies so needless to say the stress is on! I spend night tossing and turning and worrying about him and also about how am I going to manage our babies being by myself for months at the time. I nurse our youngest so any sort of medication is out of the question.

For those reasons I decided to try this stress relief supplement and I honestly think it works. I still have exact same worries and stressors but I sleep a bit better and overall dealing with everything feels a bit easier. It might be due to the simple fact I get more sleep and rest but ultimately it all goes back to taking this supplement.

title: Highly recommend!
text: Thos trimmer set is pretty great overall. I wish that the heads where easier to swap but other than that I love it. I can use it to groom my husbands beard, trim nose hairs, trim eyebrows and so much more. The foil shaver is another really great feature that alot of the other shavers don't include. The battery last along time after fully charged and the holding base is convenient and organized. All in all, I would highly recommend.

title: 5 stars!
text: This scrubber is amazing! I like the silicone material as well as the exfoliating nubs. It does a great job at giving me a deep clean feeling. I like the slot for soap and love how easy it is to suds up. The loop is great for hanging it up and it stays clean too. I like that I don't have to worry about porous surfaces and bacteria etc. All in all, I would highly recommend this!

title: Works great!
text: This works great for helping clear my nasal passages from allergens and colds. I like that I can use this on my kids and myself. Its gentle and doesn't irritate and it's super easy to use. I like that its reusable and easy to clean. All in all, I would highly recommend this!

title: Too wide for my small hands but still nice!
text: This octopus shape facial brush is a bit too wide for my small hands to get a good hold of it. I wish it came a little smaller in diameter as far as the handheld part goes. Other than that I really like this. I've used it in the shower to wash my face and it worked great and is waterproof. It's easy to clean after using and even comes with an extra brush head. I like that its rechargeable so no expensive batteries to replace. The bristles are soft and it does a great job exfoliating and deep cleansing. The first time I used it my face was a little sensitive afterwards but I used it again a few days later with lighter pressure and it was much better. All in all, I really like this but I would change the diameter of the handle if I could.

title: Quality ingredients but the bag isn't very full.
text: This fruit powder is actually pretty decent. It doesn't have any sweetness to it which is a little disappointing since its bitter but it works great forixing with yogurt and in smoothies for an extra kick. I feel like they could've packaged it in a much smaller bag since it's only about 1/3 full, giving the illusion that you get more for your money. Other than that it's fantastic and the quality of the ingredients is 5 stars.

title: Sketchy
text: At first this appears to be a good value, but upon receiving product you get more and more uneasy about it.  It is NOT 5000 IU per serving but 200, and the origin of manufacturer is sketchy. This is a very questionable product, and if they will lie about the dosage what else will they lie about? Consuming something like this is like playing Russian Roulette. Not worth it.

title: Sketchy stuff
text: This is a sketchy product from a sketchy company and God only knows what you are getting when you order this stuff! It doesn't smell like sandalwood and while you might get a whole lot of this stuff, I wouldn't put it in my diffuser and breath it in because I don't know what it is. Keep away1

title: Good for finicky dogs
text: I give this to my small dog who is almost 9 and has always had some joint issues. These work well for him and he enjoys eating them. They are a small enough that he can happily munch them down even with a few missing teeth.

title: Wouldn't stick
text: Tried about 5 of these and none of them would stay on my finger, the adhesion is terrible and I had to try to use this with bandage tape to keep it on, in which case, you might as well just use gauze.  They are padded well enough, but if they won't stay on, who cares? A big pass on these.

title: Annoying sounds
text: I am a light sleeper so having some background noise helps me to sleep deeper and keeps me from waking up at night over every little noise. Normally, I would use my echo dot to play rain sound, but am trying to move away from internet dependent devices so I thought I would give this a go, but it's a big pass. You can't see any of the buttons in the dark to turn the thing on or off or adjust the volume, and I could have worked around that except that the sounds themselves are lousy. I tried what I thought was the rain sound, but it was more like the sound of water dripping over a crackling fireplace, none of the other sounds were any better and got on my nerves. Also, you get a voice notification of "sound on" or "sound off" but the words were pronounced strangely, don't get me wrong, I enjoy different accents, but this wasn't an accent I had an issue with, it was the whole pronunciation of the word "sound".

title: Junk
text: Unfortunately I found this to be worthless. The silicone scrubbers are not long enough, and it is basically just a regular sponge wrapped in a piece of silicone. It is going to be a breeding ground for bacteria and mold and doesn't even feel effective when using it. As far as it's hilarious claims that it will help with "horniness" those are also false, for that you might want to try an ice-cold shower, but this isn't going to help!

title: Delicious immunity defense!
text: These are great gummies with a thoughtful combination of immunity-boosting ingredients in a delicious format! They are fairly small, and coated with sugar crystals (so if that is a problem be aware, my niece, for instance, can't handle the texture) but the gummies themselves are very smooth and they taste just like candy. Important to keep your immune system up and these are a great tool in that endeavor!

title: Good toothpaste, strange flavor
text: I just started using this toothpaste but I think it does a great job at cleaning your teeth and leaving your mouth fresh, the major problem I had with it was the flavor, it tastes a bit like cloves (which I don't mind) coupled with some very strong flavor that was familiar but not pleasant, I'm not a fan of mint, but given the options I would have chosen mint over this. Hopefully, it will grow on me over time, but I'm not counting on it. It is also a very messy toothpaste, though the upside to using charcoal toothpaste is that you can see to make sure every tooth gets properly brushed! It did, however, do a great job and I'm hopeful the charcoal will also help whiten my teeth.

title: Worked very well for me
text:
This cleaner actually worked better than I expected. We had a new slab of bluestone in front of our fireplace and I realized the flooring people had gotten some type of glue or filler on it. I could not remove it with soap. But after applying this cleaner and leaving it on for 5-10 minutes,it actually made it so I could scrub off the stains with a scrub brush. There was no trace of the previous stains.
I also used it on my limestone table and it looks much better. ALthough it did not take off some rings from glasses so it make take more than cleaner for that.

title: Cute! Fits snug. I ordered a small and I have a medium boot
text:
I measured my surgical boot from the last time ( it was indeed 16 inches tall by 8 inches around) so I knew that the tall boot cover would fit. My surgical boot from my right foot was a small last time, so I ordered the small for my boot I was getting on my left.

I am out of surgery and got a medium boot, but this boot stretched out over it well. I did not even undo the Velcro because it fit like a glove. The only thing it doesn’t do is zip up all the way if you don’t pull it to the top and over your boot ending (the part closest to your knee). I did notice that if I did pull it over the boot and zip it up all the way, it would leave an indention on my leg.

However, all of that to say the small size fit snug but well enough on my medium boot. I would say they are true to size, but I am happy with how the small fits on the medium. It just means it won’t be going anywhere no matter how much I move around.

I am excited because my toes are covered and I feel much safer from whatever the weather outside wants to throw at my foot. Not to mention I’m not ruining the Velcro on my boot by it attaching to the dog hair on the couch. 😂😂

title: Easy water quality test, complete and  clear results
text: The test kit is straightforward to use, with clear instructions and well-packaged shipping (both ways).  I found the results easy to read with the color coding very helpful in zeroing in on what to look at that may be of concern.  It would be nice if the report was interactive with the website with the resources details, instead it is a nicely prepared PDF file.  Great support staff, there to assist.  I would recommend this test kit, if you are interesting in finding out exactly where your water stands in terms of quality and contaminates.  You do have to wait 10 days or so for the results.

title: You must buy this!
text: I received this item yesterday and have had 5 servings since! This stuff makes drinking water easy. It isn’t very sweet at all yet still flavorful. I had a hard time choosing flavors but decided on the berry lemonade and was not disappointed. I think this item is very reasonably priced and between that, the flavor, and effectiveness, this company will go far. My body is already thanking me for the hydration replacement. I am excited to try more flavors.

title: Reizen Prism Spectacles
text: These prism glasses are very good.  I have another pair from a different Manufacturer and these Reizen prisma are clearly better.  The big difference is that you can wear them over reading glasses while my previous pair was not wide enough to do that.  The only drawback is that they are quite heavy, but the optics are excellent.

title: Reizen Prism Spectacles
text: These prism glasses are very good.  I have another pair from a different Manufacturer and these Reizen prisma are clearly better. The only drawback is that they are quite heavy, but the optics are excellent.

title: If you're struggling with this issue, try it!
text:
So
I know how frustrating styes and chalazions are. Been battling them for a few years and it can really take a toll on self esteem. I was doing really well all winter and had no styes or chalazions, but one popped up last week, so I was pretty sad. I ordered this and it came pretty quickly, and I have to say I'm impressed- day three of application and the stye is pretty much gone. It was causing my whole eye to swell, and all the swelling is gone and my eye looks normal! I'm going to apply on my pretty unnoticeable chalazions and see if it helps for those at all. They are not noticeable but I can still feel them sometimes so I hope this product helps them go away.

title: Size change is terrible
text:
I’ve used this product for over two years and absolutely loved it.

The product I received from Amazon was always longer and narrower as opposed to the “same” product from the store, which was shorter and wider.

Now, the only product available is the short/wide version which I loathe.

I don’t know whose underwear is that wide, because mine certainly isn’t.

This causes a panty liner to stick to your skin and/or bunch up uncomfortably.

Why the change?

This was a five star product for me prior to the size change.

I’ve seen people recommend cutting them down to size, but that’s kind of a pain in the a$$.
